item.text: rgya gar skadu/ Ar+ya sA ga ram ti par brod tshan
mam hAyAnasU tra/bod/du/ 'phags pa blo gros rgyas tshos
zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang
ngo as rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
mdortsi
gshegs pa gnas/ bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi tshogs bsags pa/ spyod pa chen
rgyal 'od ldan klung po 'dul bas semasar rtogs
po 'a mthun pa/ sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/
bstan pa mtha' yas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sprul pas byin gyis brlabs pa chags ba med pa'i spyod yul gyi ga shes la
'jug pa/ dga' ba rgya chen bo skyedapa/ dranab dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs bas 'jug ba kun nas ma smad pa/ ga shos kyis rnam par dpyod
ba de la ma chags bar rtogs pas 'jug ba/ bskal pa chu med par mngon par bstod pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tumed
pa na pa zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid dumangon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lan shin tu
thu@#// bskor slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni shin tumanga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbang ni shin tubames
sems can thams cad kyi bsam ba bsgrub pa ni legs par mkhyen// dbang bo'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdes/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyo ba
yang dag par 'joms pa la ni ma bas/ sos rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub ba ni rgyun ma chad cing/ dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dgo
'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang cang shes kyisams dang ldan pa// nyon mos pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang
dag par 'joms pa la brtson pa/ chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i chos kyis nges
bar byung ba/ spyod lamamadzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs ba sha stag
go/ byang chub sams dpa'i dge 'dunachen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sanas dpa' chen po dmagags pa med ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod par pa tu thob pa/ dbang bskur ba dad/
ldan pa'i bya dachub sems dpa' sa la zhugs pa/ mdon par 'du byed pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shas bas rnam par brgyan pa/ byang chub sams dpa'i gzungs ma zad
pa'i za ma tog rab tu thob pa// byang chub sems dpa' dang de 'dzazhi dpa' bar 'gro ba la dbad klob ba/ byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa sams can thams cad tshan
bar khyed la rjes su thob pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhun gyis lung bas des par 'byung ba bkod ba'i rgyun gyi lhag bu'i bsam ba la shan tu gnas pa/ tshad mad grangs med
bsam kyis ma khyab/ mtshungs pa med gzhal du med dpag tu mid kha la 'od lta sku/ byung tshub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzod ma zad ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems
dba' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa zhes khu ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po stobs pa mtha' yas shes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams
dpa' chen po dachags pa med pa 'khasan ga tan ba zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus gong ba med ces bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po brtson 'grus blo gros zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgyun ma 'chad pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems
dba' chen po chags pa med pa'i ma 'jigs pa brtsigs pa zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don nges par brtags te lta ba zhes bya ba dang/ de la sogs pa byang
chub sems dba' sams dba' chen po tshad mad/ grangs med/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ mtshungs pa mad/ gzhal du med dpag tu med pa dag dang yang thabs gcig go/
de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pas des par 'byung ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i sgo byang chub sems dpa' lam bkod pa la dmags pa stobs dang/ mi
'jags pa dang sangs rgyas chos thams cad yongs su 'grub pa' ya shas kyi 'byung gnas/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i slob 'jug pa so so yang
dag bar rig pas rnam par gdon ma za ba la 'jug pa'i sgo/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la 'bad pas 'jug pa phyir ma ldog pa 'khor lo phyirem ldeg pa ston pa// theg pa
thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyangs 'dres pa med de tshul gcig pa rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/ sams can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po'i tshul la
'jug pa ston pa// snying po dang ldan pa// chos rnam par gdon u za ba dang/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ tshul bzhin du chos kyi tshul la 'bab cid 'jug pa/
nyon mongs pa dang lta bar gyur pa thams cad 'dul ba/ chags pa med pa' ya shes la 'jug pa// kun tu bsko ba'i thabs la mkhas pa shes pa ston nga/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa
nyid kyi ya shes la 'jug pa/ chags pa med pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi sgo/ chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par gdonam tha bar ston pa ma rtog cing rnam par ma rtog sta/ mnyam pa
nyid du 'jug pa// rton cing 'brel par 'khyud ba zab mo rtogs par byed pa// bsod nams dang/ ya shes kyi tshogs chen po sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi sku dang/ gsud dang/ shugs
mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang/ blo rgyus dang/ rtogs ba dang/ mos pa dang/ shes rab ma zad pa mngon par sgrub pa/ nyan thos kyi khrig pos 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang/ soms rab tu dban par shes pa/ thug ba chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen/
bar dbang bskur ba rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir gsung ngo// ston to/
rab tu 'chad do// 'dzin tu 'jug go/ klog tu 'jug go/ shes bar mdzad do// rnam par shes par mdzad do// rab tu shes par mdzad do// rab tu 'god do// rnam par
'byed do// rnam par 'grel to// gsal bar mdzad do// yang dag par rab tu ston to// da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don shan tu rnam par nges pa/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u/
chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu/ sa'i stod nas bzung ba yin
chad/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhal thug pa'i bar dag tu ! chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig ltar kun tu snang ste/ 'di lta ste dparan/ bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'das
nas chags pa 'byung ga stong gsum kyi skog po 'a'ajartan gyi maN dbam/ dachupA lo ka su gang bar gyur/ chu'i dkya'e lo kyis[']sa su 'khor la de lan du de'i
tshe stong gsum gyi stod chen bo' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gang ga lta bu r gnas par kun tu snang yang/ stong gsumakyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams
na/slong dang/ grong khyer dang grong rdaladang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'khor rnams la yad/ sgrib pa med par kun tu snang ngo// 'dzam bu gling rnams dang/ gling bzhi pachen

po rnams dang/ rgyamatsho chen po rnams dang/ rar ba rnams dang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa 'a lha' pu rnams la yang/ ston ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin du sgrub pa mya yang m da par de kho na bzhin du kun tu

snang ngo// tshu phung po de las kyad pad+ma chu banapi'u/ ma ge la pa naan+d+ri tshul/ lo ma ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gsar/ ze ban dpal gyi snying po// snying po na rdo'i snying po las grub pa/ mu tig gi/

dri bsan khebs par byas pa// 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang ldan pa// tshad ni rgyang grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po byung ste/ de dag rin po che bkod
pa 'a 'khor gyi gzhi las thal nas/ shing tu la'i srid du 'phags te/ thams cad dang ldan pa' 'khor de yad de 'tsho/ pad+ma' 'khod par kun tu snang ngo// par de dag las kyang 'od gang dag bas phyogs
bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med ba dag snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa 'od de lta bu dag byung ngo// denas rngams rud dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/
ltar snga ltas 'ad deg kun tu snang ba lasan/ kye ma'o/ 'di'i chos bstan pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod de// da nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
khyams pas/ tshe 'phrul rgya chen po de mthong nas barma'i stan las langs te/ gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad+ma'i snying po 'batsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log
su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dra skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dachab kyis yongs

su balcam pa 'a rgya mtsho gcig lta bu r kun tu gda' ba dang/ par bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di nyid chag mngon par byung ba 'di dag dang/ bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma khros pa'i tshe 'phrul rgya chen
po 'di dag kun tu gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/
byams pa 'og ga phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/
'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che drag dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba don/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i mchog
mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing da nas byang chub sams dpa'asams
dpa' chen po blo gros rgyamatsho zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang lhan cig tu nga la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/
chos bstan pa 'dA las gtam rgyud 'ga' zhig dra ba'i phyi'i 'jig rten gyi khams mamajed 'dir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'dis de'i snga ltas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan/
ba shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ri lags/ byang chub sams dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho thag ring por de srid cig na mchis shing chos kyi rnam gradas 'di nyan lags sam/

kacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAra'i bu khyod nga ltar nga'i mdun na chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad nyan pa de bzhan du byang chub sems dang 'a blo gros rgya mtsho yang 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'dug
ched chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan to// shA ra'i bu khyod kyis ji ltar nga dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di mthong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos kyang nga dang/
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'damashong ngo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma'o// dza[]ma du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i shes kyi stobs
'ad bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ 'di ltar thug rang bo de sudan mchas kyang mag gis gzugs mthong ba la sgrib pa ma ma/chis shang/ rna bas sgra thos pa la slob pa ma mchis pa na ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi che ba nyid bsam gyis ma khyab nga 'di thos nas/ su zhig bla na mad ba yang dag par rdzol sa pa'i byang chub tu sams ma bskyed/ gnas
[/])@#// brtan shApa'i bus bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu nyi khri bzhi stong bas blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas byang chub
pa sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gas kun nas bskor te/ mdun du bdaranas lhan cig tu brtson ldan 'das
rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blosarnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i ya shes de bzhin gshegs pa de la gsolanas/ bcom ldan 'dras des gnang ste/sangs rgyas
rnam par rol pa' rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba mad nga 'a rdzu 'phrul dang sams gcig gis thob pa'i dran pas mig phye ba tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po
che'i dram dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/ 'jug rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams kyi gzhi las thal
nas shing to la srid du mngon par 'phags te/ bad+ma'i sang po la 'dug par kun tu snang ngo// de las gzhan pa'i pad+ma'i sAd po rnams la yang byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
'khod par kun tu snang ngo// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshadamed grangs med pa dag nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag chos
nyin pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur to/// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma la 'khod ba dag gis/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams shin tu rgyas pas mdzes te/ lham ma/lhan n/ lhang nge'o// de na cha mas cad dang ldan
pa 'a 'khor de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba thob nas thal mo sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' de la phyag 'tshal to// de nas byang chub/
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgyamatshos 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po che dri ma dang bral ba dpag tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pan yod pa'i me tog mya ngan med cing yid du

'ong ba mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba 'dab ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ tshad rgyud grags kyi khyon tsam yod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par 'os pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i

bsam pas rnam par dag par sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su sbyangs pa rnam par bkra ba/ mag tu sdug pa 'khor Thams cad tshim par byed pa kun nas 'od dang ldan pa/ kun nas shani tu yad du 'ong ba'i

dri dang ldan pa'i mi tog de 'dra ba dag/ mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab ste/ me tog gi char des rani po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su mi bdun
rgya 'phang tsam gyi me tog dgram pa bkram par gyur to// rab tu dben pa'i bsam gtan gyi zas shes bya ba'i sal snyan yang bsgrags tu/ sal snyan gyi slades than sa rud dang ldan/
pa 'a 'khor de bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin du bdag bde bas tshim par shes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems drang 'a chen po blo gros rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das
la mchod pa 'di lta bu 'ad byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rngalamo sbyar te 'a duganas/ bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i mchog mnga' ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pas/ bcom ldan 'das la
rgyu gnod pa chung dam/ 3ma nga ba nyung dam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyanagasol la// byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po de dag thums cad kyis kyang/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tu/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas slar rang rang gi stan la 'khod de// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'tshangs pa sAng rje chen po
sems dpa' zhes bya ba/ mya ngan med pa'i glang bzhi pa chen po na gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus yongs su gad ba'i rgya mtsho

gcig lta bu yadamathong/ pad+ma rnam par bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong mngon par byung ba yang mthong// rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor spyi khyams byang chub sems dpas gang
bo yang mthong sta/ mthonganas kyang du 'ad snyan du sems te/ bsreg pa'i bskal pan ma byungan/ chus 'jig pa 'di byung// 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul 'di dag kun tu srung pa 'di la rgyu ru yod/ do bdag
bcom ldan 'dus kyi thad du song sta/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos chen po 'jag rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags zhes zhu'o snyam mo// de nas

tshadas pa sAng rje chen po sems pa/ tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kya yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas lhan cig du tshangs pa'i 'jig rtenanas ma snang bar gyur te/ rin po che bkod pa'i
'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar stang ga bar snang la 'dug ste/ lus btud k+kalamo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
tshangs pa snying chen po sems pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags/ gangastong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dachab kyis yongs su bltam pa'achumatsho

gcig lta bu r kun tu gdu 'a ba dang/ pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'das datsag byung ba 'ad dang/ de dag la yang skyes bu dam pa dag mchis pa 'di lta bu kun tu gda' yang ! bcom ldan 'das stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams la yang sgrub pa ma
mchis par kun tu gda' ba dang/ 'dzam bu'i klung rnams dang/ gling bzhi pa chen po rnams dang/ rgya mtsho rnams dang/ ra rab rnams dang/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la yang sngon ja lta
bar phyis kyang de bzhin du sgrib bcu yang ma mchis par da lon bzhin du kun tu gda' ba de la/ bcom ldan 'das 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gyur snyam du bdag ngo mtshar char rgyu na/ 'di su'i
snga ltas la gas/ de skadaces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa snying rje chen po sems pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa 'dan bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtshos chog ma nga 'a ba'i blos rnam par rol pa mngon par 'phags pa'i mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin po chadri ma dang bral ba dpag
tu med pa bkod pas brgyan pa nas/ byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen po blo gros rgyu mtsho/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang lhan cig tu nga
la ba lta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las gtam gyi rgyud 'ga' zhig yodas su dra ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi
zan mdzod 'dir 'ongs pa yin te/ gang song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chus yongs su gang bar kun tu snang ba 'ad lta bu 'dan de'i rnam bar smral ba'i phyin gyis brlabs so//
ba sol ba/ bcom ldan 'das da dung yang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa tshangs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la ni
rgyun chad pa tshung zad kyang mod da/ gad katshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa cad m gsung bar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshan yang/ ngan phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i khyad
tshub sems dpa' rnams la chos rnam par nges pa'i gtam yang dag par rab tu ston ta/tshangs pa sangs rgyas kyi yul na de ltar bsam gyis ma khyab bo// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di lta
bu 'di rnam par sal ba 'a byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa khyod kyis pad+ma dang tshad/
btsu'i khyon tsam yod pa de'i dkyilan pad+ma'i sAd po la/ rin po che bkod pa'i sang ge'i khri 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsan pa dang/ srog chags bye ba phrag mang bos phyag byas pa mthong ngam gsol
pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshangs dang khyod kyis sad ge'akhri de la byang chub sems dpa' lus gsar gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa lus mtshan dang
@#// dpe byadabazang pos legs par brgyan pa 'dug ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ma gtogs par gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i lus zal kyis mnananas 'dug pa//
byang chub sems dpa' mang pos phyag byas pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa 'di ni bying chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ste/ 'danadi'i rnam par sprul pa'o// de nas tshangs pa sange ldachen po sems pas/ byang chub sams dpa' sems
dpa' chenapo blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag byas nas/ tshig 'ad skad rjes sbas so// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu dag thob par gyurtsig/ gang dag/
byang chub sams dpa' blo gros rgyamatsho'amang shos pa'i sams can de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas kyang skyes bu dam pa 'di'i mang thos shang gzugs kyi
tshe/ lus kyang ma shong bas bdag gis kyang red pa legs par rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid cig tu 'chad/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad gnas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'a 'ad degs
kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang/ rgyas par byed kyi bar du'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa 'dus pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da
ltar byung pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems ni 'di'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyiraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa 'asams dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho/
'khor byams pyad rgya cher yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang/ tshangs pa sring rje chen po sems pa'i sems dang 'thun par bya ba dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di brgyan par bya ba dang/ bdag

nyid kyi shes rab dang/ spobs pa'i stobs zhabar bstan pa'i phyir pad+ma dang lhan cig/ song ge'i khri dang lhan cig tu stong gi bar srung la shing ta la bdun srid tsam na 'dug ste/ de'i tsha tshigs su gcad pa
'di dag sbas so// khrag khrig sangs rgyas zhing rdulaMsnyed kyi zhing rnams 'das pa'i 'og legs na/ rdzogs pa'akhyang chub sems dpa' nas zhing yon tan kun ldan rab mdzes pa// dren
'dren pa brtan pa rgya mtsho'i blo shugs mtshungs pa med bzhugs te// der ni bdag gis thub pa 'chos kyisagyur te thos nas de bzhin bzung// bdag ni stobs bcu ldan la blta bar bgyi dang de
gzhan phyag brgya dang// byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog 'di rnams phan tshun dri slad 'dir mchis te// skyob la phyag bgyi bas na chos rgyalamatshungs med khyod la 'dir phyag 'tshal/ sangs
rgyas mchod pa gang lags rgya chen shAn tu rgyas pas mchod pa 'tshal// gang gi gzugs la 'gazugs sum rtog tshor ba 'dus bgyisaa lags shang/ rnam par
shes pa 'ang tshor gsum bzhin du rtag par shan tu rnam dag ste// gang zhig 'dren la mtshan du ma lags skye dang rigs su ma lags rtogs// mig ldan des na chos kyi rgyal po dra mid yang dag don tu
mthong// bdag gam bdag mad ces bya'amany+dza' de gnyig ma len ma 'dor te// nad du gyur pa zhi zhing thugs kyang zhi ste phyi rol rgyum mnga'// mi rtog rnam ma rtog tsa'i rtog bral klub pa'i shugs
zinanam mkha' 'dra// des na phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs chos kyi rgyal mtshan gsal mdzad rnams la mchod// gang blo sngon pa rnams la 'di na sgyu ma len pa stong pa nyid// g.yo ba med pa 'i yid
kyis nor rnams de dag rig pa med par gtong// byang chub don tu nges kyi lta bar nges man spros la gnas ma yin// gang blo sems dran nyes pa mthor 'byin dan sbyani bdagasar sna med// de ni
rab tu zhabs zhi sa ngag med yid mad lus gdung med// gdung ba med pas bcang ba rgya chen dral te des pa dbang po [«]// bdag da theg par gnas nas byang chub dmigs pa med cing de ma 'dor//
khrims 'ganas blo ldan khrims 'chal thar byed 'dod pa tshul khrims dri ma med// chos rnams skad cig par na rtogs pa shes bya rnams la sbas pa mad/ nam mkha' mtshungs pa' yid kyis 'gro ba
'di dag sgyu ma ji bzhin mthong// gang zhig lus na dum bu dum bur bcad kyang yod na khrom 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub brtul zhugs gnas pa'i blo ldan mkhas te bzod pa su// gang zhig/
chos rnams chu zla chu bur mnyam zhig sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra// rtogs nas ma min srog ma yan zhing shes bu ldan pa ma yin mthong// byang chub dang na sams can tshogs mi dmigs kyang byang chung
gzhan don brtson// tshul 'dir gang zhig skrag po mad pa de na brtson 'grus bla mar phun// gang gsams na yul la chags pa med rung spyi tshom yodaman la// sems can gzhan gyi sogs kyi
spyod pa dus gsum gyur pa 'dashes pa dang// gang sams spyod par gyur pa gang yan de yi bdud kyis ma shis pa// pha rol phyin klob bsam la tan dang ni mdon par shes la blo gros gnas//
gong zhig sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung kun nyan rud de bzhin 'dzin byed pa/ bskal pa dpag tu med par sus kyang spobs pa rgyun chad ma 'gyur te// sangs rgyas chos rtogs sems can ma ltung
de na gang du'ang gnas med pa// bcom ldan thub nyid mkhyen gter shes rab ldan zhing 'jig rten gsum na dpa'// gang zhig pha rol phyin pa'i pha rol gshegs kyang gshegs mnam gshegs
man[：]gang zhig sams can spyod pa'i mas+sar phun pa gnas g.yo ba ma mnga' zhing// yon tan kun na spar gang phyin yon tan rnams la rlom sems ma mnga' ba// thub pa'i dbang bo shAkyi sangs
rgyas khyu mchog de la mgo des spu// 'od zer rnam dag nyams srin bu me khyer 'od rnams wal gyis mnan/ kha lce rtsa mthon bsal mtha' ma yas sa la ji sud yod pa
srog/ rimchog ri rab kyis nas la yod pa'i ri kun zil gyis mnan// shAkya khyu mchog sU 'dis 'jig rten gsum gyi 'od gzhan zil du chug/ zhang ba dganas lhags pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' khyu mchog ji snyed pa// de dag gtso bo khyod kyi mchog dang gza brjid kyi ni tshim par gyur// gang dag smon lam dza ltar btab pa de ltar kun gyis 'thun nga ra mthong// bdag/
cag rang nas ma 'ongs rang gi zhing nyid na na 'dug par shes// ji ltar gang gas rad rag de ltar khyod kyi gzungan shin tu 'jug/ srid pa gsuman skad rnams snyid mchis de dang 'thun par 'jug/rdul
gyi rdul dang ma rnams kyin sams kyi bsam pa bgrang nusasrid// grub nga 'a gsung dbyangs tshad med nam mkha' 'dra 'di bgrang bar nus ma lags// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mi rnams kyi na mtha' ma

chu bgrang bar ma nus te// 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma nyid ni rnam pa kun tu bgrang ma nus// nam mkha'i many+dza' dad 'khor ba'i mah+pha 'a na ma yas bgrang bar nus kyang srid// sangs rgyas mkhyen dang
'tshal lo// skye bo gang dag shes dang mos pas sangs rgyas che ba rjes rtogs pa// de dag gsan blo gros bsam yas rmad byung kun lhag 'dren pa mthong// de nas byang chub sems//
dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad pa 'di dug sbas nas/ bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phun/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la rtsa dang ru 'dod pa dris shig dang/ dris pa de dang de ngas lung
bstan pas khyod kyis sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sams dpa' srams dpa' chen po blo gros rgyamatshos 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phug zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ ting nge 'dzan de la rab tu gnas
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhes bdag gis thos na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shan tu dkar ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzan ji ltar thob pa dang/ ci'i slad du shin tu dkar ba dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba/ brtsom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de legs par bshad du gsol/ ting nge 'dzin de la 'jug pa'i sgor 'jug pa gang zos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ting nge 'dzin/
'di thob rung myur du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba/ btsem ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs bar bshad du gsol/ de skad
ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgyamatsho la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa legasaso legs so//
kyem dri ba 'di bzang zhing dpyod pa de tshul bzhin yan te/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shagi dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis shan tu dkar

ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ji ltar thob pa dang/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba ngas bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan
'das legs so legs so zhes gsol to/// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di/
skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros rgya mtsho 'ad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pa yin te/ dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ nges pa'i phung po la rab tu gnas pa//
tshogs bsags pa// dbang po rno ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ rgya'i stobs can yin tsa/ de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams mnyes par byed/ bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ram gror byed/ mchod par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa mthong zhing/ gsung
snyan pa thos te/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang mthong zhing/ chags pa med pa'i mkhyen pa yang slob la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lam/ kun rjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rjes su bstan pa'i tshe
'phrul gyis sems can 'dul ba mdzad pa yang mthong nas/ sems can rnams lasIng rje chen po skyes te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ brtson 'grus
brtsams pa pan te/ dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brjed pa med pas/ sems yongs su dag pa la rnal 'byor du byed do// sems yongs su dag
pas tung de 'dzin yongs su dag pa rab tu thob bo// blo gros rgyamatsho 'di lta sta dpar na/ rigs 'phags pa'anor bu rin po che nor bu mkhan mkhas pa'i lag tu son pa//
dzatsaman yongs su dag pa dang/ shin tu dkar ba dang/ mah+phang bu dang bral ba dang/ skyon mad par gyur pa de srid du yongs su sbyang san/ skyes bu mkhas pa nor bu rin po che la mkhas pa rnams
'du bar 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du byang chub sems dang 'a rabs 'phags pas thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam na mthang bu dang bral zhing/ rlom sems kyi cha gling bu dang bral bar 'gyur ba de srid du byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyangs pa bya ba dang/ thos pa mkhas pa yongs su sbyang bar bya pas/ grams cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po ched yongs su sbyang san/ phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'du zhang/ shin tu dkar ba drim mod pa'i phyago rgya'i ting de 'dzin 'di yang thob bo// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dparan/ rigs 'phags pa'i nor bu/
rin po che de na/ rin po che'i rigs dgu las shin tu 'das par 'byung// dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gsar gyi rogs dang/ dngul gyi rigs dang/ shel gyi rogs dang/ bzlumA'o
[/ ] rigs dang/ rdo'i snying po'i rigs dang/ sbyag gi rigs dang/ mu tig dmar po'i rigs dang/ kes ra'i rigs dung/ dpal gyi snying po'i rigs te/ nor bu rin po che'i rigs dgu
po 'di dag las shan tu 'das nas/ dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rigs de las de rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po cher 'gyur te// de 'khor los
sbyar ba'i rgyal po'i yongs su spyad par 'gyur gyi/ de ma yin pa sems can phal pa gzhan rnams kyin ma yin te/ nor bu rin po che da' 'od gang yin pa des ni/ de ma yin pa'i nor bu/
rin po che gzhan rnams kyi 'od mog mog por byed do// blo gros rgya mtsho de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyod pa'i rin po che de yang rin po che'i rags dgu las grwan tu 'das par 'byung ste/
dku gang zhe na/ 'ad lta ste/ so so'i skye bo dge ba ran po che rigs dang/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i ragis dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rin po che'i rigs dad/ mtshan
ma med pa la gnas pa rin po che'i rigs dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rin po che'i rigs dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rin po che'i rogs dang/ phyir 'ong ba rin po che'i rigs dang/ dgra bcom
pa rin po che'i rigs dang/ rang sangs rgyas rin po tsho'i rigs te/ rin po che'i rogs dgu po 'di dag las shan tu 'das nas/ bsnyung pa sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lhag pa'i bsam
pa sId rje chen po'i rin po che'i rigs las thams cad mkhyen par sams bskyed pa rin po che de 'byung// de yongs su sbyang san nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad
thal kyis non cud sems can thams cad kyi sams kyi rgyud rnams la yang snang par byed do// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dpon/ nor bu rin po che chen po de gang ga tsho sbyang bzod cing gnod pa
babod la phugs nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na/ nor bu rin po che chen po de na 'di ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa rnams la phan pa byed par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgyu
mtsho de bzhin du thams can mkhyen par sems bskyed pa ran po che de yang gang gi tshe sbyang bzod cing gnod pa bzod la/ phug nas kyang nyes par ma gyur na/ thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin
po che skyon cha mas cad dang bral ba de 'ad ltar sems can thams cad la phan par byed par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa ni po che de slang ba gang zhe na
'ad lta ste/ sdom ma gsum gyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pa dang/ byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pas sams can thams cad la byams shing dang ba dang/ sAng rje'i rjes su 'jug
pas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa la brtson pa dang/ dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba dang btang snyoms kyi rjes su 'jug pas sems
can Thams cad la ma 'tsho zhing rtag tu sems drang pa dang/ g.yo dang sgyu med pas phan pa'i drangos po 'a bsam par gyur pa dang/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa la lhag pa'i bsam ba
sbyor ba dang/ cung shes kyi sams kyis dran pa dang/ shes bzhin dang ldani ba dang/ sams shan tu dul bas sams las su rung ba dang/ dgang sla bas sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsungs pa'atshigs
dang ldan pa dang/ gso sla bas 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes pa dang/ bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud padi rang du 'dud pa dad/ nga rgyal med pas khed pa dang/ rtsod la rnam par song ba dang/ soms/
nges par soms pa na nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal rnam par slong ba dang/ rnyog pa med pas sems gsal ba dang/ bdag la mi stod pas bdag shes pa la 'jug pa dang/ gzhan la ma snyed pas sems can
rjes su bsrung ba dang/ sman gyi sems kyis chos la 'dus pa dang/ de'i don so sor myong bas chos don tu gnyer ba dang/ de la gzhol 'bab bab pas chos 'dod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa la
gnas pas chos la dga' ba dang/ chos ma yan ba rnam par slong bas chos yongs su tshol ba dang/ rtag tu ngo tshashes pas dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rgyun ma 'chad pa dang/ las kyi rnam par
smin pa la yid ches pas ma dag kha cha nas dud ya di la ma byed pa'i bya ba la 'jug ba dang/ dwang bas spyod lam smras pa dang/ khengs ba med pas mnyan pa dang/ zhi banas yongs su tshol bas rgod
u@#/// ba dang bral ba dang/ blo brtan pas soms las med pa dang/ rab tu ma g.yo bsu sems ra ded mtshungs ba dang/ rjes su 'chags ba dang khong khro ba dang bral bas sams sa
ka dngamatshungs ba dang/ bsal ba dag khas semasachudang mtshungs pa dang/ rlom sems med pas soms ma dang mtshungs pa dang/ gnas med pas sems rlung dang mtshungs pa dang/ shin tu dran
med pas sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'khrugs pa med pa'i phyir rab tu 'byung ba la gzhol ba dang/ lus dben pa'i phyir dkon pa la dga' ba dang/

sams dngan pa'i phyir chos la spyod pa dang/ de byed cing yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir tshig bden pa dang/ kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pa'i phyir ji skad smras ba de bzhin byed pa dang/ nyon mongs/
pas na brje ba'i phyir sems dpo' ba dang/ shin tu nyams pa med pa'i phyir bslab pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang/ kha na ma ko ba phra rab la yang 'jigs par lta ba'i phyir tshul khrims lhod pa

rgyu med pa dang/ skye bar smon pa med pa'i phyir tshul khrims skyon med pa dang/ gci'i tu dkar po spyod pa'i phyi'i tshul khrims skrun tshags ma yan pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag sbyang ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i/
'ashes gnyen la bstan pa dang/ mag yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'od gzer thogs pa med pa dang/ rna ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir sgra la klogs pa med pa dang/ sna yongs su dag pa'i phyir dri la thogs ]
ba med pa dang/ lce yongs su dag pa 'phyi'i ro la thogs pa med pa dang/ lus yongs su dag pa'i phyir reg bya la thogs pa med pa dang/ yid yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos la thogs pa med pa 'o//
blo gros rgya mtshogazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nam sdug pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyi'i 'dod chags kyi gdung bu dang khral ba yin/ byams pa shin tu bskyoms pa'i phyir zhe

stangag gdung ba dang bral ba yani/rten gyi 'brel par 'byung ba la shan tu brtags pa'i phyir gtamug gi gdung ba dang bral ba yin/ dbang bo rnams la shin tu brtags pa'i phyir sgrib pa dang bral ba yin/
stobs yongs su dag pa'i phyir sgrub pa yang dag par bsalo kha yani/ 'byung bar bya ba'i khams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ kun nas ldang ba bsal ba yani/ yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dod
pa dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ nga rgyal dang khral ba yin/ chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna med pa yin/ zang zang ga sbyin pa la kun tu'adzin pa'i sems med pa
yin: theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi bsam pa yin/ dbang bo sdus pa'i phyiranang rtse bar zhi ba yin/ skyon shan tu mkhod pa'i phyir phyi rol nye bar zhu ba yin/ sAg kha
thams cad m byed pa'i phyir 'khor bas skrag pa yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs pas ma ngoms pa'i phyir yadi yongs su ma skyo ba yin/ chu bo bzhi las bsal ba'i phyir chos kyi klu chen bo yang dag
par sbyar ba yani/ la rol tu 'gro ba 'khyer stags dang tham pa shan tu 'dus pa yin thad la shan tu gnas pa'i phyi'i 'das dang/ 'obs las rgal ba yin te/
blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ga tsha chos 'ad lta bu de dag gas dag pa dang/ yongs su dag pa dang/ sbyin pa 'phags pa dang/ tshul
khrims yongs su dag pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par sams bskyed pa rani po che de sbyong ba'o// de nas de'atsho bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
lus dang ngag rnams dang na yid bsdams shang// rnam par dag pa'i las lam bcu la slob// khyams pas sams can kun la yang dag blta// 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa 'a soms
sbyong yin// sAng rje ldan pas gzhan gyi bya bar brten/ dga' dang ldan pas chos la pha rol sbyor// btang snyoms ldan pas chos mchog 'tshe ba med// 'di na thems cad mkhyen pa'i
sems sbyong yin// rtag tu drang zhung g.yo ni rnam par spangs// gzhan la phan byed sdig pa rnam par sbyangs// lhag bsam dge ba ci yod rjes su 'jug/ 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i
sems sbyong yin// shes rab rab 'jug dran dang shes bzhin can// sems rab dul bas semasan las su rung// sbyangs pa'i yin tan rnams dong gso ba// 'di ni thams cad/
mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yani// 'phags rags chog shes pa dang tshig mnyen dang/ bla ma rnams la rtag tu 'dud byed dang// rtsod brdzun nga rgyal spangs dang stobs ldan dad// kharAs dad log
pa nam yang byed ma yin// sems na nges re nas mngon pa'i nga rgyal bral// rog pa med pa'i rab tu dang la gsal// bdag shes pa la rim gyis 'jug par byed// gzhan la ma khanas sams
can rjes su srung/ chos la gus par dga' zhing gus dang bcas// bsgrims te nyon mongs rnams na steng bar byed// chos don gnyer zhing chos la rtog par byed// rtag tu chos don gzhol zhing
'bab par khyed// chos la brtson zhing nyon mongs med par bsgoms// chos min sbyangs shing chos rnams yongs su tshol// dkon mchog gsum la dad ba ma khyod ldan// 'dan smams cad mkhyen
pa' sams sbyong yani// rtag tu mdzes dang ldan zhing nyes spyod ldeg/ de bzhin gshegs ba kun la ngo tshas sdom// khrel yodaldan zhing 'dir na dbang po bsdams// 'di ni shAms cad mkhyen pa'i
sems sbyong yani// rab tu sbyor bas las kyi bya bar 'jugo/ bag yod pas na mtha' gnyis 'dzan ma byed// mkhas pa rten ba'i tshis rnams rdzas rtogs pa// 'di na thams cad mkhyen
pa' sams sbyod yin/ spyod lam rgyas ni drang ba'i dngos dang ldan// khengs pa med pas rtag tu mnyen pa nyid// zhi gnas cho ga ldan pas rgod pa med// 'dan khrams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
na @#// sbyo[– ]pa/blo narab tu pa['' ? ]lhag mthong la na ri rgyal ji bzhin te// dam bcas brtan zhing bar skabs nyams pa med// 'di ni thams cad na kha ni
pa'is sa slong yin// sdug bsngal bad pas mi g.yo sa dang mtshungs/ bsan pa dag nges chu ltar dri ma 'khru// rtag tu rlomasamAs med pas ma dang mtshungs/ gnas med rgyu bas rtag tu/
rlung dang 'dra// shan tu dri na ni da nga sa mkha' mnyam sems// rab tu 'byung bas sangs rgyas bstan ba red/ lus na dben zhing na bas dgon par dga'// se nas dben pas ni chos kyi mchog
la spyod// dge ba bden pa ra sa dang yang dag sa// ji skad snyas pa de na de bzhin byed// nyon mongs mi lnga dug la dpa' bo mchog/ shan tu bslabs pas bslabs pa yang dag 'dzin// de la lced
pa nan yang yod ma yin// khe na ma gro chung la'ang rtag tu 'jigs// byang chub mchog rgyu'i tshul khrims nyams pa med// yon tan dkar spyod tshul khrims 'dus pa med// dge ba'i
kyi bshes gnyen bstan rang sdug pa sani// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems sogs bya phyir brtan// de ltar de ya tshog ni dri med kyis// 'jig rten kun la 'od zer mnyam par lta// mkhas
pa de ni sna tshogs glu gyes nas/ dag gamed rangs pa skyed sring zhumasaM pa nad// khro ldan de na sgra ya den rtogs byed// de la rje ba de ltar rnam dag nyid// sna yis dri dang lce yis ro
sa nga// lus kyis reg dang yid kyis chos rnams la// rig nas ma khengs na dud zhum pa med// de ltar de yi dbang bo dag pa nyid// chags pas mi chags smadabs sdang ba med//
ga ta nug ma stongs ma sdug gnas pa can// khyams la dga' zhung rkyen gyis chos sems pa// 'di na thams cad mkhyen pa'asams sbyod yin// sgrub pa lnga po dag gis bsgrubs pa med//
de ltar des ni dbang po lnga yad bsgoms// de ni gang du'ang bsgrib med bcangs pa'ang yod// stobs rnams lnga po dag la rab tu gnas// kun nas ldang ba shes shing khyang ba nyid// tshul bzhin
ma yan ngas gang tshul bzhin gnas// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bstun// yang dag myong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang bar ldan// byang chub yan lag len dang rtag tu ldan// brtan pa
de na yan lag brgyad la mchog/ de na 'dod dang sbrang dang 'jigs ma 'grod// gti mug bral zhing dbang po shani tu bsnams// chos kyi sbyin la de nasar sa med// slob dpon nam yang
chos 'chad na byed de// zang zade med par chos ni ston par byed// des na de la byang chub sems dag 'gyur// de ni khrid zing rnams la kun 'dzin med rnam sAn re med 'dod dgu gtong
bar byed// sbyin dang san dang don byed don 'thun pas// de na sems can brgya dag rab tu sdud// de yi byang chub sems na brjod ma 'gyur// theg pa dman la nam yang ri ba red/ ji lta
ji ltar sangs rgyas yon tan mthong// de lta de ltar de bas ra ra ba 'dra// nang na rab zha srid pa'i nyis pa mthong// de na che zhan gyi 'phrul la lta ma byed// 'dus byas/
nyes ba dag kyang shani tu mthong// 'khor bas 'jigs pas sdig pa rnams ma byed// legs spyod khur khyer bas na skyi ba med// zhing rnams sbyong bar 'dod pa nyams pa med// chos rnams
yongs su bzung bas zhum pa med// sems can thar byed rgyu la 'jigs pa med// chu bo bzhi lo dag las bsal ba'i phyir// de ni tshes glu yang dag sbyor bar byed// lus can mya ngan 'das
lam gzud pa'i phyir/ de na sogs dang zam ba 'cha' bar byed// 'dam las 'das shadi 'obs las rgal nas na// thang la gnas shad de dag 'jogis med gnas// 'jigs pas
g.yan po rnams la 'jigs med ston// bdag nyid rnal nas de dag gzhan yang sgrol// gang dag chos tshul 'ad dag rnam dag cad// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan kha 'a sgyur// de dag
byang chub sems mchog rnams dug sa// nyon mo des drams gzhar yang ges ma 'gyur// ji ste nam mkha' nyon mongs bya bar nus/ de la rjes kyang bstan par nus srid kyi// rang bzhin 'od
gsal rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems// den nam yang nyon mongs byar mi nus// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sams rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// bam po
gnyis ba// blo gros rgya mtsho thams cad mkhyen par sams bskyed cing rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa ni ji lta bu / kloms cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rani po che de'i gnod pa ni
gang zhe na// blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par sams bskyed pa rin po che de ltar bskyed nas/ 'phags pa ma yin pa tshul khrims 'chal
pa'asems can rnams bsam 3 bdud rnams sam/ bdud kyi res kyi lha rnams sam/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams sam/ bdud kyi pho nya rnams kyis gtsos sam/ rnam par
gtses sam/ bskyod dam kun tu bskyod dam// dkrugs sam kun tu dkrugs sam/ bsdogs bsam/ b.rogs kyang byang chub tu bsam pa'i sams bskyed pa de las mi phyed pa dang//
sems can thams cad rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i gong rje chen pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa las mi phyed pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs ma 'chad par bya bar brtson pa las ma byed pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba las ma phyed pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs/
bsogs pa las mi phyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su lhung bar sgrub par brtson pa 'a sa ma phud pa dang/ lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam bcas pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par mngon par
ubya// brtson pa las ma phyed pa dang/ sams can thams cad yongs su sAn bar bya ba la mngon par brtson zhing bdag bde ba la ma chags pa las ma phud pa sa/ de de ltar lhug pa'i
bsam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pas sems can thams cad kyis dpyad kyang bzod/ 'khrong slad byas ba dang/ sad pa dang/ gshang pa byas kyang bzod/ sams can nyams cad kyis skyes
sam bsags bsam/ ngan du brjod dam/ ngan du 'gro 'am/ ngan du sbas pa'i tshig gi lam yang bzod/ sams can thams cad kyi gnod pa yang bzod/ sams can bloms cad kyi khur
yang bzod/ sgrol bas kyang skyo ba med/ zhum pa med/ kun tu zhum pa mad/ spyang lug ba med/ mdi 'chad pa med kyi/ stobs che bar son par byed/ mthu skyod par byed ring brtson 'grus
rtsom la/ rtul bras rtul bar byed de/ spro ba skyed cing rmongs pa'i sems ma 'dzin to// de sus kyang slar ma gshe/ brdegs kyang slar ma rdug khros kyang slar ma khro/ 'khrugs kyang slar
ma 'khrug ste/ de ltar sems bgrang ba'i go cha gyon no// 'di lta ste/ thego pa chen po 'di ni 'jig rtanaThams cad dang ma mthun pa 'khrig pa'o// de pa'i phyir zhen/ sams can
de dag na rkyen gyi rjes su 'gro ba dag go/ bdag ni rgyun las ldog par rtsol bas 'dod pa'o// sems can de dgan phan tshun ma 'khrun pa dag ko/ bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi mo maskrun pa/
mgrong pa 'di phyi'i go cha bgos pa 'o// sems can de dag na gnod sems la dpa' ba dag go/ bdag ni bzod ba dang das pa yongs su tshol ba'o// san sa can de dag ni gcig la gcig longs su
'dradi par gnas pa dag go/ bdagu na shes rab kyis ngoms pa yongs su tshol ba'o// gal te sems can de dag phyogs bcu'i ba tu dbye bas rab tu phye ba ji sAd pa de dag thams cad ral gri dang/
mdung thung dud mda' bo che la go na thogs te/ bdag gi phyi bzhin 'byung yang sa phyogs gang du 'agleng ngam/ 'dug gam/ 'chag 'og ma/ nyal yang rung ste/ byang chub kyi sems/
skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ snyan pa'isams sam/ tshul khrims kyi sems sam/ bzod du 'a sams sam/ brtson 'grus kyi sems sam/ bsam gtan gyi sams sam/ shes
rob kyi sems sam/ thos pa 'a de ba'i rtsa pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der/ de bdag lus rgya shug ga'i ma'i bcu tsam du gtubs sam/ rnam par gtor ram/
rnam par bcom mam/ sams can de dag thams cad las gzhun ma byed par rgyun tu sa sha 'am/ bsdogs sam/ smod dam/ gzhung ngan tshig ngan pa dang/ ngag rtsub po sa ba de ltar
gyur kyang/ bdag gis sems can 'ga' la yang 'khrug pa'i sams bskyed par mkhya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon gyi mak+ka'anas 'khor batshad med par byas te// gang du bdag gis lus
[n ]/'dasams can dmyal bar song ngam/ dud 'gro'i skyos gnas su song ngam/ gshin rje'a'ajig rten du song dam/ mar gyur kyang rung ste/ 'dod pa'i zas kyi drams/
drin can du gyur nas// chos thos pa dang ma ldan zhing ya nga ba'i 'tsho ba'i spyod yul don med bas 'tsho ba can du gyur to/ yan lag dang nying lag brgyar gshags shing tshugs te/ phyazhing phral
la khya ba rnam pa mang po byas kyang bdag gis bzhade las bdag gi don byas kyis gzhan gyi donam byas pa'i ) gal te sems can de dag thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mthar bdag gi lus gshags
tho gtubs/ rnam par gtor rnam par bcom pa de lta bu r gyur kyang bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi gtong ngo// sems can thams cad yongs su gtong do// dge
ba'achos la 'dun pa yongs su mi gtong ngo// de ma'i phyir zhan ) lus gtub pa'i lus kyi gnod pa 'di thams cad nasems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi brgya'i char yang nyabar ma 'gro ba
nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do// bdagan sams can dmyal bar gnas par spro'i ) bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gtad par n mi bya'o// sems can thams cad rab tuthar par
bya ba la dmigs pa'i sIng rje chen po mi gtong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs te/ dge ba la na bar chad mang ngo// mi dge ba'i phyogs lan grogs byedapa
mang ngo// dag pa'i phyogs la ni grogs byed pa nyung ngo zhes gsungs pas bdag gis mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs mi bya'i ) dag pa'i phyogs kyi grogs bya'o// sam ba can thams cad la
bzod pa/ra bya'i gnod sems su ma bya'o// sems can de dag la gang yod pa de ma byin yang bdag la gang yod pa de bdag gis sbyin par byasta/ sems can de dag la gnodago mas dang/ khrob/
dang 8 'khon tu 'dzin pa yod pa de dag de rnams kyis ma byin yang bdag la bzod pa dang des pa gang yod pa de bdag gis sbyin par bya'o// bdag gis bzod pa'i stobs bstan par bya'o ]/
gnod sems ni ma yin no snyam mo// blo gros rgya mtsholus dang srog 'dor ba'abyung chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nod par
dka' ba ma yin no// gang gi gzhi las gnod sems 'byung ba'i chos de bdag gis sbyangs par bya'o snyam mo// chos de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus la dga' ba dang/ lus la gnas
pa dang ) lus la chags pa ste/ lus btang na gnod sems kyang gtong ngo// blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar bgrang ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dba' sams dpa'achen po ni sems can thams
cad kyi gnod pa bzodade/ mi skyo ma khro'o/ )da gnod pa gsum bzod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyi gnod pa dang ) ngag ga gnod pa dang ) sems kyi gnod pa'o
gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa bzod pa gang zhen/ gang yan lag dang nyid lag rnams bcad kyang chos la rtonato/ gang de 'alus la rtsod pa'i
sams can de nyid 'a lta ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yodas su rdzo gas par 'gyur ro//
blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltaran thabs la mkhas pa'abyung chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgoms pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhen/ gang lus 'dor ba dang/ lus
yongs su gtong pa dang/ lus la mi lta ba 'di ni di'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang lus gcod pa na sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa dang/ tshor ba rnams kyis mi
'phrogs pa 'dan di'atshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang lus yongs su gcod pa na gang dag de'i lus gcod pa de dag nyid rab tu thar da ra bya ba'i phyir bzod cing sams kyis rmam phyin te/
brjod pa'i stobs nyobar ston pa 'dani de'abazod pa 'pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'dun pa mi 'dor zhing ) sams kyi stobs bskyed pa yad rag tu
'dzin la// 'khor ba nyid du mtshams kyang sbyor zhing dge ba'i rtsa nga btsan pa yang rtsom pa 'di ni/ de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang lus rnam par 'thor ban thams cad makhyen
) pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po ched ma brjod cing byang chub nyid la lta ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ rab tu zhu ba la so sor rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ )gang lus gcod pa na lus/
la rtswa dang/ rtsig pa dang/ shing dang ) rdo dang/ mag mor lta bu r so sor rtog cing lus la sgyu ma'i tshes nyid du 'jug pa dang/ yang dag par na ma rtag pa nyid dang/ yang dag par n sdug bsngal/

ba nyid dang/ yang dag pa rin bdag med pa nyid dang/ yang dag par na zhib nyid du lus la rtog pa 'di ni de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// blo gros rgyamatsho de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang
chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pan parol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing theg pa chen po de las nyams par mi 'gyur te/ 'di na byungachub sems dpa'i lus kyi gnod pa
bzod pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gi gnod pa yongs su bzod pa gang zhe na/ gangangan tu brjod pa'i tshig thams cad dang du len pa dang/ gshe ba dang/
bsdigs pa dang/ snyad pa dang/ ngashungab dang/ sdigs mo byed pa thams cad badrod ba dang/ yodapa 'am mad pas/ grongs kyang mi khro ba dang/ bon du ma 'dzin pa dang/ bag la
nyal ba sbyong ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho dil thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo ngan du rjod pa dang/ dan du stsa ba'i tshig gi lam dang/ gshe ba dang/ bsdogs pa
tug/ dag b.rol las thos nas// pha rol tun pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzo gas par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar na thabs la mkhas ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
ngan du brjod pa dang/ don du smras pa'i tshig gi lamard/ gshe ba dang/ bsdigs pa dag pha rol la sa thogon/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rasgom pa yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyurazhen/ blo
gros rgya mtsho'adi la byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po ngan du brjod pa dang/ ngan du sla ba'i tshig gi lam dang gshe ba dang/ bsdigs ba dag pa rol las thosan/ dran pa 'ad/
lta bu rab tu thob ste/ soms can 'din sngon nas ser sna can du gyur pa 'jungs pa lta/ sorasna'i dri mas kun tu bskor ba des gang dag de'i gnod sems kyi drim spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa'i
dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ma bstan gyis bar ma byas/ bsnyen bkuram byas pa'o// bdag ni gtong ba lamos shing ser sna mdapar bya/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen la bsten par bya/
bstan par bya brnyen bkur bya'o snyam ste/ denang ga bsrung zhing gnod nas kyang sbyong ba 'dini) de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang de 'dasnyam du sems te/ sems can
'dane tshul khrims 'chal ba las ma mthong ba ste/ denabadagal gshe zhing bsdigs pa'o// bdag ni tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa las mi nyams par bya'o// gnod
sams tshe da nga ra bya'o// byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsrung bar bya'o// las kyi rnam pa sna smin pa la brtan par bya'o// snyam pa 'don deb tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang
de 'di gam du soms te/ sems can 'dane zhe sdang gi shas che zhing gnod sems mang ba ste/ de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdags pa'o// bdag ni bzod pa'astobs mang du byas te/ byan sa pa la
gnas par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni de' babrod pa'i pha ro'i tu phyin pa'o// gzhan yang de 'ad snyam du sems te/ sems can 'dani la'acan dag pa'i chos dang phral paste/ de na bdag la gshe zhang nyasdigs
ba'o: bdagan brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btsal bar brtson pa la mi ngoms par bu sta/ sems can 'di byang chub kyisIng por sngar nge 'jug par byas la phyis bdag

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa ra'atshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du de ltar go cha gyonab 'dani de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin nga 'o// gzhan yang de 'dagam du sems te/
sams can 'dan brjed ngas pa/ shes bzhin med pa/ 3nyon mongs pa des par ma bsams pa ste/ rin bdag la gshe zhing bsdogs pa'o// bdaganyon mongs pa nges par bsams par bya dran pa
dang shes bzhan can du bya/ rtse gcig tu byang chub kyi sems ma brjed par bya ba ste// sems can thams cad ma dul ba/ ma zhi ba/ ma sbas pa nyo b.ram zhi ba 'di lta bu dag gi don tu//
bdag gis gocha chen po bgos te/ 'daltar sems nges par sems su gzhug go snyam pa 'di dag ni bsam gtan gyi b.rol tu phyin pa'o// ngo zhan yang de 'di snyam du/
sams te/ sems can 'dinishes rab 'chal pa/ bdag tu smra ba/ sems can du lta bar dmags pa'i spyod yul ba sto/ de ni bdag la gshe zhing bsdags pa'o// bdag ni chos nyid la bston
par bya'o sAm ste/ 'di la gshe ba dang/ khro ba su yin zhes des yongs su tshol ba na gangagashi ba dang khro ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bdag dang gzhan mi dam be sa bar lta ba dang bral bar

bgrod pa 'di ni ri'apishis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// blo gros rgya ra tsho de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa 'byang chub sems dpa' ldan du rtsod pa dang/ ngan du sbas pa'i tshug gi lam dang 3 gshe ba dang/
lhe smAsdigs pa dag pha rol las khro nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing theg pa chen po de las kyang mi nyams te/ 'dan u0fb1nga chub sems dpa'i ngag gnod pa brjod
nga 'o blo gros rgyu mtsho de la byang chung se na sa dang 'as mas kyi gnod ba ngarjod pa gang zhe na/ gang bdud thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems de las phral yang ma g.yo ba dang pas
kyi rgol ba dmigs par lta ba la mngonapar zhenapa thams cad kyis yang dag pa'i bsam par zhugs pa ) thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de las mos pa bzlog kyang ma brjod pa dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi gzugs su 'dug kyang ma mnyam pa dang mnyam nga 'i sems de las nyams par byed mi nus te/ bdung rdzu 'phrul rab tu chen po dag gis khyod kyis theg pa chen po yang dag par bsgrub par mi nus kyis//
khyodakyis gces par du ba 'di thod shage/ khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'da'od cig/ byang chub rnyed par dka' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams norId par dka' bste/ 'dir 'khor ba sdug bsngal mang/
du myong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa de dag ni bde ba yin byas skyes bu dam pa khyod myur du mya ngan las 'das par gyis shig ces de'i sems bsgul zhing/ sems dran par byed
la blo gros rgya mtsho gal te byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po la de ltar bralabar byed/ ngeltar mos pa bzlos nga la byang kyang/ sngon gyi go cham 'dor zhung bsam pa rnam par 'khrugs
par mibyingaskya ) de'adi snyam du sems te/ ngadag gis nges par byang chub kyi sAngapa gnon par bya/ bdag gis nges par bdud dpung dang bcas par ngam par byas te/ blan med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'abyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ bdag gis nges par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar tu/ bdag gis nges par stod gsum gyi stod chen po'eg
rtan gyi khams su chos kyi gtam chen po brjod par bya/ bdag gis sems can thams cad mgron tu gnyer la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par bya'o/ sangasargyus dang/ byadachub sems dpa'/
wa0 @#// thams cad dang/ bdag dang gzhan gyi sams rig pa'i lha rnams kyis byang chub tubasam pa rig gas/ bdag gis thams cad mkhyen ba'asams kyi gnod pa/
bzod par bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams dang/ lha rnams dang/ sems can thams cad dang bdag la bslu bar mi bya'o snyam ba de dag lta bu n/ blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa'i
sems kyi gnod pa bzod cing theg pa chen po de las ma byed pa ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di ni thams cad mkhyen por sems bskyed pa ni po che de'i gnod pa bzod ba'o// bzod pa'i pha rol
'i tu phyin pa'i cha gang yin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gong ba med pa gang yin pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnyis yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
sems kyi gnod pa bzod pa'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// byang chub lam las bsam ba ma byed cing/ de nasnying rje
las kyang khyod ma yin// bdag gis dkon mchog gsum po bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas chos rnams yang dag bsgrub par bya// sum cu rtsa gnyis khyada'aphags mtshan dang dpe byang bzang//
gang dag gisan stobs bcu rnams kyi lus mdzes pa// de dag yongs su btsal phyir mchod sbyin bya ba byed// gnod pa shin tu rnam mang bzodacing yon tan phyug/ brgya phrag mtha' yas zhing
[/ ]rnamam de dag bdag gis sbyang// rin chen chos mchog 'don bdag gis bsrung bar bya// brgya phrag mtha' yas sems can de dag bdag gis dgrol// des na gnod pa bzod cing bgan pa ma 1
phyodado/ phyogs bcu'ams can khamasanamatha' yas jisAdang// thams cad 'dus par gyur nas lag na mtshon thogs te/ de dag del 'jig byed gshe zhing sdegs byed kyang// yon tan
byang n sdigs dang 'phyo ba brjod par byed/ )sdon mtha' bskal pa brgya brag mtha' yas ja snyad par/ de dag rgyun ma 'chad par tshig rtsupha mas kyang n// bdag nyid chen po de brjod ma khro gshe ba
mad: tade ltar rtogs pa rnams na gnod pa dag par 'gyur// soms can de dag lag na mtshon glogs lhan tsug tu// bdag gi lus kyi yan lag dum du dum bur gtubs// 'on kyang bdag gi
sems yid nam yang khro bar mi bya ste// byang chub yid la byas na gnod 'di dag par 'gyur// 'brong ngam 'dug gam 'chag gam 'on te nyal yang rung// gang du byang chub sems mchog 'di dag
sbyin pa dang/ 'dul ba'isoms dang gzhan yang dkar sems ma 'dor ba// der ni de'alus dum bu dum burarnam par gtor/ )soms dmyal dud 'gro'i skyo gnas la dogs 'jig rtenamar//
bskal pa brgya phrag mtha' yas don med lus kyang gtungs/ ) sangs rgyas a shes mngon par 'dod pas lus 'dar zhes// rgyas bu des ni yod kyang ya ngadag tshim par byed// ma a sdug
bsdal rgyun rnam pa du ma dag/ mtshams med sdug bsngal brgya char chu bar ma 'gro ba'// dmyal b rnams su bskal ba brgyaran gnas par spro/ rgya' ba dang nachos dang
sems can mi gtong ngo// bdag lus m rtag rang du ma thub rgyu ma 'dra// khams bzhi de dag gdug pa'isprul dang 'dra bar gsung// bdag gis lus bor byas te dubakod 'gyur bar bya// nyon
go ngag dug zhi nas na rang byung sangs rgyas 'gyur// srid gsum 'jig rten 'di ni lus bder 'gyur ba'i gzhi// 'dodaba' zasargyu cung zad ji snyad 'jigs pa ste// bdag gis lus btang
'jigs pa med par 'gyur bar bya// bgrang ba 'di la zhugs pa de dag gnod pa bzod// nag po'i phyogs la grogasanabargya stong phrag kyang mang// dkar po'i phyogasan gang la'ang grogs
mad gcig pur 'gyur// bdag ni mi dge rnams dang rtsod par ma bya ste/ sangs rgyas brjod pa gsungs pas bzod ba padag gi grogs// phyogs bcu'i gos rgyas de dag 'di ni bdag gi dpang/
ji ltar sangs rgyas sku la sems ni ma phyudade// sangs rgyas dang ni bdag nyid che lha bdag gi grogs// gnod pa bzod par bya la sdang bar mi bya'o// gnod pa lus dang ngag yade rnam pa gsum du
gsungs// gang bzod dpa' bo de nani khyod brjod pa yin// lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa mtha' yas yod pa dag/ gal te lus la bzod pa lus gnododag par 'gyur// lus n dum bu
dum bur gtubs te rnam ga tor tshe// thabs ldan che ba'i bdag nyid ba rol phyin rdzogs 'gyur// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus ragam gtan dang ) shes rab khyad 'phags/
dam pa skad cig tsam gyis 'dzin// lus dang lus 'a bsregs pa'i nyon mongs rnams kyang 'dod// sbyin dang rab tuldan pa' ba rol rgyun bar 'gyur// byams pas 'jig rten khyab byed tshul
khrims nyams ma 'gyur// byang chub rjes su 'gro bas tshul khrims dag pa 'dzin// bzod pa'astobs skyed yan laga rnams dang nying lag gcod// de yang de yi bzod pa'i pha rol phyin la
sbyor[}]brtson 'grus gces pa ma zhum par skabs sgyid lug med// lus na rnam par 'thor zhing brtson 'grus pa gol 'gro// byang chub sems kyi bsam pa dran pa mi 'dor zhing// nyon
mongs mun pa'i rdul rnams bsal phyir rab tu brtson/ lus bshaganas ni bsam gtan stobs dang rnam par thob// 'di yod rdul bral bsam gtan pha rol phyin la sbyor// bdag gi lus n
bdag med rmi lam glog dang 'dra// 'di la byed pa po mad tshor ba de yang med// lus kyi gawangs pas bcings pa'i sems can bdag gas dgrol// shes rab 'di ni khyad 'phags pa rol phyin
pa mchog/ gang zhig 'di la sbyor zhing tshul bzhani chosasams la// lus kyi gnod pa bzod tsang rab sdang ma byed cing// mi snyan pa dang smad dang gshung ba'i tshig thos kyang// don snang mi 'gyur
byams ldan sems kyang dul/ tha bar ba tu zhe sdang bor 'di sbyin pa dag/ byams pa'i yid du gyur ba 'di ni tshul khrims dag/ bzodapa'astobs 'gyur 'don bzod pa
dag pa yin// sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod nas brtson 'grus bur zhang skyod// soms dang yid rab zhib 'dage bsam gtanadag/ sgraskad ma reda'adamishes rab dag pa yin// ma yi tshig thosanas
na gang chog 'di sems pa// de 'di'i gnod bzod ngag gi skyon la chags pa med// bdud dang mu stags can gyi lta gyur brgyastong gis// gnas 'dasams can)dang kas sbyor ba 'ong brjod kyang//
kaM mi skrag zhum pa mdacade phyi phyir mthu spyad de// mkhas pa de na gnod dang sems gnod mtha' yas bzod// gang zhig bzodadang bgon 'grus rab gnas ra'i ba 'dra// sams can kun nang dpa' bo de
'di'i gnod pa bzod// stobs bcu rnams kyi sbyang ba dang na gnodashes nas// byang chub rjes su 'gro bas phye nas lung ston to// blo gros rgya mtsho de la thams cad mkhyenabarasems bskyed pa
zhi po che de'i 'bags pa gang zhe na blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo/ thams cad makhyen bar sems bskyod pa ni bo che des rlom sems su/
med de/ thams cad mkhyenaba'i sems de la rten par ma byed ) gnas bar ma byed ) lenabar ma byed/ 'dor bar ma byed/ sngos pa mkhyod/ rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par
[}]ma khyod kyi/ rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi ba la gnas pa ani te/ de chos zab mo rnams la blos rnam par rabod do// chos zab mo dag gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ rtanang 'brel
par 'byung ba'i lugs su 'byung ba dang/ rgyu la dmigs pa bod duchud pa dang/ rtag pa ma yin pa dang/ chad pa ma yin pa dang/ mthal lta ba dang bral ba dang/ rang bzhan gyis pad/
mad pa dang/ bdag ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyidimadabo dang/ gdod ma nas ma skyed pa dang/ ma byung ba dang/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa la yid chesapa
dang smon pa med pa la som nyimid pa dang/ mngon bar 'du byed ba med pa la de kho na'i bro dang ldan pa dang/ shin tu mo rtag pa nyid dang/ gzugs dbu ba dang mtshungs pa nyid dang/ tshor bachu bur

dang 'dra ba nyid dang/ 'du shes smaka dang mtshungs pa ste gnyis su med pa nyid dang/ 'du byed rnams la chu shing dang mtshungs par so sor rtog pa dang/ rnam par shes pa sgyum lta bu 'achos nyid dang
khams rnams g.yo ba mdapa nyid dang/ skye mched rnams phanatshun du shes pa mod ba nyid dang ) soms gnas pa med pa dang/ nga rgyal yid lamakhyadapa dang/ lhag par byed pa lhag par mi byed pa dang/
mnyamab nyid la mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang/ thams cad tha dad du bya ba mad pa dang/ rogatsug dang/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam la rab tu gnas pa dang/ lam gyatshogs shes pa yongs su
tshol ba dang/ ngas ba'i don la rton pa dang/ don gyi rjes su zhugs pa'i blo dang/ skad thams cad l skad med par 'jug pa dang/ sgra thams cad la sngon gyi mtha' dang/
phyi ma'amatha' yongs su chad bar shes pa dang don dang tshig 'bru gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa shes pas don brjod tu med par rtogs pa dang/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ dar 'dzan pa
mdapa dang/ kun 'byung ba shes pa shin tu zad pa dang/ 'gog pa shesapasgro btags pa med pa dang/ lam shes pa 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa dang/ lus
! la zhugs pa'i dran pa sngon gyi mtha'adad phyi ma'am thara'apho ba med pa dang/ tsho ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa skye ba dang ) 'jig par mi gnas pa dang/ sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa/
tshe ramags pa la shin tubartags pa dang/ chos la zhugs pa'i dran ba// chos kyi dbyings dbyangs ma yin pa dang/ yang dag pa'i sbyong ba ma nyam nges ma nyam pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
pa sems la dbang sgyur bar gyur ba dang/ dadapa'adabang po chags pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyidabang bo dben bas nges bar 'byung ba dang/ dran pa'i dbang
po dran pa med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bo yod la khyod ba med pa dang/ shes rab kyi dbang bo spros pa las shin tu 'das pa dang/ dad pa 'astobs gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang/ brtson
'grus kyi stobs dmigs pa rtogs pa mad pa dang/ dran pa'i stobs nyams pa med ba dang ldan pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs sems nges par sems par gyur pa dang/ shes rab kyi stobs
ma'akhrugs pa 'irgyu 'thun pa dang/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dran pa med cing brjod pa med pa dang/ chosarnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagachos thamasacad mnyam pa//
nyid du 'jug pa dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag len pa med cing 'dor ba med pa dang/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dba' rlabs med pa dang rab tu sbyangs pa
yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag rus dang sems la zhugs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagamanyam pa nyid bod du chud bdang/ btangasnyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gnyis
dang bral bdang/ yang dag pa'i lta ba lta ba thams cad spangs pa dang yang dag nga 'a rtog pa rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ yongs su rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/ yang dag
ba'i ngag sgra skad thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dad/ yang dag pa'a'i sa kyi mtha' lus dang sems kyashes dang bral ba dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba tshol ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa dang/ yang
dag ba'i rtsol ba 'dag pa medatsang 'jog pachodapa dang/ angadag pa'i dran pa dag pa dang ma dge ba'irnam par rig pa la ma 'jug pa dang/ lang dag pa'itid de 'dzin sams kyi dmigs ba mnyam pa nyid la
'jug ba dang/ zhapa zhi gnas kyi mthar song ba dang/ lag mthong lta bsarnam par dag pa dang/ skyo khamed ba'i donamirtag ba dang/ gdod ma nas skya ba med pa'idon sdug/
bsngal gyi don dang/ rgyus med pa'i don bdag med pa'i don dang/ nye bar zhi ba'i don zhi ba'i don dang/ dul bas sbyin pa dang/ bsal ba'i dngos por gyur ba'i tshul khrims dang/ zad pa'i chos dang
ldan pa'i bzod pa dad/ shin tu rnam par bya ba rnam par 'byed pa'i brtson 'grus dang ) nang nye bar zhi ba'i bsam gtan dang/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'amtshan nyid kyi shes rab
dang sems can gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i byams pa dang/ namamakha'adang mtshungs nga 'isnying rje dang/ dga' ba med pa'i dga' ba dang/ rtsod pa thams cad rgyun gcod ba'i btang snyoms
dang chos thams cad 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang sngon gyi mtha' nas stong pa dang/ phyi ma'i mthar dban pa dang/ da ltar byung ba na bdag med pa'o// blo gros

rgyamatsho de ltar gang chos zab mo rgyun ma 'chad pa// tshig 'bru dang bral ba nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'di lta bu 'di dgartogs pa dang khong du chud pa dang/ 'jug pa shes pa la dpyod pa dang/ sams
pa dang ) 'jal ba dang ) 'grang ba dang/ nye bar rtog pa dang/ nan tan byed pa 2da na thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyod pa rani bon de 'bags pa'o// de ltarathams cad mkhyen par
sams bskyed pa rin po che de phegasan ) chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ban lhun gyis grub panyid du thob par 'gyur ro/ dablo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dparan/ zla ba dang nyim
gzhal med khang lhun gyis grub par rnam par rgyu zhing/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du snang bar byed kyang/ lha'i bu nyim dang zla ba 'disnyam du bdag cag 'gro ba 'am 'on teldog gam dumasams par
sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas de dag 'gro'o// blo gros rgya mtsho bzhin du rab tu rigs ba'i shes pa dang ldan ba'abyang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po yang lhun

gyis grub bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dgan sems can gyi don byed kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' de yang mngon par 'du byed pa med par byang de dag kun tu ston to// blo gros rgyamatsho de la byang chub
sems dpa'i 'bigs pa shes gang na ba de nangasan gtan gyi nga rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bar yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de ci'iphyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dang 'a
mnyam par gzhagonalhag mthong gis chos rnams mthong ga mnyam bar ma gzhag pas ni ma yin no// de'i lhag mthong gang yin pa de shesar ba ste/ shes rab des mngon sum du'agyur ro/ gang
du mngon sum du 'gyur zhe na/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid la mngon sum du 'gyur ro// chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid gangazhen/ mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi de las kar ta ma
spyod pa'o// chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste rnam par rig pa chos rnams kyi mtshananyid kyi gzhi'o// rnam par rig pa de'i

yang dag par ji lta ba'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa denachos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshananyid cas bya'o// gang gi tsho tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad par gyur bde'atshosnang bor yang ma byed ) mi snang bar

angami byed do// de la snang ba na gang ma snang ba ni gang zhen/ snang ba zhes byang na skye ba'o// mi snang ba zhes bya ba na 'gag pa'o// gang gi tshe snang bar yang mi byed/ masnyad bar yang mi byedapa
de tsho skyabar yang ma byod/ 'as ga par yang ma byed de// gang gi tshe skyo bar yang ma byed/ 'gag par yang ma byadapa de'i tsho chos nyid la gnas pa yin te/ chos kyi dbyangs 'khrugs par ma
khyod : de bzhin nyid las ma g.yo/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig par mkhyod do// de la chos kyi debyangs zhes bya ba nirtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba rjes su rtogs pa'o// de bzhin nyidi na de kho na'i
mtshan nyid khong du chud pa'o/ yang dag pa'amatha'an gnyis su med pa'i yang dag pa mngon par rtogs pa'o// blo gros rgya mtshod ltar mngon sum du shes pa rig pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pon shin tu phigs pa shes pa zhes bya'o// sbyangs pa da nga ) gnod pa dang/ ngas nga ra'abigs pa'i le'u 'ad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'atsho/ lha dung ma'i skye dgu'i srog
ba chags khrag khrig phrag bcuganyis kyis bran mad pa yod dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chud du so mas bskyed do// srog chags khri drug stong gis bkrod ba rab tu thob par gyur to// de nas de'i
tshangacom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos kun nges par rtogs pa yi// byang chub sems na sgrogs par byed// de tshe nges rtogs nyi shes kyis// chos rnams kun
la chags pa med// zab mo'i chos rnams khong du chud// mkhas pa skrag par 'gyur bamed/ gag mod kun tu 'jigs med bas// khyad par 'phags bar 'gyur ba yin// rgyu la dmigs pa'i
tshul gyis ni// brtan pa'i chos rnams khong du chud// shes rab ldan de rjes 'jun byed// mthar lta ba ni ma 'dzin to// rtag pa dang ni chad pa la// blo ni thogs pa yod ma yin// yang dag
mtha'an bsam yas pa'adi/ dbu ma'i mtha'an rtogs par 'gyur// bdag gamatha' ma rang bzhin gyis// chos rnams bdag med ngo bo de// chos kun de yi rang bzhin te// gdod nas ma
skyas 'gag pa med/skyes pa mdacing 'acung bshad// stong pa gzung med dri ma med/ mtshan ma med cing spros pa med// nam mkha'adang na'atshungs shing 'dra// de dag soms kyi mi smyon bar//
'dod cing chags pa med par spangs// gzugs kyi rang bzhin mngon sum du// lbu ba lta bu r rab tu shes// tshorang chu bur 'drab sta// 'du shes smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid do// 'du byed chu shing snying
po 'dra// rnam nga rangashes pa sgyu ma 'dra// khams bzhi gso ba redu ba ste// nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i 'gas tshun no// gang dag sku mched thams cad na// khems
po phan tshun spyod yul lo// sems nanangan ma yin te// phyi rol tu yang ma dmigs so/ de la'ang nga yi yod ma yin// rnam par shes pa gnas pa med// chos rnams yid la ma byed de//
lhag bar byed pa rnam par sbyong/ chos rnams tham sa cad mnyam nyid du// yang dag nyid du khong du chud// tha dad med cing no gnag ste// gcig du bgrod lam mnyam pa nyid// lam
gyi shes pa rab tu rtogs// nges pa'i don gyi don rnams mthong// bo na den gyi rjes su zhugs// skadan skad mod khong du chud// sgra rnams kun la sngon mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' mar los
su gcod// don dang tshig 'bru rnams la mkhas// chos rnams gnyis su med par rtogs// brjod du med pa'i don lan// 'di nyid yang dag khong du chud/ skyab mad par sdug bsngal shes//
u0fc4 kun 'adrud nga la mnyam pa'i blo// 'gog pa shes pa zad par bstan// lam shes pa na 'dus ma byas// lus dang tshor ba sems dang na2 chos la chos su rjes su rtogs// dran med yid la byed
med pa'i// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ston// chos kyi dbyang san dbyanges ma/nupar/ ar dag nyid ni mnyam pas mnyam// spong bas spang du mad pa ni// yang dag sdong ba rab tu brtan// sams
la dbang na thob pa yi// rdzu 'a phrul rkad pa rab tu bstan// chags pa kun las rab 'das pa/// de na ded pa'i dbang po yin// chos rnams thams cad rnam dban pa/ bden brtson 'grus dbang
po yin// dran pa med pa'i dran 'jug pa// den dran pa'i dbang po yin// chos rnams yid la ma byedapa// da na ting 'dzin dbang po yin// spros las shin tu rab 'das pa// den shes rab
dang nga ngo yin// yang dag nyid ni rtogs nas de// gzhan gyi dad pas 'gro ma yin/ 1 de nas na g.yo ba yod ma nang dad pa'i stobasan 'di'adra'o// yang dag shes las nyams pa mad/dran
pa'i stobs na'adi 'dra'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs mdzod ni/ nges par sems la dga' ba yin// mi rtog rnam par rtog pa// shes rab stobs na 'di 'dra'o// chos rnams rtogs pa'i
don du na// byang chub 'an lag rab tu bstan// mnyam ste ma mnyamamad pa'i chos// yang dag lta yin zhes brjod// gnyis med chos la sgom pa ni// rgya la med pa'i lam sgom yin//
skya ba med pa ma rtag don// 'byung ba med pa sdug bsngal don// rgyu ba mad pa bdag med don// 'a don nye bar zhi bar gnas// dul ba'i sems ni sngon pa yin// zhi ba'asemasanal
khrims ldan// zadang 'chos rtogs brjod pa yin// brtson 'grusarnam par phya bas rtogs/ de shin tu zhi ba bsam gtand/ shes rab yang dag rab nas nga// sems can gdod/
[2gi ])nas rnam dag don// byams pa zhes ni brjod pa yin// snying rje nam mkha' 'dra ba ste// dga' ba sbyong ba dga' ba na// rtsom pa thams cad rgyun chad pa// btang
sAms shes narang du bstan// 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa na// chos rnams thams cad nab tu shes// chos rnams nges par 'big 'di ni// lta ba'i mdud pa gcod pa yin/ de bas ma
gtan shes rab gang yin pa// der ni rtes par 'bigs pa dastan// tshad med pa la 'jug pa na// chog shes pa zhes brjod pa yin// gnod pa bzod pa dang nges par 'bigs pa'ale'u staganyas/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub samangs dang 'bams dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa// blo gros rgya ma tsho de ltar na gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa dang/ yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bsam pa bcos ma ma yin zhing/ sems can thams cad kyis gnod par byas kyang zhis 'gras pa mad la shin tu nges par
phags pa'i ye shes su gyur rungashes rab rnam par gdon mi za ba thog pa de'i tsho/ shin tu dkar ba drimamadapa'aphyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzani rtsa ba'aganas la rab tu gnas pa yin no// de la
ti de 'dzin 'di'i rtsa ba'i gnas gang zhen ) 'di lta ste/ goms can thams cad la zhe sdang med pa'i snying rje chen po'o// de sems can thams cad kyis bsti bstang du byas kyang khongs par mi 'gyur

tsa sems can thams cad kyi bstare stod du ma byas kyang btudang ma 'gyur ro// khongs pa med pa dang 'dud nga ma da ba de shes pa las nges par khyud ba yin gyis/ da rgyal las nges par byung nga nam la//
khengs ba med pa dang/ 'dud pa med pa de ni chos dang ldan pa yin gyi/ gti mug dang ldan pa ma yin no// chos thams cad shes pa 'gas nges par byung ngas thengashes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang
ldan ba yin/ gshes sngon du 'gro ba'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa man/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin te/ de lus sam/ ngag gam yid kyi las gang byed kyang/ de thams
cad shes sngon du 'gro zhing/ yashes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo// de la byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba gang zhin ) gong gzugs kyi las kun tu bstan pas
semasacan rnams yongs su smin par byed/ 'dul bar byed do// spyod lam ji lta bu s sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu nyid du de'i spyod lam lhun gyis srung rung yongs su ma brtags pa/
med par kun tu gnas so// lus kyi gyonadang ) lus la chags pa dang lus kyi tshul 'chos pa dang/ lus kyi 'khrugs pa dang/ lus kyi longs su rtog pa gang yin pa de dag byang chub sems
dpa' des yang dag par ngartsom pa yin te/ shang ta la'amago bcad pa bzhin du rtsa ba nas chad nas ma 'ongs pa na mi skya ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro// de lus longs su dag pa yin te/ lus mtshan gyis/
legs par brgyan pa dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa 'jam zhing mnyenab dad/ bsod nams kyi rgyu thun pa'i lus shin tu rnam drub dang/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang/ man
lagadang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang gzugs kyis rgyags shing dregs pa med pa yin te )lus che ba'otshul dang ldan pa ma yin no// de chos 'dzanipa nye bar bzung nas sems can
jitsam du dman rang gzugs ma tshang ba rnams la yang 'dudador ba tu 'dud do// rang galus kyi chos nyid kyise sams can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos mnyam pa nyid du shes pa la 'jug go/ de lus la lus
kyi chos rnyed shas nas chos kyi lus yin gyi/ zang zing gi lus ma yin no// de la chos kyi lus gang zhen/ gang bsam gtan gyi zas za ba yin gyi/ zangasring ga zas za ba ma yin te/ 'jig
rtonadang 'thunapar bya ba dang so mas can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'i/ lus nyam chung ba'aphyi'i nam yin no// de chos kyi lus su gyuranas/ chos kyis srog 'tsho'i/ zang zing gis srog 'tsho
pan ma yin no// de la chos kyis srog 'tsho ba gang zhen/ gang gi srog gi phyir yadabya ba ma yin pa ma byed pa dang/ 'phagasaba'atshul las mi 'da' ba'o// de la 'phags pa rnams kyi tshul gang
[विक ]/'di lta ste/ chags pamed pa dang/ sdang ba mdapa dang/ rmos pa med pa dang 3 nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang/ ji ltar bslabapa bcas pa bzhin du kun tu
[/ ]bsrung ba dang/ sdud pa dang/ rab tu gnas pa 'dini'aphags ba rnams kyi tshul zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dang 'al shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang ldan pas ma ngen par shes ba

dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stongs thams cad dang ldan pa yin te/ de lhun gyis grungapar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du snang bar byed cungasangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can de dgan gzugs dang mtshan
dad gzi brjid dang rgyan rnams ci 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de'i yang lhun gyis rgyur cing yongs su brtags pa med par de 'dra dar gnas so// de'od bkod pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin te/ de

gang gang gi tshe lus las 'od rab tu gtong pa de'atsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grungs ma da dpag tu mad nga rnams snang bas khyang par byed do// de'i 'od de na bde ba skyodapa sto ) sems can dmyal ba pa
nganasong ba'isoms can thams cad bde bar byed pa'o// de'a'od de na ba dang la reg par byed pa sta nyon mongs pas gdungs pa'i sems can thams cad rab tu zhabar byed pa'o// de'i 'od de rab tu
sim par byed pas ) sems can rnams lus dang sems dga' ba skyed pa'o// de lus nyid kyi sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed de ) 'dano byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi
las yashes sngonadu 'gro ba'o// blo gros rgya mtsho de la byang chub sems dpa'i ngag gis las shashes sngon du 'gro ba gang zhen/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'ad la byang chub sems dpa'an tshig 'khrul
ba'i skyon thams cad sngas par ngag gis las 'byung ngo// blo gros rgya mtsho de la tsha 'khrul pa'i skyon de dag gang zhin/ blogros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa 'an/
