dang zhag bdun du bshad kyang mthar phyin pa radashad par ma spyod de/ khyod kyis dge ba'atshogs de tsam du tshad med pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i du dpal gyi gzi brjid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ de'atsho 'dzu ba mdzad do// 'dazhe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i
chos nyid de/ de nas de'i mod la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ btsod ka dang/ shel dang
dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag phyung ngo// 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang ba chen pos khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags
te[？ ]3 ma dang zla ba gnyis kyi gzi brjod dang/ 'od kyang mog mog por byas nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu/
nub par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcage tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs to// bcom ldan
'das ga lab der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ dartsom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshags su bdud ngas zhus pa/ bde gshegs bsod nams brgyas sbas sku mnga' ba/
mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan dpa' sku: zla ba lta bu r dra mid dag pa'i la/ rgya yi slad du 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad// bcom ldan dri chad dra ma gsum bral ba// tha kha ma mtha' rnam
dag pad+ma'i spyan// lha dang lham yin dang klus mchod pa/ ru yi slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan tshems snyoms thags bzangs dkar bar ldan// stobs bcu mnga' zhade dra
bsung bda' ba'i zhal// rga dang 'chi ba mthar thug mdzad pa po// ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// nam mkha' dkyil ltar dri ma mad pa'i thugs// mgon po thugs kyi dgra zun
mnyam snyoms pa// thugs na ri bo lta bu r ma g.yo ba// bcom ldan 'dzum pa'i don 'dare dka' stsalagasol// bcom ldan tshangs pa 'a sgra skad sgrogs pa po/// ma
'am na dang ka la bde ka dang/ rna sgra lta bu r snyan cang dga' ba dang/ mnyen por gsungs ba 'dzum pa'athabs gsungs shag/ 'dren pa thogs pa med pa'i blo mnga' ba// dus gsum 'gro
ba'i spyod dang mos pa dang// dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen pa po// ci yi sad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan smanaba'i rgyal po ma rnams dang// lha klu rnams kyi nad na zhi mdzad
pa[：]bcom ldan gtan du bde ba ston pa po/// rtswa yi slad du 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// yon tan mnga' ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ lha dang mi rnams khrag khrig nyan cing mchis/ gros
na yid ni rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing// thams cad makhyen pa'i dgongs pa brgyad par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang ! bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'ad skad/
ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis klu'i rgyal po'i ru dpal gyi gzi brjid nga' mdunan 'duganas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub tu sems/
bskyod pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo dpal gyagatra brjod 'di ne// bskal pa grangs
mad pa phrag brgyad brgyan/ bskal pa kun tu lta ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cang brtan par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ces bya bar 'gyur te )'ag rten du
'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo dpal gyi gzi brjid 'dan/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa don yod bar spyod cing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad mad pa mnyes par byas te
mchod par byas nas/ rab tu 'byung ste/ tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// sams can tshad mad pa yang theg pa gsum gyis yongs su sman par byed do/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs
pa mthong ba don yod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing brtan pa de yang 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang lo lags pa dang/ nyams dga' bar 'gyur la 3 skya bo mang po
dar lha dang mi rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur te/ dper na 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyis nye bar spyad pa dang/ longs spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de na ma rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//
de ngazhan gshegs pa de 'a tshe'atshad kyang lo khri thub par 'gyur ro// de'anyen thos kyi dag 'dun ni bye ba phrag drug cu yod do// byang chub sems dar 'dag 'dun na 'bum phrag bcu gnyis 'du bar
'gyur ro// kun dga' go de bzhan gshegs pa mthong ba don yod de sems canagang dag gamig sngar snang ba de dag kyang mtho nga ba'i mod la ) byams pa rnam pa'i tang de 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//
kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod ni/ mthong ba'amod la sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// de la nyan thos kyi thig ba par 'gyur ba gang dag
yin pa de dgan/ dad po mthong bas rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis mthong bas na lan tsag phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// lan gsum mthong pas na phyir ma/
rgyu 'ong ba' 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// lan bzhugathod bsanangeg bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thig pa par 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dgan/ de bzhin gshegs
pa mthong ba don yod de mthong ba'i mod kho na la ma skyo ba'achos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag cing brtan pa na/ sams can su yang
tshul khrims nyams pa 'am/ lta ba nyams pa 'am/ cho ga nyams pa 'am/ 'tsho ba nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid du nges par 'gyur ro// samasacan de//
nas sha 'phos pa su yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar ma 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad lha dang ma rnams kyanang du skye bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur ro/
de nas klu'argyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gza brjod kyis/ bdag nyid lung bstan pa thob nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te ) rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yidi
bde ba skyes te// mu tig gi dra banor bu rin po che 'bum gyis spras pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol nas/ sor mo bcu' thal mo sbyar te mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das la tshul
dang 'thun pa'atshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa// mi dbang zla ba dri med 'od kyi zhal/ gzi brjid mtha' yas lha dang mas mchod pa mtshungs med stobs ldan mtha' las
shugs nang sha ba// ye shes tshad ma ma chas la mgos phyag 'tshal// phan par mdzad pa'i yo shes tshad ma mchis// de bzhin shes rab 'od kyang bsam ma thub/ tshul khrims dramad
rab brtan rnam par dag/ ma dang nga mkha' dkyil 'dra la phyag 'tshal la/ ]bskal pa dar/ga tu med pa mtha' yas par/ spyod pa spyang nas sangs rgyas ye shes brnyes/ des na 'gro
ba'i spyod pa rang tu mkhyen// de bzhin de dag dbang po bsam pa mkhyen// 'jig rten nga com ldan gazugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// de phyir 'gro bas lta ba chog ma 'tshal/ re yi nyonamos
skya bar mi 'gyur zhing// de tshe nyon mongs thams cad rab tu zha ]/ka la ping+ka khu byug ma 'am ni// de bzhin tshangs pa'i sgra dang lha min sgra// phyogs bcu dgan yid 'ong sgra de dag// bad/
gshegs gsung gcig gisan wal gyis mnan/ mkha' las zla ba sa la ltung ya nga gda'/ rgya mtsho bskams shing la rab b.rAl yang gda'// sa la gnam lhung dum bu brgyar 'gyuragad2/
ka @#// rgyal ba'i bka' na gzhan du yongs ma 'gyur/ bden pa' brtul zhugs rab 'brel ston pas 'dar// sangs rgyas ye shes gtso bos bdag lung bstan// bdagan rgyal/
bar rang byung yon gnas 'gyur// bdag la yid gnyis som nye dogs ma mchis// phyogs bcu dag tu rin chen legs spras pa// bya ba mtha' yas 'dren pa rnams la phul// byang chub
sems gcig bskyod pa gang lags la// bsod nams snga mas 'di yi char ma phod// gang zhig byang chub sems mchog bskyod par bgyid// den sangs rgyas mchod pa mchog tu 'phags//
gang zhig 'dren rnams tshul 'di ma gcod nga// den stobs bcu ku'u gyi bka'adren bzo// klu'i rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid des// tshigs su bcad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'dasmras pa na/
srog chags khros bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ de dag gas tshag 'daskad du gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba mthong ba don yod des/
( byang chub brnyes pa de' tsho/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das de dang phrad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dgacade brtan pa der skye bar gyur nug/ de bzhin gshes pa de 'dem pa'i chos
yongs su 'dzin cing mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur yang bgyid par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das de'i 'og tu bdag cag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur tsag rtses kyang smras so//
bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhade dar skya par 'du bstan to// lud pa stan pa' le 'as lnga pa'o////
de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse ba dang/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang/
skye bo mang po la bad pa dang/ 'jig rtan la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ rgya mtsho chen por sang gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho
chon po'i nang na lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ de ma lags pa yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag mas te/
da dag gis de bzhan gshegs pa mthong ba na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dag skyed par 'gyur la dam pa'atshos thos pas kyang 'khor ba thog ma ma mchis pa'amatha' rtogs par 'gyur ba dang/
bdag gi kru' rgyal po rigs gnas kyang yongs su longs spyod par 'gyur te/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jag rtan gyis brnyas par ma 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
che ba nyade bstan par 'gyur ba dang ) bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs dang ldan pa'i chos lta dar brtan pa bgyis par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho
thugs brtse ba dang/ sams can tshad med pa dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir gnang/
kyis gnang bar gnas/ tshim zhing mgu la yarangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba rgyas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun
du bskor ba byas te/ dpung dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das kyi thadan ma snang bar gyur te/ rgyu mtsho chen po'i nang du phyir song ngo/ de nas der skya bo'i
tshogs 'dus pa thams cad la 'ad skad ces smras so// bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sang gdugs tshod gsol par skrun drangs te/ des kyang bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyiregand
gas der khyed kun gyi kyang snyan cag tu 'thun pa dang/ yang dag par dga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ bsnyan bkur la brtson pa gyis shig
kyi de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog dang/ sim byed dang thag bzangs ris la sbas pa// grogs po dag shes par
gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen po 'dir gshegs kyis/ der khyed 'khor dang bcas pa rnams cad/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod ba'i las bya ba'aphyir bdag gis skabs
phye ba lags kyae/ bdag gi gnas su spyon cig/ de nas klu'i rgya la bo rgya mtshos de klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang/ kha dogam thar sa pa dang/ dus med pa dang 'od can
dang/ rnam par rtse ba dang/ bkod pa dang/ lag na rdo rje dang ! brjod bya dang/ kha dog thams cad ston pa dang/ tsan dan gyi rnam pa dang/ de la sogs pa'i klu yi rgyal po 'bum phrag
du ma la smras pa// grogs po dag khyed cag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ bdag ga gnas su spyon nug
denas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos gzhon nu dpal gyi gabla brjid la bsgo ba/ bzhan bzangs khyod song la kru'argyal po ma dros pa 'dar pa la ma go bos phyal la/ da' 'phrin 'di skad
gyis shig/ bdag ga pha 'a nadi nas/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bshos gsol gyas ) rgya mtsho chen por spyon cig/ ces bgyis shig/ legs so
zhes byas te/ mnyananas ji skad bsgo ba bzhan du/ ku'argyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis byas so// de nas klu 'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ klu'i rgyal po shugs drag
la sbas pa// shugs drag khyod song la/ rarab kyi stang du song ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ ta dga' gnyis kyang bos shag/ lha rnams kyi dbang bo brgya byin la yang deb zhin gshegs
de la mchod pa dang/ bstan bkur brgya yas rgya mtsho chen por bdag gi gnas su spyon cigaces gyis shig denas klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtshos ji skad bsgo ba
bzhan du klu'i shugs drag/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ te dga' gnyis dang/ lha rnams kyi dbad po brgya byin gyi thad du song nas/ ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du bosaso// dems
klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rang gi gnas su 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa/ bo cha ru sngon po dag pa dang/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar las byas pa bshams te/ rin po che du mas na spras rin po
che'i dra bas na khebs pa/ra byas ) dral bu g.yer ka'i dra ban dpyangs/ dar gyi lda ldang nad bon btags/ bar na bris/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan nabasgrung/ rgya mtsho'i sposakya mchog
gse na bdugs/ ma tog sna tshogs na bkram sta/ 'khor gyi khyams yangs shing rgya che ba de 'a nang du/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi gang ga'i 'bad du dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ rin po che
cho rnams cad kyis spras pa/ lhardzas kyi ras bracos bu rnam pa snatshogs du ma mang po bting ba/ blar bres pa/ zhi bo che sna bdun gyi stegs bus bskor ba// rin po che'adre bas khebs pa/
la bu g.yar ka'adra ba dbyas pa/ dar gyi lda ldi btags pas brgyan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhig bshams so// dag slong ga dge 'dun thams cad kyi gdan/
yang ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhan du bshams so// ro brgyas bskos pa'i zhal zas dag kyang bshams te/ thams cad legs par zin bar 'gas nas/ bu dang/ ga ten 'dabo dang/
'khor dang bcas te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim la 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la gdugs tshod dbab pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'ad deg gsol to// chos kyi dbang phyug
ye shes rgya chen khyad par b.ros// ye shes 'byung gnas mkha' 'dra ye shes mtha' yas pa// 'jig rten 'das pa spyan yangs dag ba' sbyin dang ldan/ ban pa mdzad pa gdugs
tshod bab kyi gshogs su gsol// tshangs pa'i gsung dang rnam par dag ldan dbyangs snyan pa// ka la bad+ma rda sgra bdud rtsi'i don ston pa// sman pa'i mchog sta nyon mongs sna tshogs/
chun sel ba// sams can rin chen gdugs tsho bab kyis gshegs su gsol// zha zhing rab zha thugs mnga' rtag tu zhu bar spyod/ rgyal ba grol ba lha dang mi rnams rab grol/
mdzad/ chu bo bzha las brgal ba 'gro ba sgrol ba po// pha rol gshegs pa bde spyin gdugs tshod dus la bab// sbyin dul yang dag sdom dgyes tshul khrims yongs su dag/ bzod pa'i/
stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus chen po brnyes// bsam gtan rnam thar dgyas pa shes rab yongs su rdzogs// zhal ras zla 'dra gdugs tshod bab kyis gshegs su gsol//
)lam mkhyen lam la mkhas shing ngan pa'i lam srang ngan pa spongs// byang chub yan lag dbang stobs bden pa bzhi ston pa// yang dag sdod dang rdzu 'phrul bzhi dadadran
dang ldan// thams cad zal gnon yon tan mnga' ba gdugs tshod bab// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshanamanga' bsod nams 'tshala rnamasabasod nams zhade chen bcom ldan 'das// mchod sbyin
dam pa bzhes pa' 'os lags yon gyi gnas// byams la dgyes pa gdugs tshod bab kyis gshegs su gsol// lhun po 'dra zhang sa dang mtshungs la sbyor ba snyoms// khyams sdang
ma mda' nam mkha' ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs// ma ye debad po khengs pa ma mnga' dman ma mang 2// stod dang rnam par thar la dgyes pa gdugs tshod bab// kun mkhyen kun la mkhas pa
dus dang cho ga mkhyen/ chos rnams 'byed la mkhas pa rtag tu dus bzhan ston// sams can bsam pa rab mkhyen don rig mkhyen dar ldan// chos kyi ngo bo nyid mkhyen gdugs tshod dus
ra ba// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos gdugs tshod phab pa de thugs su chud nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag klu'i rgyal
po rgya mtshos gdugs tshod phab kyis lhung bzed dang chos gos 'khong la sams can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su yongs su 'angs spyad pa 'khyer/ rgya mtsho chen por
'dong ngo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor// nyan thos kyis dag 'dun gyis na mdun du bdar// lha' tshogs kyis na zug byas/
lham yan gyi tshogs kyis na bstod de ) ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du stong gi bar snang la 'phags te gshegs nas 'od zer na 'gyed/ gangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams na snang bor mdzad/ pad+ma'i ra
na 'bangs/ sil snyan 'bum na sgrogs/ klu'i dbyangs 'buman grags par mdzad de/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram na dga' ba 'a tshal ltar nyams
dga' ba zhes bya ba 'a tsam pa ka' tshal ga la ba der gzhes so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ) bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ jacom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so// mchod pa byas nas gdugs tshod phab bo// de nas klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis bdag ga gnas su gshegs pa de na/ bdag gi rigs pa ma yin/ cham yin gyis/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 'a las cu pa'aphyir/ them skas
ji lta bu dag gso bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du gshegs pa de kho na lta bu'i them skas dag bun gyis brlabasal/ them skas de dag las bcom ldan
ka@#// 'das rgya mtsho chen por gshegs par bya gor ma chag snyamamo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram nas// rang ga gnas kyi bar du theg/
skas kyi rim pa gsum bshams te/ gdug na gsar las khyas/ gcig na cha rma las byas/ gcig na mu tig dmar bo las byas te/ zhi po che thamasacad kyis spras pa/ bkra ba/
nga lta na sdug pa dag bshams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i bud ngo sus kyadamag gis mi mthong ba dang/ sus kyang sems can dag la
gnod par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las kyad 'od gang gis rgya mtsho chen po snang bar gyur nas/ stong gsum gyi stong
chen po 'i 'jigarten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od 'gyed par mdzad do/ rgya mtsho chen po na sams can gnas pa gang yin pa de dag kyang 'od desarag pa tsam gyis/ byams pa'i
sems dang/ ban pa' sems dang/ sanyen pa'i sems dang/ bde ba'i sems su gyur te/ phyin chad su yang phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba med cing gnod pa byed pa med de// de dag thams
cad cig la gcig pha mar 'du shes par gyur to// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa 'a lha'i bu rnams kyang/ chos nyan pa dang/ klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi bkod pa
tha00blta bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang do// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ nyan thos chen po rnams dang/ brgya byin
dang tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dad/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen
po rnams dang/ mdang ma ma yin pa rnams / dga' ba'i tshal ltar nyams dga' ba'i tsam pa ka' tshal nas langs te/ klu'i rgyu ba po rgya mtshos them skas kyi rim pa bshams pa ga la ba der
dong ga lhagasanas ) them skas dbus ma lan bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// g.yas ro'an na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khod do// g.yon rol nan tan thos chen po rnams 'bod
do// mdun logs na na brgya byan bye ba phrag drug cu lag ba g.yas pas lam mtshon par byed do// tshangs pa bye ba drug cu na nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la ran po cha'i
gdugs rnams 'dzin to// lha bye ba phrag drug cun po rtsom ldan 'das kyi snam logasana'akhod de/ ma tog gi char 'bebs so/ 'dod ban spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams ni/ bcom ldan
'das la mchod pa'alas bu ba'i yi/ sil snyan bye ba phrag drag tu bkol bar bang do lA'i ba 'o de pa thag drag rtsa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bye'u la spos chu'i chag chag 'debs so//
na/ daklu'i bu mo bye ba phragacun nem mkha' dkyil na 'khod de/ ro stod khebs pa'i mu tig ga 'phreng ba dag 'phung bar byed do// ma 'amatsa bye ba phrag drugacun bcom
ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa/sa stod par byed do// dra za bye ba phrag drugacu na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na/ ma tor gyi 'phrang ba rnams 'khyud bar byed do// lha ma ni
bye ba phrag drug cu na ras bcos bu kha dog sna tshogs stong gas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'gangs par byed do// klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa gang 'khor bye ba khrag rgyu dang nam mkha' dkyilan 'bod
de: ma tog dang ) spos dang phyam dang/ byug pa dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan thams cad dang/ sa la snyan dang/ glu dbyangs dang/
phag rdob pa dang/ lha'i nga kod pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byed de/ de la sogs pa klu'i rgyal bo drug khri bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa' u0f7alas byed pa la zhugs so//
de bzhin gshags pa tshe dpag tu mad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba cananas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' mthu chen thob dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a 'khor mang po bye ba khrag khri phrag 'bum klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dga' bar bya ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa 'a las bya ba'i phyir
lhags so de dag gas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i bkod pa snga ma gang yin pa de mog mog po byed cing/ ma mngon pa byed pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so// de bzhin du bcom ldan//
'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzod dka' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jape/ rtenagyi khams 'od gzar can nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi tog dang/ 'od kyi dpal gnyis 'ongs so
nga tsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dga' nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po dang/ glang chen spos
kyi glang po gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'dasade bzhin gshegs pa nya zla' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed nas kyang/ byang chub sams dpa' sang ge dang/
sang ga' blo gros gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs da spyan bzangs kyi sadas rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi nyams migam 'dzum pa nas kyang/ byang chub sems dang 'i
ba la sgyur ba dang ( chos thams cad la dbang byed pa gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de nga zhan gshegs pa kun tu snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi nang 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can nas
kyang byang chub sems dang 'arin chen dkyil 'khor can dang/ rin chen rta la la gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jag rten gyi
khams dga' nga' snying po nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod dad/ rnam par gnon pa don yod gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa kun tu rnam par gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu lta ba nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' sngun gyi rgyal po dang/ chos kyi rgyal po gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das
de bzhanyegashegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyugargyal po' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mthong na dga' ba nas kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud ra ba tu 'joms pa dang/ brag 'dzoms
rgyal bo gnyis 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan nas/ byang chub soms dang 'a blo gros ra bgazhas dang
sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gnyis 'ongs so// de ltar phyogs bcunas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag khrig 'bum phrag bye ba mang po grubargyal bo rgya mtsho dga' bar bya ba dang/
de nga zhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'a'is bya ba' phyir lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang/ sangasargyus kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa chen po dang ) sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa/
ba'i/ chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sang ga'asgra chen pos/ phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing dad ga tu med ba dag 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gis go bar mdzad nas/ lha 'bum/
gyis sa'i snyan dang/ grub dbyangs len rung/ ma tog gachar 'babs la ) ngan song thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skya ba rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang/ yid bad
ba bsgrubs nas// snying rje chen po brtan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bkod pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa de lta bu s ) rin po che'i them skas de dag las
rgya mtsho chen por gshegs te/ de lta bu'i glu dbyangs len pa na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu mad par gsung gis gorar mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang// de bzhin gshegs
pa' byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na gnas pa 'a byang chub sems dpa'a rnams dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang ! 'jig rten skyong b rnams dang//
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra ze dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang ma ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegs pa mthong ngo// de nas lha'i bu mo dang/ klu'i bumo dang/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang//
nam mkha' ldang ga bu mo dang/ dri za' bu mo dad mi'am ca'adu mo dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo bya ba phrag 'bum dag gas sel snyan dang/ gru'adedudas len cing/
bcom ldan 'das mdun nas bsus/ de'atshargyud kyi sgra skad las 'byung ba'i tshigs su 8tsad pa khyad par du'aphags pa 'di dag gas bcon ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// sbyin pa las
byung tshul khrims mdzas dang ldan/ bzod pa'i stobs las byung ba byams pa bsgoms// brtson 'grus las byung don gyi rgya mtsho lags/ bsam gtan rnam thar dgyes pa khyod phyag 'tshal
shes ra ba 'od ldan dgos pa rnam par dag/ 'od dang gza brjod dpal gyi mngon par brgyan/ rnam par grol ba mngon sum ston mdzad pa/ rdub pa nyon mongs bsal la phyag 'tshal lo//
brtul zhugs shin tu rdzogs pa nga rtul zhugs mchog/ dka' bamathar phyin rtogs bar thugs su chud// mig na sbyin par mdzad cade mge sbyong ba// 'gro ba kun tu rgyu ba 'gro ba'i mchog/
don dam zabamo shin tu ston pa po// gzhan la phan pa zla med thugs su chud// chags pa med par tshig gi don ston pa// gzhan la phan pa zla med 'od mdzad pa// dus skabs mkhyen pa kun tu
ston pa po// rgol ba nganang 'tshogs kun rab 'joms pa// brtul zhugs yongs su rdzogs pa brtul zhugs nag/ bdud rtsa'i bde skyid bde ba sbyin/
mdzad pa// nam mkha' 'dra zhang dgongs pa dag pa ste/ dram kun sala rnam par 'dren pa bo// yon tan rgya mtsho bsod nams ma za da ba// rgya mtshor 'jug ba ye shes rgya mtshor ldan/ chos
kyi dbang phyug nyon mongs sal mdzad pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag sar snam mnga' ba// chos kyi rin chen nor mchog sbyin mdzad pa// chos mchog ye shes de nyid ston pa po// dga' ba ston pa bde
ba ston mdzad pa/ bag la nyal gyi tas pa sdong ba ston// ra yi dbang bo bzhin du ma g.yo ba// de bzhun gshegs pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// mi dang lha dang mkha' lding gsad du ba/
lha man srazhi bo ma 'am cu yi bdag klu rnams dang na grul bum gnod sbyin rnams // khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag kyang 'tshal// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan pa sta/ rab madzes/
dpe mad shin tu ston mdzad pa// gser gyi mdog can dpal ldan madog sdug pa// son mo zangs 'dra mdog sdug phyag mthil mnyam// ka la bda' gdangs can la mtshan gsung/ tshangs
ba lha dbar gdangs can gdangs kyi mchog gsung gis stong gsum so sor 'gangs par mdzad// 'jam mnyin gsung ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po dul zhing thugs kyang dul ba
sta/ zhal ras zla ba 'dra zhing spyan legs ba/ rtag tu bden pa gsung zhing mnyam par gzhag/ rtag tu chos 'dzin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rga nad sdug bsngal rab tu grol mdzad//
'gro ba' don mdzad nyon mongs sbyong mdzadab/ rgyal bar 'os pa bdud 'jomasargyal ba po// skya bzad pa de nyid ston mdzad pa// dgra bcom dgra yi tshogs rnams
'jom pa po// lha las 'das pa lha mang rnams kyis mchod// khyod ni rtag tu bzhas pa' 'os kyi mchog/ skye dgu kun mchog 'dren pa bzangs bo lags/
lha' bu mo dang/ klu'i bu mo dang/ lha ma yin dang/ ma 'amaci dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ lto 'phya chen po dang/ dri za'i bu mo de dgags/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
bcad pa 'di rnams kyis mngon par bstod nas// thams cad rtsig tu 'thun par gyur pas bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyang nas/ rang rang gi rgyan
rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mthar gyi rgya mtsho chen po gshegs te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gting ga dkyil gyi gnas/ klu'i rgyal po
tshu rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa ga la ba der gshegs nas/ sad ga' khri de la bzhugs so// dag slod gdag 'dun rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang stan ji ltar
bshams pa de dag la 'khod do/ de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ dge slong gdage 'dun dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams bzhugs pa rig
nas/ bu dang bcas/ chung ma dang bcas/ gnyen 'dab dang 'khor dang bcas pas/ rang ga lag gi zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa bsod pa mang pos tshan par byed cade/ ca nga zhedal/
stobs par byed do// tshim par byas shing ca bzhes pa stabs nas/ bshos gsol lags te/ sang sder rgyu ba dang/ phyag btabs par ge nas/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir klu'i rgyal po/
rgya mtsho'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen bo rnams dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/
'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang/ phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa' byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de tshogs te/ 'khod par thugs su chud nas/ bde ba dang dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba'i chos mnyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gar
sku las 'gyod par mdzad do/ 'od gzer de dag gis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/ srog chagasarab dang 'bring dang/ tha ma ja g+hadags pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
'dunan bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to/ bde ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas/ chos ma nyan pa la brod rung/ gus pa dang bcas pas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das

la 'dudachunge 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'baka' stsal pa/ klu'abadag po 'jig rten gnas ba 'don// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'argyal po rgya mtsho'abaka' stsal pa/ ) ka
las sna tshogs kyisabaskyod nas/ sems kyi dmanges pa sna tshogs kyis/ las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed de/ de'i 'gro ba yang rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur to/
kru' bdag po rgya mtsho chen po 'dan/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa dang/ tha mal pa ji snyad snang ba la ltos/ klu'i bdag po 'di deb thams cad na rang rang gsoms dang// dge ba dang
mi dge ba'i rtsa ba' lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las sna tshogs kyis sbyatshogs su byas pa dag go/ sams na gzugs med pa bstan tu med pa ste// klu'i bdag po de ltar na/ chos thams cad ni/
ngacos ma rnam par bsgrubs pas lta bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de/ bdag po med pa/ bdag ga med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// de dag ni las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du bsgrubs/
ba sna tshogs su byas pa dag sta/ 'di la byed pa po gang yang med do// de ltar na/ chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do// klu'i bdag po de la mkhas
pas chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas/ dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba dag kho na mngon par 'du bya ste/ dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon
bar 'du byed pa de'i phung po dang/ skya mtshad rnam par bsgrubs nas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de dag mdzes shing gzugs bzang la blta na sdug pa mngon par/
'grub par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams bye ba phrag 'bum gyis/ ji ltar brgyan pa dang/ ji ltararnam par bsgrubs pa dang/ gang gis lha dang bcas/
pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing/ non par 'dug pa dang/ gang gis 'bum phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba'atshengs pa 'ad dag kyang mog mog po byed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la
blta ba na yang/ mag khral khrul du gyur pa la bltos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du dag gi lus l rgyan gzugs kyi mtshan rnams la bltos/ 'di dag thams cad ni
dge ba mngon par 'du byed pas mngon par 'du byas bas brgyan paM// rnam par bsgrubs pa dag go/ klu 'badag po khyod[©]bkod pa 'ad gangabasod nams las byung ba yin no// brgya byin dang/
tshangs pa dang 3 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po 'di rnams
kyi bkod pa 'di dag thams cad kyang bsod nams las byung ba dag go klubabadag ngo rgya mtsho chen po 'ad nagang dag lus sna tshogs gzugasamasdug cing dbyibasam legs pa dang/ lus rags
bka @#// shang che ba rnams dang/ gang dag lus phra zhang chung ba de dag thams cad kyang/ rang rang ga soms dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa bab lus dang/ dag dang/ yid kyi
las sna tshogs kyi sna tshogs su byard pa dag ste/ klu' bdag po de lta bsan khyod kyis las bdag gir bya ba dang/ las kyi rnam par sman pa la rten bar 'gyur ba de ltar slobs shigadang/ las bdag
gir bya ba dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa khyed dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dag la blo 'jug por 'gyur ro// lta ba chud gzon par byed par mi 'gyur ro// chad pa dang/ rtag par
lta ba la gnas par yang ma 'gyur ro// khyed kyis sbyin pa'i gnas mnyes par gyis shig/ mnyes par byas nas kyang thugs dbyung bar ma byed cig/ bkur sti'i rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba mngon
par 'du byed pas kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bkur sti'i gnas su 'gyurang gyis shig// bam po lnga pa/ klu'abadag po byang chub
soms dang 'a rnams kyi chos gcig gis ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bar skyo ba yang dag par gcod do// chos gcig po de gang zhe na/ 'ad ltaste/ bdag ji ltar gyur cing nyin mtshan rnams 'da'
zhud 'dug snyamadu// dag bab chosa rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/ de dag nga 'i chos la so sor rtog pa mang ngas mi dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi go skabs ma 'budado// de ma
za dge ba'i chos kyang to/ dge ba'i chos dang ldan pas/ bsam ba dge ba'i sems can 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyus rnams dang/ byang chub sems dba' rnams dang ) 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro//

klu'i bdag po de la dge ba'i chos de dag gang zhen/ dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ lhadang mi skya dga' phun sum tshogs pa'i rtsa ba'artan to// nyanathos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi
rtsa ba'i rtan to// blon mad par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub@#rtsa ba'i rtan to// rtsa ba'artan kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ dge ba bcub las kyi lamanams te/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste
srog gcod pa spong ba dang ma byin par len pa spong ba dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yomapa spong ba dang/ brdzun du smra ba stong ba dang/ phram grong ba dang/ ngag rtsub po spong ba dang/ tshig khyal pa
spong ba dang/ bsnabasams song ba dang/ gnod sems slong ba dang/ log par lta ba grong ba ste/ den rtsa ba'i rtan ces bya'o/ kru'abadag bod la srog gcod pa spangs ba'i smras bu gang zagan/
rab tu zhi bar byedaba' chos bcu thob ste/ bcu gabazhen/ 'ad lta ste/ des sems can thams cad la ma 'jigasar byin pa yin/ da'asams byams par dmages pa la bar gnas pa yin/
da'i zhe sdang ga bgachags yang dag par chad pa yin/ desand nyung bar 'gyur ba'i lam yongs su bzung ba yin/ des tsharang bar 'gyur ba'i sa bon btab pa yin/ da lam ma yin pa rnams kyang
srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbad par byed pa yin/ bde bar nyal zhing bde bar sad pa dang/ sdig pa'i rmi lamam rmib yin/ gnyid log pa na yang de la lha rnams bsrung
ba yin/ de la shar gnyir ba mad pa yan te/ de la shar gnyer ba'i bag la nyal ba mad pa yin/ ngan 'gro thams cad kyis ma 'jigs pa dang/ ga 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi
'jig rten du skyo ba yin te/ rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i tshes bcu po de dag thob bo// srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
bsdon/ des da byang chub thob pan/ tshe'i tshadasams kyi dbang du 'gyur ro/ klu'i bdag po ma byon par 'a na ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag na yod brtan pa'i chos lnga thob ste/ lnga gang zhe na/
longs spyod rlabar yang 'gyur la/ de' longs spyod de dag kyang rgyal po dang/ chom rkun dang/ chudang ma dang/ bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis ma 'phrogs pa yin/ spyi bo mang po'i
yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba yin 3 dogs pa mad pa yin/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su de'i bsngags pa brjod chung/ de la nga rol gyi gnod du sa 'jigs pa na da nga yin/ de'i soms spun
pa'i bgo bsha' la 'jig pa yin taM/ lnga po de dag go ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba de/ gal te blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de bzhin
gshegs pa ta nga'anyon mongs pa can ma yin pa' ya shes can du rang gis mngon par rtogs nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// kla'abadag po
'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa' rgyas bu gang zag na/ mkhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi thob ste/ bzhi gang zhe nA/ dbang po bsdams pa dang/ rgod pa las yang dag par 'das
pa dang 3 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsngags pa dang/ chung ma ma 'brog pa sgyu/ bzhi po de dag go/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa'adag ba'i rtsa ba de ga' te bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa ba byab chub tu yongs su gro na/ des de skyes bu chen po'i mtshanamadoms kyi sde ba sbubs su nub nga thob bo/ klu'i bdag po brdzun du stsa ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zagan/ lha dang mis
da sngags pa'i chos brgyad thob ste/ brgyad gangazhin/ ut+pala'i dri 'byung bas kha yongs su dag pa thob pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi tshad mar 'gyur ba dang/ lha dang ma dga' bas
dpang gcig pur 'gyur ba dang/ yang dgu pa bsam pa dang ldan pas dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sumatshogs pas/ lus dang ngag dang/ sams yongs su
dag par 'gyur ba dang/ tshig 'khrul pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang/ tshig bzung bar 'os pas ngag snyan par 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab thong pas lha dang rma ra skyes na/
bca// dbang gcig pur 'gyur ba yin te/ brgyad po de dag go/ brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'adegaba'i rtsa ba de gal to/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu longs su
sngon: des de bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig tu 'gyuraro/ klu'i bdag po'i phrom sangs ra'i skyes bu gang zagan/ ma khyad pa lta thob sto/ lnga gang zhen/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba dang
bral bas lus ma phud pa thob pa dang/ gzhan dag gi la chags pa med pas g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa thob pa dang/ las kyi rnam par sbyin pa mthong bas dud pa mi byed pa thob pa dang/ bsgrub pa
snying por byed pas chos las ma phud pa thob pa dang/ mi slu bas mdza' bshes mi phyad pa thob pa ste/ lnga po de dag go/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'aphyong chub
chu yongs su ston/ des de g.yog 'khor ma phyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ de' 'khor bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis
dbye bar mi nus so/ klu'i bdag po drag rtsub po spangs ba'i skyes bu gang zagan/ ngag yongs su dag pa brgyad thob la/ shi 'phos na yang lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyo bar 'gyur te/ brgyad
gang zhen/ 'ad lta ste/ ran pa'i tshig dang/ phan pa'i tshig dang/ rigs pa'i tshig dang/ 'jam pa'i tshig dang/ gzung ba'i tshog dang/ mnyan pa'i tshig dang/ skye bo mang po dga'
ba ba'i tshig dang/ mi smad pa'i tshig ste/ brgyad po de dag go/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te/ dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ des de tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi
gdangs can gyi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// klu'adzadag po tshig khyal pa spungs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ gcig tu nges pa gsum thob ste/ gsum gang zhen/ mkhris pa rnams
gcig tu nges par dga' ba dang/ lan legs par thon pas gcig tu nges par de'i blo bden pa la 'gro ba dang/ bcos ma ma yin pas gcig tu nges par lha dang mi'i bdag nyid chen po thob pa/
ste gsum po de dag go/ dag ba'artsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ des de khyad par lung ston cing gzhan du ma gsung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po bsnab sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zagan/ bdag po'i chos lnga thob ste/ lnga gang zhen/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pas/ lus dang ngag dang/ sams kyi
bdag po thob pa dang dgra thams cad kyis ma brje bas longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug rgya chen po' dedag po thob pa dang/ bsod nams la dbang byed pas/ de'asams nye bar spyod pa/
dang longs spyod rgya chen po rnams la 'jug pa dang/ phyis bkrab pa thob pas rgyal po bdog pos mchod pa dang/ sngon phrag dog med pas longs spyod ji ltar smon pa rnams 'bum 'gyur
@#// du khyad par du 'gyur ba thob pa ste/ lnga po de dag go/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de 'jigarten gsum
gyi mchod pa'ade bzhin gshags bston pa gcig pur 'gyur ro// klu'abadag po gnod sams sngangs pa'askyes bu gang zag ni/ yid bde bar byed pa'i chos brgyad thob ste/ brgyad gad
zhan ( de2 soms rnam par ma 'tsho ba la 'jug pa dang/ de' soms gnod sems rab tu zhabar 'jug pa dang/ de'i goms rtsod pa med cing ) 'thab pa med pa la 'jug pa dang/
de'isams 'jon pa dang/ mnyen pa dang/ des pa la 'jug pa dang/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa'aphyir/ 'bags pa'i spyi bos bkur ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bde
bal mngon par dga' ba'i phyir/ phan pa'i dngos po mang ba dang/ skye bo mang pos bkur ste bya ba'aphur mdzes pa dang/ sams 'jam zhing las su rung ba'aphyir/ da tshangs pa'i 'jig
rten du skye bar dka' ba med pa ste/ brgyad po de dag go/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs gu sngo na/ des de sems thogs pa mad pa'i
do bzhin gshags pa lta bas chog mi shes par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ yon tan gyi chos bcu thob sta/ bcu gang zhe na/ bsam pa dag
par 'gyur zhang grogs po dag ba red pa dang las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches te/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las ma byed pa dang/ ltar sangs rgyas 'dzin te/ gzhan ltar mi 'dzin/
pa dang/ dge mtshan dang/ bkra shis su 'dzin pa med pas lta ba drang ba dang/ grogs lha dang ma yin te// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten grogs ma yin pa dang/ bsod
nams 'bar bas khyab par du 'gro ba dang/ log pa thams cad med pas/ 'phags pa'i lam du zhugs pa dang/ 'jig tshogs la blta ba las bskyod de sdig pa'i lta ba thams cad dang
bral ba dang/ bsgribs pa med par mthong ba yin te/ yang dag par song/ yang dag par zhugs pa dang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na mi khom pa dang bral ba yin te/ bcu po de dag go/
log par lta ba spangs pa'i dge ba'artse ba de gal ta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ des de byang chub rdob pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon sum
du 'gyur zhing mngon par shes pa myur ba' de gal te bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// klu' bdag po de la srog gcod pa spangs pa 'byang chub sems lus sbyin pa byazhin ) longs spyod
che bar 'gyur zhang tshe range bar yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na yang ) gzhan gyis gnod par bya ba thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len
ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byinan/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhade/ longs spyod ma 'phrogs par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa
na[”]dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag bsgrub pas/ bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa'abyang chub sems dang sa spyin pa byinan/ longs spyod che bar
'gyur zhing/ chung ma mu g.yom par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na yang/ de' ma dang/ bu dang chung ma la su yang chags pa'asoms kyis blta bar mi 'gyur ro//
brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byanan/ longs spyod che bar yang 'gyur zhing longs spyod ma 'phrogs pa dang/ skur pa 'dangs ba med par 'gyur ba'i lam yongs su
! 'dzan bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang/ ji skod smras pa de bzhin du byed do/ dam bcas pa brtan par 'gyur ro// phra ma spangs ba'i byung chub sems dpas sbyan
rgyabyanan/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing/ gsog 'khor mi phud nga ra yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodabanayang/ bsam pa 'thun pas byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog 'khor
thob bo// ngag rtsub po spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing/ tshig btsun par 'gyural/ tshig sun dbyung du med par yang 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
ba dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na yang/ 'khor ma mgu bar su yang ma 'gro'i// tshigi sa khyal pa spungs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byinan/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing/ tshig mnyan da ra yang/
'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' spyad ba spyod pa na yang/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// brnab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na )longs spyod
che dbar 'gyur zhing ) longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa rgya chen po dag la/ de' sems 'jug par 'gyur ro/ byang chub gnas dang 'a spyad pa spyod pa na ang/ rgya chen po 'a mos shing/ dbad tshe
bar grags par 'gyur ro// gnod sams sangs pa de byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byinan/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur zhing 3 mdzes pa dang/ skye bo mang po dga' zhang yid du 'ong bar yang
'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang 1 blo thogs pa med cing/ sems thogs pa mad la dbang po ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro// log par lta ba spangs pa'i byang chub
sems dpas sbyin pa byinan/ longs spyod cho bar 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas la dad pa dang yang dag par lta ba'i khyim du skya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang/ sangs rgyas la
lta ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyan bkur byed pa dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// klu'abadag po dge ba bcu'alas kyi lam 'ad deg spyi bas
brgyanan/ de ltar mthu chazhade phan yon che la/ byin che zhade rgya che bar 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'alas kyi lam 'di dag khyed tshul khrims kyis brgyanan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad la// smon pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pas brgyan na mtshan dang/ dpe byad bzang po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung ga ge dngas yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson
'grus kyis brgyan na/ bdud phyir rgol ba 'joms pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthar phyin par 'gyur// bsam gtan gyis brgyanan/ dran pa dang blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang
ngo tsha shes pa dang/ brtan pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi brgyan na/ lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms da ra 'gyur ro// byams pas brgyanan/ sems can thams cad
dang zhe 'gras pa med par 'gyur ro// snying rjes brgyanan/ sams can thams cad yongs su ma gtong bar 'gyur ro// dga' bsaMbargyanan/ sams zhum pa med par 'gyur ro// btang
snyoms kyis brgyan na// rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba spongs par 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyanan/ sams can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa/
'bar gzhag pas brgyanan/ lus dang/ tshor ba dang sems dang/ chos la mkhas par 'gyuraro// yang dag par sdong bas brgyanan/ ma dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang/ dge ba'i
[% ]chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyan// lus dang sems mang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa brtan pa dang/ brtson 'grus/
brtan pa dang/ rmongs pa med pa dang/ soms las su rung ba dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// stobs kyis brgyanan/ ji ba med pa dang/ dgra dang 'khu ba thams cad nges
par 'joms par 'gyur ro/ byang chub kyi yan lag gis brgyanan chos thams cad yang dag ba ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyuraro// lam gyis brgyanan ) yang dag pa'i shes 'dren
par 'gyur ro// zha gnas kyis brgyanan/ nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// lhag mthong gis brgyan na/ chos thams rtsod yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par 'gyur/
thoms kyis brgyanan/ 'dus byas dad/ 'dus ma byas kyis bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu' dag po mdor na/ dag pa bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag kho nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzha yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po de lta bsan/ dge ba bcu'i
las kyi lam 'di dag rgyas par rnam par dag par dbye ba dang/ brgyan par brtson par bya'o// klu'i bdag po dbar na/ grong dang grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/
rgyal po2 pho brang thams cad dang/ rtswa dang shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ sharje thams cad dang/ las kyi mtha' thams cad dang/ sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang lo tog
thams cad skye zhing rmo ba dang/ shal bas bshal ba dang/ 'byung ba rnamasanas la gnas to/ de dag gaganas nas yin no// klu'i bdag po de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ad deg na/

lha dang mar skyo ba dang/ slob pa dang ma slob pa'i dag sbyong gi 'bras bu thob pa dad/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang ! byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams rud dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
kyi gnas yin no// dge ba bcu las kyi 'o ma la gnas pa zhes du ba'a'ade'u ste drug pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sgor 'jug pa gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sgrib pa' nongs pa rnams spong zhing/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad spangs nas kyang/ khyad par gyi gnas su mchipar
kyi 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgor 'jug pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'adedag po tshos gcig gis las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur to// chos gcig po gang zhen/ 'di
lta sta sdom pa la gnas pa sa pa byung ba 'chags pa ste/ gcig na nga yin no// kru' bdag po chos gnyis kyis las kyi sgrub pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te// gnyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ tshul bzhin du/

tshos la so sor rtog pa dang/ de ltar byung ba mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste de gnyis so// klu'i bdag po tshos gsum gyis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// rkyen gyi
chos la 'jug pa'i shes pa la so sor rtog pa dang/ ma gsar ma rnying ba'i chos la so sor rtog ra dang/ rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos rnams la so sor rtog pa ste/ gsum po dgago
klu'i bdag po chos bzhas las kyi sgrib brgyun chad par 'gyur te/ bzhwagang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ stong pa nyid la nges par soms pa dang mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang/ smon pa dang bral ba dang/
mngon par 'du byed pa med pa shes pa sta/ bzhi bo de dag go/ rgyu'i bdag po tshos lngas las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur tu/ lnga gang zhin/ 'ad lta ste/ bdag med pa nyid dang/ sems can
med pa nyid dang/ srog med pa nyid dang/ gang khrag med pa nyid dang/ gso ba mad ba nyid de/ lnga po do dug go/ klu'i bdag po chos drugags las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ drug
gang zhin/ 'ad lta ste/ mos pa dang/ yid ches pa dang/ gcig tu nges pa dang/ thetsom med pa dang/ yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pas las bya ba la 'jug
ba sta chos drug po de dag gis las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
na// ji ltar na byang chub sams dpa' khyad par du mchade lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// klu 'badag po chos bcu dang ldan n/ byang chung sems dang 'a khyad par du 'gro
bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ de la ma chags pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang/ thobs la ma khas pas brtson 'grus brtan pa dang/ soms can la lta zhing/
snyaderje cho nga dang/ bsod nams la chog ma shes pa dang// thos pa btsal ba la chog mi shes pa dang/ dag yod pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying po rjes su dran pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon/
sum du 'thob pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems kyi mi gtong ba ste// chos bcu po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltaran byang chub sams dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur pa la gas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha ma yin gyi dbang po chos brgyad dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhen ) 'di lta ste/
sgra gcan theg pa chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa'an nga rgyal med pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la 'dudabang/ mngon par 'dud pa dang/ bka' blo bde ba yin te/ 'thun par 'dzin pa
dang ji skad smras pa ba zhan byedapa dang/ bla ma rnams la nus pa skyes pa dang/ dge ba spyod pa thams cad la sngon du 'gro ba dang/ dge ba'i chos rnams la dam bcas pa brtan pa dang ) rgyu
chen bo la mos pa yin te/ spyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyin pa dang/ srog gi phyir ya nga ga zhan 'khrug bar ma byed pa dang/ gang du yang sems can 'jigs pa rnams la ma 'jigs pa sbyin zhing/
skyabs su 'od s pa'i sams can rnams yongs su mi gtong ba dang/ bsod nams dang/ yo shes thama' cad yongs su tshol ban/ chog ma shes pa sto/ chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan n/
byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad kyi mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/
bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan n/ byang nub sogs dpos lus che ba dang/ gzugs che ba nyid dang/ 'khor cher nyid dang/ sams chu ba de thog par 'gyur lags/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan chos bzhi dang ldanun/ byang chub sems dpas lus rtse ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'ad lta ste/ gzhan dag gi spyod lam
la ma 'phya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed du 'jug pa dang/ sems can bya ba dang 'thab pa rnams bsdums shing 'thun par bkod nas !
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzud pa dang/ sems can thams cad la dbang po zhe 'gras pa med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n byang chub
sams dang 'a 'us che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi dang ldan n/ byang chub sa nga gzugs che ba nyid thob ra 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ 'ad lta ste/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs
sbyin pa dang/ phangs pa'i dngos po thams rtsod yongs su gtong ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byams pa' mig gis blta ba dang/ gzhan byed bzhin dbrang po dag 'a/ phrag dog dang/ gser sna
mi byed pa sta/ chos bzhi po dedag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang sa gzugs che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// chos bzha dang lta/ byang chub sems dpas 'khor chab nyid thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi/
gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ phra ma 'tshog stong zhing gzhan gyi 'khor ma 'byod pa dang/ gzhan gyi 'khor la dga' ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems shin tu brtan pa dang/ gzhan dag byang chub la 'dzud pa ste/

zla lha ma yin gyi dbangapo chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dpas 'khor che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpas sems che ba nyid thob par 'gyur te/ gzhi

gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ bsam pa dag pa sta g.yo med pa dang/ sgyu can ma yin pa dang/ 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang/ bar ma der skye ba med pa dang/ rgya chen po la mos shing theg pa dman pa ma 'dod pa dang/

007 chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la 'jug pas/ chos zab mo'atshul la 'jug pa lta/ sgra gcan chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan n/ byang chub sems dang sa sams che ba nyid thob da ra 'gyur ro//
denas lha ma yin gyi debang ngo sgra gcan 'khor sum khri nyis stong dang bcas pa cham zhange 'bu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ rin po che' ma tog
ni po che thams cad kyis spras pa bal bcu tshad ngargyas bcom ldan 'das la gtor te/ dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'= chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas
mngon par bstodapa// phyogs bcu dgan somasacan khams rnams mtha' yas gang su dag/ skad cig thang cig yudatsam tsam la rgyal ba mchod byed dang// phyogs du cu dag na sems can gang dag bskal
pa 'bum du yang// mchod la brtson pa'i sems can dag ni bon po byed pa dang// byams dang bsod nams 'phags pa'i rang bzhin las byung mchod pa rnams / ji 'dra ba dang mtshungs shang/
mnyam pa ma lags khyod la 'os// mtshungs mar soms kyis yang dag gnasanas baspyod pa gang lags pa// de na stobs bcu ldan pa rnams la rjed dang mchod pa lags// bdag ni
byang chub ga 'gyur snyam ste de la sgrim gnas nas// bdagan g.yo mang byang chub mtshungs ma mchis la zhugs pa lags// mi dbang las gzhan srid gsum su yang bdag gi dbang ma mchis//
ma/
bdag gi bsam pa ci 'dra'adabangan stobs bcu ldan pa la gas// bdagan kun la shan tu sdug cing nga rgyal bsal ba dang// sbyin dang dul dang ldan zhing tshul khrims ldan la bzo
ldan dang// brtson 'grus dran pa ting 'dzin shes rab rnam dag gnas pa dang// byams dang snying rjer ldan zhang bden pa'i chos la spyod gyur mgi/ phan bzhed rgyal ba gal te bdag la lung stonamamadzad
kyang : ma yi dbang po bdagan rang gis rang la lung yang bstan// bdag narang byung ma 'gyur snyam du yid gnyis dogs ma mchis// de ltar bdag na bsam pa thag pas byang chub nyid sems nges//
mi dbang 'dzum pa mdzad nas zla ba'i tog gis zhus pa na// rang byung 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di ni colags lung bstan gsol// gang ga phye na ngasan dag pa 'a 'od rnams bstan mdzad pa// zla ba'i
tog khyod mnyan par gyis shes ston pas de la gsungs// lha min sgra gcan bdag nyid chen po byang chub mchog la zhugs// g.yog 'khor sun khri nyis stong gang lags rnams kyang de bzhin tu//
bskal pa stong phrag brgyar na byang chub spyod spyad nas/ )thams chud rjes su 'thunapar byang chub gtso bo thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba gang+gA'abyos snyad rnams la ni mchod brgyad de// des nasams can
0 rgyal por 'gyur// partson 'grus stobs dang ldan ta dbang po' rgyal mtshan zhes kyang bgyi// 'jig rten khams kyang dga' ba skyid pa'i bkod pa zhes bgyi ste// dga' ldan gnas dang 'dra bar 'byor cung
rgyas la lo skad legs// stobs bcu ldan gyi tshe na lo grangs bye ba bdur du ste// dag slong 'phags pa'i dge 'dun khrag bragadrug bcu tham par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun khrag khrig phrag

bcu brgyad cu ste// thos ba dang na 'dul ba 'dzin pa gzungs la shin tu gnas// bskal ba dgo ba bkod pa zhes bgyi mdzes pa de dag tu// sems can brgya stong dab/na byang chub nga kod ba bgyis nas kyang// 'di/
dag thams cad ram gyis byang chung mchog tu 'tshar ya da rgyu// byang chub sems mchog gin yon tan khyad par dag la ltos// der sgra gcan bzang pos lung bstan thos par gyur nas kyang// srog chags 'bum
brag bzhi dag byang chub mchog la zhugs dang ra gyur// legs par yon tan 'chad ba rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// stong gsum rab g.yos lhas kyang me tog char ni rab tu phab/
denas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas 'ad skad ces gsol// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni bdag ma mchis pa byed pa po ma mchis pa 'gasan/ lung bstan pa na gad 'a gas//
de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang lags/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// klu'i bdag po de de bzhan te/ chos thams cad ni bdag med pa
@#/ byed pa po med pa yin te/ de natshosa rnams kyi chos nyid yin modakyi/ 'on kyang byas pa so so' skya bo phyin ci log dang ldan pa dang/ dar 'dzan pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin ba gnas pa
rnams sems can med pa dag la sems can du 'du shos skyod par byed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams kyis snying rjechen po bskyod nas ) phyin ci log gi 'du shes song du gzhug pa dang/ dar 'dzin

blo pa dang ) nga mar 'dzin pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub tu go cha gyon par zad kyi/ skyes bu dam ba de dag gis sems can yod pa dang/ gang zag med pa ma shes ba ni ma yin te/ bdag dang/
sems can dang/ srog dang gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang gang zag tu lta babasams can de dag yongs su grol bar byedado/ klu'i bdag po khyod 'ad skad du 'di la lung bstan pa gang lags shos zer ba gang
in pa de la mngon sum du chos khong du chud pa na lung bstan pa'o// sams canamad pa dang/ gso bgad pa dang/ gang zag nad pa la nges par sems pasams dang ldan pa na lung bstan pa'o//
skyo ma byungab dang/ ma skyes pa dang/ rtsa ba med pa dang/ gnas med pa la gnas pa nAlung bstan pa'o/sems can thams cad mtshungs par bdag med pa la chos ban lung bstan pa'o// chos thams
cad mtshungs par chos daden par mdzod pa na lung bstan pa'o// zhing thams cad zhing du mtshungs par nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing dri ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa na lung bstan pa'o// chos thams cad

sangs rgyas kyi chos dang/ chos kyi dbyangs dngadabyer med pa'i yashesamathong ban lung bstan pa'o// bdud thams cad dang mtshungs par bdud kyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur te//
dad pazhan gyis yongs su dag pa 'a soms dang ldan pa na lud bstan pa'o// stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ legs 'don pa na lung bstan pa'o// klu'i bdag po/
de ltaran soms dang yid dang/ rnam par shes pam gnas pa lung bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du chosathams cad kyang de dang 'dra sta/ dmags su mad do// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyade ja lta ba bzhin du/
khong du chud pa na byang chub yin te/ da lan don dam par na gang gis lung bstan pa 'am// gang gis khyad chub bam gang lung bstan par bya ba 'am/ gang gis lung bstan pa 'am/ rtsis lung bstan pa ni
yang ma dmigs so// klu'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos thams cad na dngos po med pa ste/ rtsa ba nas yongs su chad pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa ste/ rgyu dang rkyen rnams las

'byung ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na gzung du med pa sto/ ngo bo nyade mad pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa 'a phyir ro// chos thams cad na de bstod med pa sgyu/ bral ba med pa 'a mtshan nyid yin pa' phyir ro//
chosaMthams cad ma 'ongs pa sta/ sngon gyi mtha' nas ma 'phos pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad chod par gyur pa ste/ phyi ma'i mthar mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni mi gnas pang ste/
gnas ma dmags pa 'a phyir ro// chos thams cad na ma dmigs pa ste/ byed pa med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na byed pa med pa ste/ lus med pa 'phyir ro// chos thams cad/
na lus mad pa lta/ gnas mad pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na gnas med pa sta/ rtan med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad n rten mad pa sta/ mi g.yo ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba ste//
ma gnas pa 'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na ma gnas pa lta/ bems po yin pa'aphyir ro// chos thams cad na bems po yin ta/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na ngo ba nyid med pa ste/

[“ ]rnam par rig pa ra ma byad pa 'phyir ro// chos thams cad na rnam par dag par ma byed pa ste/ sgro btagapa med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na sgro btags pa nod pa ste/ yid la byed pa med pa 'i pha ro//
chos thams cad na yid la byed pa med pa sto/ dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni dmags su med pa ste/ 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rtogs

pa med cing dpyod pa mad pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa ste/ zhi ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na zhi zhing rab tu zhi la nye bar zhi ba ste/ rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/

chos thams cad na rgyu las byung ba ma yin pa ste/ rang bzhin gyisarnam par grol ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad narangabazhin gyisarnam par grol ba ste/ rnam par grol ba 'amtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// chos

thams cad ni rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid de/ gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir ro// chos thams cad na gnyis dang bral ba ste/ bgrod pa gcig pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad n bgrod pa gzhug pa ste/ so so tha

dod pa dang bral ba'i phyiraro// chos thams cad na so so tha dad pa dang bral ba ste/ bye brag med pa'i phyiro// chos thams cad na bye brag mad pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid khong du chud nga 'a phyir ro// klu'i bdag po/

de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de la na lung bstan par bya ba dang/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba chu yang med do// klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po dang/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos ra 'a stobs la ltos// gang chos 'di lta bu dag la ming dang brdas rnam par phye nas/ sams can dag la go bar byed la/ sems can la ma gtogs pa'i
chos rnams kyang ma mthong/ chos ma gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyang ma mthong ngo// samasacan rnamasaji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// byang chub kyang de dang 'dra'o// sangs rgyas
kyang de dang 'dra'o// lung bstan pa yang de dang 'dra'o// chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyang de dang 'dra ste/desan de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i don drang/ de bzhin nyid
la gnas pa'i don gyis na/ dbazhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid ma bsgribs pa'i don dang ) de bzhin nyid dbyor mod pa'i don dang/ de bzhin nyid khong du chud pa'adon rtosan/ de bzhan gshegs pa
zhes bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ dbazhan nyid mtshungs pa rarab tu phye ba de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid dang mtshungs par rab tu bya ba yin te/
klu' bdag po 'dun de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis yin te/ byang chung sems dpa' rnams sa de la gnasan/ mi skrag ma dngang zhing dngang bar ma 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'as mnyam
pa red 'ad yang sems can rnams la go bar byed do// bstan pa 'dangashad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum stong nyis brgyas ma skya ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ klu 'i
bdag po ma dros pa yang tshom zhing mgu la larangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas// 'dzam bu'i glongar ba'amu tig gi 'phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to/
de nas kru'argyal po rgya mtsho'i bu mo// lha ma yin gyi dbang po thugs bzangaras kyi tsha mo rin chen sna tshogs can zhes bya ba des/ klu'i bu mo khri dang lhan cig tu/ lag pa g.yas pasamu
tig ga 'phrang ba blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig ma 'dzum par bltas sta/ phyag 'tshal zhadi 'dug par gyur to// de nas bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can dang/ klu'abu mo khra bo da
dag gas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mu tig gi 'phrang bde dag gsol nas tshig 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams lhan cig tu 'thun zhing/ yang dag pa'i dga' bzhin du
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed do// bdag rug kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dusan de bzhin gshegs pa dgrar rtsom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa' sangs rgyas su gyur nug/ da ltar
gyi de bzhin gshags pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ 'ad 'dra bar chos kyang ston par gyur cig/ dge 'dun dad srung bar gyur cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po sa de klu'i bu mo/
de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub na/ bud med kyi lus kyi mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma nus te 'grub par dka'o//

bu mo rin chen sna tshogs can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po budamad kyi lus kyis kyang/ ban mad pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma 'gyur la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa la yang byang chub 'grub par dka' ba ma mchis so// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub n soms bskyad pa la rag las te/ byang chub tu
sams bskyed ma thag tu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa sagang 'di skad du/ bud med kyi lus kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ram nus so// zhes gsuTas pa/

dan/ skyes pa'i lus kyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ngar ma nus so// de ci'i slad du zhe na: de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du/ mig na skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no/ de ba wA ba
[a, ©]// rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid na bud med kyang ma yin/ skyes pa yang ma yin no// zhes gsungs pa' phyir ro// btsunapa 'od grus chen po de phyi'i slad du zhin/ mig na
stong pa sta/ stong pa gang lags pa de lan/ bud med kyang ma mchis/ skyes pa yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de bzhin du/ rnab dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ni/

'a: stong pa sto/ stong pa gang lags pa de la na/ bud med kyang ma mchis/ skyes pa yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa de la na mig khong du chud pa gang lags pa dan byang chub lags so/rna ba dang/
sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yidi khong du chud pa gang lags pa de na byang chub lags so// byang chub gang lags pa de lan/ bud med kyi chos rnams sam/ skyes pa'i chos rnams ma mchis so//

ba btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de lta bas na/ byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags pa de na/ bdag gi ngo bo nyid kyang de lags so// smras pa/ bu mo ci khyod byang chub yin nam/ smras pa/ gnas brtan dang 'dug
nag gnyis ka yod byang chub lags so// smras pa/ bu mo kho bo na byang chub ma yin gyi/ kho bon nyan thos yin no// smras pa// btsun pa 'od srunas chen po khyod sus btul/ smras pa// bu mo bo bo na de
bzhin gshegs pas btsal to// smras pa/ gnas brtan gal te/ de bzhin gshegs pas btul na/ gal tade bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas su zanen/de bzhin gshegs
0 pas gnas brtan gdul bar spyod dam/ bumo de na na gno/ smras pa// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de lta bsan khyod nyid byang chub lags te/ byang chub ma lags nga 'chos rtsa yang na mchis so smras pa/

bu mo ca mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub yinanam/ smras pa/ btsun pa de de bzhin te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ byang chub n mtshan sa med pa'ang bzhan
canalags te/ mtshams med pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyirang bzhan gang lags pa de na byang chub lags la/ stong pa nyid kyi chos kyi rang bzhin gang lags pa de ni/ byang chub lags pa'i slad du'o//
btsun pa de ltar na mtshams med pa khong du chud pa las byang chub 'byung ngo// btsun pa byang chub ma lags pa gang lags pa de na ma mchis te/ gal te chos 'ga' zhig dang ma ldan n ma lags kyi/
chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa de ni byang chub lags so// smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa 'di sus byin/ smras pa// gnas brtan gyis stsal to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gnas
brtan gyis ma rmas na/ bdag gi spobs pa 'di skyo bar ma 'gyur du slad du'o// btsun pa dang ldan/ gal te ma smras n/ brag cha'i sgra 'byung bar ma 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po
byang chub sems dpa' rnamasan ma dras kyi bar du spobs pa skya bar ma 'gyur ro// smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed la bsnyen bkur byas/ smras pa/ gnas brtan gyis nyon mongs pa
ga/ jig+had stangs ba snyad la'o// smras pa// bu mo kho bo'i nyon mongs pa rnamasan spangs pa yod do// smras pa/ btsun pa nyon mongs pa dang gnas pa lags sam/ smras pa// kho bo/
ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin/ nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa yang ma yin no// smras pa/ ru ba tshun pa khyod kyis nyon mongs rnams bzhag gam/ slas pa// baspyod pa 'dached/ 'gag par
byas pa yang med/ bzhag pa yang mad de/ de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du shes so// smras pa// cadi bzhin nyid shes par bgyi ba zhig lags snyam/ snus pa/ don ma yin no// snas pa/ 'o na

ci'i slad du/ de bzhin nyid ja lta ba de bzhin du nyonamo das pa shes so// zhes gsungasagal tremkhyen nan de bzhin ltad ma lags so// ci ste ma mkhyenan ni doltar na btsun pa byas pa so so'i skye bo thams/
cad dang mi shes pa can du mtshungs so// smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi tshig thams cad na gzhan gyi tshig gcod par byed pa'o// smras pa/ bdag ni su'i tshig kyang gcod par yang ma gyed ) bsgrub par
yang ma brgyad do// de ci'i slad du zhen/ chos kyi dbyings na gcad du ma mchis pa lags la// tshig thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du'o// smras pa/gang khyod
kyis bdag byas pa so so'i skya bo thams cad dad bsams te/ bzhag pa de khyod 'gyod pa ma 'gyur ma// smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po gal te bdag gis gnas brtan yang tha dad la
00 byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang// tha dad babazhag na na de lta na bdag 'gyod bar 'gyur ba zhagan// gang bag slad du bdag gis gnas brtan byas pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dad phram dad
bar bzhag pa des na/ bdag 'gyod bar ma 'gyu'o// btsun pa mtshudag shas bgyi ba de ni/ chos thams cad tha dad pa ma mchis pa dang/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// smras ba/
bu mo ca khyod so so'i skya bo rnams dang mtshungs sam/ 'on ta 'phags pa rnams dang mtshungs/ smras pa/ btsun pa bdag ni so so'i skya bo rnams dang mtshungs pa yang ma lags/ 'phags pa rnams dang
mtshungs ba yang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ gal tabadag so so'i skye bo rnams dang mtshungs na na bdag ga byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa don ma mchis par 'gyur ro// cas 'phags pa rnams
dang mtshungs nanaten thos rnams dang mtshungs par 'gyur/de lta na ni bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las yongs su nyams par 'gyuro/ smras pa/bumo gal te khyod so so'i skye bo rnams dang mang
mi mtshungs/ 'phags pa rnams dang ya nga la mtshungs na/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungs sam/ snus pa/ btsun pa 'od srungasachen po bdag na da gzod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang
mtshungs pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bdag ni thog ma nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi tsho rnams dang mtshungs so// smras pa/ bu mo gal ta byedasangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang mtshungasan/sangs
[r/ ]@#// rgyas kyi chos de dag khyod la yod dam/ snus pa/ gnas brtanar sangs rgyas kyi chos su gdugs pa 'das pa 'am/ ma 'ongs pa 'am/ da ltar byung ba 'am/ yul ni gnas pa 'am/
phyogs na gnas pa 'am/ sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar bo 'am/ btsong ka 'am/ shel gyi kha dog gam/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu lags sam/ smras pa/ bu mo sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
gdags pa ni/ kha dog dang dbyibs kyi sgo nas bstan par ma nus so// smras pa/ btsun pa gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gdagasasum mchis pa dang/ gdags su mi rung da la gsan/ de ci'i slad du
bdag la tshol bar mdzad/ smras pa/ bu cho 'on sangs rgyas kyi chos gang las btsal bar bya/ smras pa/ lta ba'arnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis las btsal bar bgyi'o// snyas ba/ lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa
[4, ]gnyis kyang gang las btsal bar bya// smras pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba las brtsel bar bgyi'o// smras po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'arnam par grol ba yang gang las btsal bar bya// smras
pa mtshams med pa lnga las btsal bar bgyi'o// smras pa// mtshams med pa lnga yang gang las btsal bar bya/ smras pa// gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po' rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba las btsal
bar bgyi'o// smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi gtam 'di 'drab de ja lta bu zhig/ smras pa/ btsun pa gtam 'dan ma bcings ma grol pa'i gtam lags so// blang du ma mchis shing dor dum mchis te/rang bzhin gyis
00/ yongs su dag pa 'a gtam lags so// chos thams cad tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i gtam lags so// smras pa/bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub dang 'thun pam yuneno// sbas pa// btsun pa/

'od srungs chen po don med de/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub dang 'thun pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub brjod du ma mchis pa bsnyad du

ma mchis pa lags pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po bshad pa'i dngos po gang lags pa de dag thams cad na sgrasarnam par dbye ba lags la// byang chub gang lags pa de ni don dam par sgras brda sprad/
par ma nus lags so// btsun pa byang chub ces bgyi ba 'dan te rapa zha ba' gzhu lags so// 'dan ya ge mamachis pa'i gzhalags so// 'dan je lta ba bzhin gyis gzhi lags so// 'dani gzhan mtshos

kha 'gazhi lags so// smras pa/ bu cho gal tabyang chub kyi mtshan nyid de lta bu yinan de ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar 'gyur/ smras pa// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po lus dang sems kyis mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma 'gyur ro// de'i slad du zhen/ byang chub n lus dang sems kyi ngo bo nyid kho na 'gas te ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/bumo ci

khyod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/ smras ba/ bdag nyid byang chub lags te/ byang chub kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshad rgya bar ma 'gyur lags so// smras pa/ bu mo gal te khyod nyid
00 @#/// byang chub 'phen/ci chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ram/ smras pa/ bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la gnas so// sbas pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de ji lta bu zhig/ smas pa//
'dalo don rten thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du mi g.yo ba lags so// 'khon la don chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa ma mas ba lags so// 'khor lo dan brel bsams pa'i tshul gyis/
(de bzhin nyid lags so// 'khor la den yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pas ma gnas pa lags so// 'khor lo de na gnas thams cad las byung ba ma lags pas gnas ma mchis pa lags so// 'khor lo
don chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas/ gnyis su mams pa lags so// 'khor lo dan gcig dang tha dad par ma dmigs pas/ tha dad pas lags so// 'khor lo dan sgra dang/ skad dang// tshig
gi lam thams cad ro gcig pas/ brjod du ma mchis pa lags so// 'khor lo dmishani tunanas nyon mongs pa can ma lags pas/ rnam par dag pa lags so// 'khor lod chad pa dang rtag pa ma ngamags/
bas yod pa yongs su chad pa ma lags so// 'khor lo dan rgyu dang rkyen shin tu brtags pas 'gal ba ma mchis pa lags so// 'khor lo dan bden pa lags so// 'khor lo de nam skyo ma 'gag pa lags

sod 'khor lo rin stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanamamed pa dang/ smon pa med pa lags so// btsun pa 'od srungs chen po'akhor lo de 'dra ba gang lags bde'akhasol ji'adrab zhig lags snasal/ bumo khyod kyis bstan/

pa 'da'adra ba lasan/ khyod ring por ma thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/gang ga tshoganas brtan byang chub mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de tsho/ bdag kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so// smras pa/ kho bo byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de na gnas mod/skabs med do//
snus nga/ de de lta lags te/ byang chub na le nas ma gzhi ba la gnas pa sta/do/sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mazhus lags so// bu mo de bstan pa 'dabashad ban// byang chub sems dpa'

lnga brgyas ma skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bu mo de la legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ bumo legs so legs so// khyod kyis chos bstan pa 'di legs par smras so//
bam podrug pa// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang// dri za kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/bu mo 'ad yun jasrid cag na/blanamadang/

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chudanas/ dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/dge slong ragabu mo

rin chen sna tshogs can 'don bskal pa grangasamed pa sum brgyan// bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rtanagyi khams snang ba can du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kun tu rnam par gzigs shes bya bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can de yang/ dbazhin gshegs pa de rigs 'od kyis rtag tu snang bar 'gyur ro// zham 'di pa byang chub
sems dpa' na bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro// de la tsho'atshid na bar gyi bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i bu mo khri bo dadag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasagang ga tshe de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu rnam par gzigs des byang chub brnyes pa de'atsho/ bdag cag 'dzag rten gyi khams der skye bar gyur cig gsol nas/ de dag kyang bcom
ldan 'das kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skye par lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha' dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
lha 'di dgan) lha ma yin gyi 'jigs pas/ rtag tu skrag bzhin du gnas la/ lha dang/ lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pan yang/ phan tshun 'gyed cing rtsod par 'gyudad/ de bsan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
klu bsacas sems can thams cad sems 'thun par 'gyur ba de lta bu r chos bstanan legs lags so// 'khor 'dar lha dang/ lha ma yin 'dus pa 'dareg thams cad kyang/ ca nasagacig la gcig 'thun
par brgyad pa dang/ byams par soms pa dang/ phan da ra soms pa dang/ gnod par soms par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu r sams dad nga ra bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad du gsol/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgragacan dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang bo bde mchog dang/ thags bzangs se dang/ lag bgrangs dang/ sem byed rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag

byanas pan ]sangs rgyas thams cad kyisabasngags so// byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i skyes bu gang zag gis na/ tshe 'diring tshe phyi ma'adon thob par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag tshe 'di ni yun thung ngo tsha bya
mar 'gro dgos so// 'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgyud pa'o// rgyal po'i longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug rnamasan ma rtag gas/ khyod lhan cig 'thun pa dang/ gnod sems med pa dang/ 'jig rten phal
la lta ba dang/ las kyi rnam par snyanapa la rton pas gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar ci nas sum cu rtsa gsum bar lha rnams dang/ lha ma yin de dag 'thun par gnas par 'gyur bde
ltaru 'gyo ba'i gtam mdzad do// de nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng slan chadamarten pa'i tshul du bgyid cing gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems dang//
gnod sems ma mchis pas gnas par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag legs so legs so// byams ba'o nam pa'i sems gang yin pa den/ de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams kyi mchod pa'amchog yin no// rdzas las byung ba'i bsod mas bya'i dos po rnam pas na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'i sems kyi ting nge 'dzinamchog yin te/ ngas de las dgongasanas de skad bstan to//
[/ ও ]/grogs po dag gzhan yang bzhi bo 'dadegan)de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/bzhi gang zhen/ bslob pa las 'gal bar ma byed pa dang/ byams pa'o

lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ma 'chad par bya ba'i byang chub kyisoms dang/ ji lta thos pa'i chos la so sor rtog pa'i chos kyi nan tan te/ bzhi po de dag ni de bzhin
gshegs pa la mchod pa khyad par du 'phags pa'o// bstan pa 'di thos nas lha'a'akhor dang/ lha ma yin gyi 'khor de dag ga nang nas bzhi khris byang chub tu sems ba skyod do// de nas bcom
ldan 'das la ) klu'i rgyal po dbugs can dang/ klu'i rgyal po dbugasatsan chen po dang/ 'jog po dang/ kha dog mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po 'di'i nangan/ klu'

rigs tshad ma mchis pa las kyi rnam pa smin pa sna tshogs las smyos pa dag mchis ta3de la/da rag na dbang che bar grags/ kha cagen lus nyam chung zhing chung bar grags la lus chung ba dag kyang na chis te/ brtson
