ldan 'das bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' ldad bzha der babs nas/ klu'a gzhon nu dang/ klu'adu mo lus nyam chung b rnams bton/ 'tshal bar bgyid la/ rgya mtsho'anang gA klu'i rigs thams cad kyang skyag pa brgyad/
lags n/canes rgya mtsho chen po'i klu de dag thanas tshad kyang/ 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang/ skrag pa ma mchis par gnas par 'gyur ba de lta bu r/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bsrung ba dang/ bsgrubs pa dang/

grwa ba mdzad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ras phrug zur phrag pa las phab nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ kyi kru' bdag po ras phrag zur 'ad long la/kru'adegs
thams cad dang/ klu'i gnas thams cad du 1 dum bu dum bur gshogs ta/ byin cage dang/ ji srid du ras phragazar 'dalas than/ nyagam gtsag tsam gnas pa de srid du yang rgya mtsho chen po nam mkha' ldad
thams cad rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe nA/ klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa mchog gi thugasakyi smonapan 'grub pa'i phyir ro/ de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag
thams cad/ ras phragazar 2da ltar chung ba 'di rgya mtsho chen po 'aklu thams cad kyis ji ltar thob par 'gyur snyam so/ zhum par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po

de rnams kyi semasakyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyisamkhyen nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po gal ta/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyisams can gang yin pa/
de dag thams cad kyis/ ras phrag zar 'od las dum bu dum bur khyor du zin kyang/ ras phrag zur 'di yongs su zad par ma 'gyur te/ deragags gos tsam gyi tshad du 'gyur bar 'dod na yang/
de las de dag gi gos de tsam du 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs nadi ltar ngosam gyis mi khyab bo// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ ras phrag zar
da blangs te/ dum bu 'bum phrag du mar byas nas/klu thams cad dang/ glu gzhon nu thams cad la go sor byin no// de su ji tsam du 'dod pa de la de tsam gyis gos su mngon par
'grub par 'gyur te/ yangs shing rgya chodar 'gyur la/ ras phrag khrar dre yang yongs su zad par mo'agyur ro// denas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos/ klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad la smras pa//
grogs po dag ras phrag zar de la ston pa'i dgos dang/ mchod rten gyi 'du shes skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ras phrag zar 'don/ de bzhin gshegs pas longs spyad pa yin te/ sams can thams

cad kyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin no// grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa gar yin pa dang/ ras phrag zur 'ad la mchod pa byed ba gang yin pa de lan/ bye brag gam/ tha dad du bya ba cung
wAzad kyang mad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kru' rgyal po rgya mtsho la legs so// zhes bya ba byin ta/ kru' bdag bo legasaso le gas so// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin ti:
ras phrag zar de la mchod pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag gsan)de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa yin no// klu'i bdag po klu dang/ klu'i gzhon nu dang/ klu'abu mo ja snyad kyis ras brag zad las
dum bu dum bur khyer ba mthong ngam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag thams cad n bskal pa bzang po 'di kho na la yongs su mya ngan
[s/]las 'da' bar rtas lung bstan te/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa rnamasanam gtogs so// klu'abadag po de bzhin gshegs pan/de ltar 'jig rten na yon gnas yin te/ de la sems gcig bskyod pa tsam
nad chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu dang/ klu gzhon nu dang/ klu'abumo ja snyadaganas pa de dag thams cad tshim zhing mgu la yar ngas te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba/
dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma gsung pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa na der pa gsung
ba'o: yang dag pa gsung ba'o// phyin ci ma log pa gsung ba sta/ des bdag cag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lung bstan no// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag na sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/
dge 'dun la shin tu skyabs su mchi'o// slab pa 'gazhi rnams kyang gzung bar 'tshal lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bka' drin du gzo bar 'tshal te/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na yang/

blta ba dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i slad du rgyun ma 'chad par thad du mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang sku gdung 'chang b rnams la
mchod pa bgyi'o// bkur sti dang/ rim gro thams cad kyang bgyi'od/ klu yongs su bskyob pa zhes bya ba le'u ste bdun pa'o//
gshegs pa 'byin gyis brlabs 'dasmos nas/ ma dga' dang ranges pa'i tshul gyis/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der songs lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos
phyag 'tshal to/ lan gsum bskorab byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag gi 'tshal ma bkum ston bgyi lags bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag zas bzhi po 'di dag na sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gnyan rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/grogs po dag zas gang srog
chags gzhan gsad pa dang/ srog chags gzhan la rnam par 'tsho ba dang/ gzhan gyi srog gcad pas 'tshob 'dan/ sams can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gan rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro

bar 'gyur ba' thas dang po'o// grogasapo dag gzhan yang zas gangam byin par lenAtsang 'brog pa dang/ gzhan gyi longs spyod 'jig par byed pa dang/ dbyug pa dang/ ral gri dang/ mtshon cha dang/ lag rgyas
'tsho ba 'ad ni sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i khrusaganyis pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang zas gang tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gas ga
dang pha rol la gnod pa byed pa dang/ spyod lam yang dag par ston pa dang/ cho ga nyams pa dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dang/ 'tshong mas pa dang/ log pa dang/ yang dag pa
ma yin pa'i yon tan gyis 'tshob 'dan sams can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshinardza'i 'jigartan du 'gro ba' zas gsum pa'o// grogs po dag gzhan yang zas gang/ ston pa
ma yin pa la ston par khas 'che ba dang/ yang dag par song ba ma yin par yang dag par song bar khas 'che ba dang/ dge slong ma yin par dge slong du khas 'che ba dang/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par
tshangs par spyod par khas 'che bas 'tshob 'dan/ sams can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyuratha' klas bzhapa ste/ grogs po dag da na bras/
bzhi po 'di dag yang dag par gcad pa'i phyir chos ston tu grogs po dag lus gso ba'i phyir gzhan gyi srog gcad par ma bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad lan/ srog gces shing phangs/
pa'i phyir te/ grogs po dag de lta bas na/ bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir dang/ 'jig rten pha rol bsrung ba'i phyir dang/ sems can thams cad la bde ba sbyin pa'i phyir/ mkhas pas srog gi phyir yang
gzhan gyi srog ma gcad rkyang/ bya ba ma yin pa thams cad mi bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi g.yog 'khor sa yas ya dang ldan pas
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos dang (dge slong gi dag 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sngon gyi sdig pa'i las bgyis pa yang
so sor bshags so// slanachad kyang sdom par 'tshal ko/ klub gesad+dams cad la yang mi 'jig pa stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa tshos yun ji srid gnas pa de srid du ya nga
rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las la brtson par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bya'argyal bo nam mkha' lding bzhi po de dag la
bka' stsal ba/ grogs po dag khyed na de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyi gsung rab la dge slong bzhir gyur to/ dga' khyod dad/ dga' byed chen po dang/ bla ma dang/ bla ma'agreshes/
gten zhes bya bar gyur to// dge slong bzhi bo dadag rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pa'argyags bsamyos shang/ mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang/ slongs mo star ba'i khyim gyi rgyags
pas chos la/ bdag nyid ni tshul khrims dang/ cho ga dang/ lta ba nyams/ tshul khri'i sa dang ldan pa'i dag slong rnams lan 'khrug pa dang/ gnod pa byas ta ) lus dang ngag dang/ 'demabasdams
shang sdig pa mang po byas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub de la yang de dag gas mchod pa mang bo byas so// des na khyod sams can dmyal bar ma song ste/ dud 'gro'i spyi gnas
'dir skyes nas 'ad ltar sdom pas ma bsdams pa'i phyir/ khyed kyis srog gcod pa mang du byas shade/ sdig pal sa mang du byas la// mang po dag kyang 'jigs bar byas so// denas bcom ldan
'das kyis de tsho bya'i rgyal bo nam ma kha' lding bzhi po de dag gis ci nas tshe rabs dran b.ra'agyur bo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gas thub de dang/ don dag slong du gyur nas las mngon par 'du
byed pa// mngon par 'dus byas pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrulamangon par 'du byed ba mdzad do// de dag gsakyang mngon sum du bcom ldan 'das la 'daskadare
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sams ni dmu rgod gdul dka' zhing/ rgyud dka' ba lags te/ rab dagag soms brkam chags can du gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser
thub de ma mnyes par bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis// da slan chad rang ga srog kyang khongs su gtad par 'tshagagyi/ sdig pa'i las mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag chos
kyi gtam gyis dga' ba bskyed nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dga' byed de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i 'dus pa dang po'i grangs su gtogs par 'gyur ro// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgya mtsho chen por sams can gyi don rjesnyad bya dgos pa de dag thams cad mdzad nas/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po tshur shog/ da rang gamal cha
dang/ stan rnams sdus shig/ ngan rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// denas bcom ldan 'das zhamarade ba dang bcas par gdan las bzhengs nas/ rgya mtsho chen po 'anying nas/ phyure yang
ran po cha' them skas rnams las bkod pa chen po dang/ mchod pa chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid chen pos gshegs nas/ mgur bsal te/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du gzhos so/
de nas rgyamatsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsamangon par bstod pa ) sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' lha dang nas mchod pa dalhami
dbang pos bsnyen bkur ma mchogadeng phyag 'tshal// pad+ma lta bu'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla ba 'dra// dag ba'i chos kyis 'phags pa bde sbyin dang phyag 'tshal// gzugs mchog ston pa bsod nams
bats+tsha ya mtshan dang ldan// yon tan ye shes bsags pa rnam 'dren dod phyag 'tshal// sbyin dang dul bas 'phags pa tshul khrims bzang po brtsegs// bzod pa' stobs kyis 'phags pamamchog
[”]dang phyag 'tshal// brtson 'grus stobs kyis byung ba bsam gtan blo gros sbyangs// shes rab mkha' mtshungs khyod la de rang mgos phyag 'tshal// byams pas snyoms pa' thugs ldan thugs rjes
kyi 'gro la gzigs// 'dren pa thugs dgyes rtag tu pha rol gshegs// ka la bad lta bu r gsung snyan tshangs skad ston// gsung snyan ston pa khyod la rang mgos phyag 'tshal// bdud dpung 'joms
pa bdud stobs des dar 'jon sa mdzad pa// byang chub brtul zhugs sgrub pa srid gsum srid pas mchod// dri gsum dri ma sbyong brnam thar gsum ston pa// 'jig rtan gsum grags khyod la de rang

bu mgos phyag 'tshal// bden pa'i brtul zhugs bzang bo rtag tu chos kyis 'phags// rtag tu dgon pa spyod yul rtag tu ga shes sbyong// nyon mongs dgra 'joms gza brjid lhag pas gzo ba skyid pa// pad+ma lta

bu'i snyanamanga' deng khyod mgos phyag 'tshal// lhun po' rdo 'dra dgongs pa rdo rje lta bu r brtan// dgongs pa sa 'dra' yon tan rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro la stong pa ston pa zhi gnas pha rol phyin// rab tu

zhiba'i thugs ldan khyod la skyabs su mchi// bdud rtsa dam pa ston pa 'gro min 'gro bgacod// lha dang mas mchod khyod la dar de mgos phyag 'tshal// sa stang lha yul grags ba snyan dang grags pa 'phags/

yon tan rgya chen mi zad yon tan 'byung gnas 'dud// ji skad gsungs pazhan mdzad cang ci skad mdzad bzhin gsung// ji skad sbyod bzhin skul ba dang khyod mgos phyag 'tshal// rga sha grol mdzad sman pa 'gro
bas bsnyen bkur ba// thar pa'il ma ston khyod la darangemagos phyag 'tshal/ rgyu yi byedapa rab ston lta ba'i mun pa sel// lam mchog ston pa rgyal nga khyod la skyabs su mchi// ran chen spyan pa gcig
bu chos kyi dga' ba gsung// sa 'dra'i thugs ldan khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// 'dren pa yon tan rgya mtsho yon tan las bstod pa'i// bdag gi bsod nams gangalags desan khyod 'drar
de nasargya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan mas/ bcom ldan 'das la de skad bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das slar byung ste gshegs/
[s ]// pas: don gyi mtshon bog mdzas lags n/zhes bdag rgya mtshomadzes par bgyid pa de lta bu n/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bstan na legs so legs so// de skad ces/
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i lha mo 'od ldan ga la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od ldan ma chos bcu po 'ad dgan rgyan tu'agyur ba yin ta/ bcu gang zhen 'ad lta sta/
dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs bar bya ba'i phyir/ byams pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems bskyod pa dang/ sems can thams cad la rnam par mi 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir snying rjechen
po la gnas pa dang/ bsam pa'i sbyor ba sman mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sams bskyod pas dga' bar gnas pa dang/ sbyin ba thams cad yongs su gtong

! ]ba dang/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi brtan pa dang ) dgo ba'artsa ba'achos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i khyer dran pa dang shes bzhin du gnas pa dang/ ston

tshu gyi deg ba chud ma za ba'akhyer dang/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos dang ldan zhade chos 'dod pa dang/ 'an ba'i dngos bos soms can thams cad la yon tan thams cad sbyang ba dang/
gnyis su med pas gong du khyad par rtogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi thugs su chud pa la yang dag par gzhol bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa sku/ 'od ldan s chos bcu po de dag/nargyan tu 'gyur
ba yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rgya mtsho chen po' lhago 'od ldan s lha mo bra dang lhan cagi du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tus nas bskyod nas/bcom//
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po brgyan 'gas so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sanasan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad kyi rgyan lags na rgya mtsho na po' lta smos kyang ci 'tsha' to/ byang chub kyi goms da nasangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan pa'i slad du/ bdag cag gis bskyad lags so// bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ bdagan rgya mtshochen po'i nang na gnas bzhin du/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i slad du/ rtag tu
brtson ba kho nar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na yang/ bkod pa thams cad nye bar bstan par 'tshal lo// chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam mdzad pa na yang/ 'khor gyi khyams kyi
bkod pa bsgrub par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od ldan ma 'ad ltar khyod kyisan sangs rgyas khra la mchod pa byas so// 'khor gyi khyams kya de kod pa yang bstan to// dam pa'i
chos kyad yo des su bsrungs so// 'od ldan ma khyod na bskal pa bzang po' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro// khyod na
cha// bskal pa bzad do bad 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs ba 'asangs rgyas kyi zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'don dgar skye bar 'gyur te/ bud med kyi dngos po brjes nas/
skyes ba'i dngos po klob par 'gyur ro// khyod na de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs pas bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// des rgya mtsho chen po'i lha

mo 'od ldan ms/ bcom ldan 'das las bdag nyade kyi lung bstan pa thos nas/ tsham zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rang tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes te/ rgya mtsho'i rin po che dang/ rin thang mnyam
ba'i rin po che'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo spyar te/ da' tsho bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdagan rdzob pa ye shes yon tan kun gyi
'byung gnas de yis lung bstan/ bdag ni 'dren par 'gyur bar bdag la yid gnyis the tsom du yang yong ma mchis// stong gsum sa gzhi thams cad rnam par zhugs shing zla ba sa la ltung yang gda'//
rgyalha las lhag pa 'a lhas mchodasangs rgyas phu chu log ga tshig gsung yongs ma gda'// bsam pa byams pa brtson 'grus yul la thugs na 'khrugs por 'gyur ba ma mnga' ltos// bdagan stod pa'i
ya shes yul gyi chos rnams dag la gus par bgyid la ltos// bde bar gshegs pa'i yang dag spyod pa rnams dang ye shes thogs pa ma mnga' ltos// de yis 'dar na bdag gi sams kyi yul bden
[j]mkhyen nas de bzhin lung yang bstan// sman pa rab mchog bad sbyin sdug bsngal kun las grol bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen skyob pa 'jigs pa rnams la 'jigs
mad spyin mdzad pa'i// rgyal ba lan mchog dam pa ston mdzad lam ngan yongs su sbyong la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten rnam par gzigs la mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo//

di'i na lha dang ma rnams gang dag sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs rnams thos pa dang// byang chub spyod tshade byang chub bsam pa sems pa dedagabanAd pa legs par rnyed// de dag la ni ngan song ngan 'gro'i 'jigs
ba mad de mi khom brgyad las yongs su grol// de dang de dag lha dang mi yabade pa nges shing zhi ba'i go 'phang [“] thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho'i bu mthongadags
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham Anedang nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'bu chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma lags pa
mang po dag gsan/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis lags n/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang pa mdzadan/ bdag gis kyang/ de bzhi gshegs pa la/ mchod pa'i las
cung zad tsam 'tshal te// bdag gas bcom ldan 'das zhal rang ba dang bcas par rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra pa'i bkod pa chen po'i khang bzangs kyi nang du bzhugs par gsolal/ bya rgod kyi phung
po ri la bskyal bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalab/ rags kyi bu da deshadus la bab par shes na skyol cig/ de nas klu ba rgyal bo rgya mtsho'i
bumazong dgas/ gsargyas kyi mthu dang/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis/ rnam par rgyal byed dang 'dra ba'i khang bzungs ban gyis brlabasanas/ der bcom ldan 'das zhum rade bdang bcas
bar bzhugs bar gsol nas/ stong ga bar snang las gshegs te/ klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong yang sal snyan byed/ bog rdob/ glu dbyangs lenatsang ma tog gi cha chen po 'babs ga
lha'i spos dang/ bya ba sna tshogs kyi char 'babs bzhin du mthar gyis/ bcomaldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bskyal to// denas klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho bu dang bcas/
chung ma dang g.yog 'khor dad nga/cas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasaganyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bzod pa gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsam 'byor bar gyur ba
( gang lags pa rnams bdag rug bzod pa mdzad du gsol// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das zhe po che ji lta btsazhan du/ de dang mtsham pa 'amachod pa'i tog lags la/ bcom ldan 'das
nasems can thams cad kyi bla na ma mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi zheng rin po che lags te/ mchod pa'i 'os las/sun/ desan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigartan gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i
sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'byor ba 'am/ yongs su rdzogs bar bgyi de ba'i rig thog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa na de tsam du tshad mams pa'i mchod pa'i 'os lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar de bzhan gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po byang chub sams dpa' nan tan byed pas/
da ba na gshegs pa ji ltar mchod pa nyon cig// bsam pa rnam par dag pa nid bzhin gshegs pa la mchod ba yin te/ bcos mas yin pa dang/ g.yo med pa'aphyir ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs
gu dag pan de nga zhan gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i phyir ro// zhe 'gras pa med pa 'a sam sa na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin ta
sems can thams cad la 'od snyoms pa'i phyir go/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ ba gsag thams cad rnam par spangs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ spyod lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir
go[”]ji skad smras pa de bzhan byed pa ni de bzhinagshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad lam slu ba' phyir ro// 'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin cing/ sbyangs pa'i yon
tan thams cad yang dag par blangs pa mi 'dor ba na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ dam bcas pa la brtan pa'aphyor ro// dbon po la dga' zhing bre mo gtum yongs su spong ba na/ de bzhin/
da@#/// gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ sems yongs su 'dul ba'i phyir ro// ji skad thos pa 'tshos la tshul ba zhan du so sor rtog ngan/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/
yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro// bdag med pa dang/ sems canamad pa dang gso bamad pa dang/ gang zag med par da bar rtogasapani/ de bzhin gshegs pa lamachod/
pa yin te/ gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir ro// stong pa'i chos la 'jugapa dang/ mtshan ma mdapa la nges par rtog padang/ smon pa dang bral ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/ rnam par thar
pa'i sgo mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro// rkyen 'ad pa 'di la 'jugatsang mthar lta ba sol ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yanete/ rtag pa dang/ chad par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i phyi'i ro//
ma byung ba dang/ ma skyes par bzod pa ni/ de bzhin gshags ba la mchod pa yin te/ rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir ro// klu'abadag po de ltar lus dang ngag dang/ sams kyi rtsom pa gang yin pa/
de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa ma yin gyi ) gangan lus dang ngag dang/ sems kyi rtsod pa med pa don/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yongs su dag pa yacheno/)/ mdon
bar 'du byed ba med pa dang/ blad pa med pa dang/ dor ba med pa dang/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang/ dra ma gsum gyi dri ma sel ba dang/ khams gsum pa
[n lami rton pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'jug pa dang 2 rag pa gsum gyi rig pa shes pa de na ) de bzhin gshegs pa lamachod pa yaneno// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma tog dang ) bdug dang spos dang ma 'og khu ba pa dang/ bya ma dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/
ba dan dang/ na bza' dang/ bshos dang ) gzims cha dang/ gdan dang/ stun gsos sman dang ! yo byad dang/ sil snyan dang 3 phag rdob pa dag gis ) de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa/
gang lags pa de dag kyang/ ca de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyid pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'abadag po don bla na med pa' mchod pa de nyid kyis yongs su sbyangs pa/

yan gyis/ mchod pa de nashan tumathar thug pa dang/ shin tu dri ma med pa dang/ shin tu tshangs par spyod pa'amathar thug pa ma yin no/ 'badag po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa'i slob pa de dag ni 'phags/
pa'i rnam par grol ba la soms gnas kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyod pa rnams de lta ma yin no// klu'i bdag po gzhan yangs bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dang 'an/ de bzhinagashegs pa la
mchod pa byed pa 'an te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjod pas/ bsod nams kyi tshogs gsogs pa dang/ snying rjechan la gnas pa'i sams kyis ye shes kyi tshogs gsogs
[/ ]@#// ba dang ( brtson 'grus chen po shin tu brtsams pa36mas kyis// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dang/ tshos zab mo rgyachen po la sams bskyed pas/ bzod pa bskyed
ba thob pa ste/ klu'i bdag po tsho 'ad bzhi dang ldan pa'i byed chub sems dpa' den ) de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa yin no// denas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i bram ze
dang/ rgyal rags dang/ khyim bdag rnams dang/ grong rdal pa dang/ yul gyi mi rnams dang rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang/ blon bo dang/ nang 'khor dang/ sgo dpon dang/ 'khor dang/ tshong dpon
rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su bshos gsolanas/ bya rgod kyi phung po 'ar la gshags so zhes thos nas der srog chags bdun khri nyis stong dang/ rgyal po ma
skyes dgra g.yog 'khor sum khri nyis stong dang lhan cig tu/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas/ bya rgod kyi phung po'ar ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// denas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal bo ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen por gshegasan/ chab kyatshogs de na mchis pa de gang du mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chenapo gang gi tshe dge slong ma'i

[z}]khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de'atsho/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mos yongs su gang bar mthong na/ der chud byed po dra ba/nga du song/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das//

don tang ngo 'dzin la dbang thob pa' sanas do lta bu r u0f38sa su dung ba las gyur pa lags so// bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis/ de nyan thos kyang nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa la dbang thob
ba' sogs las su rung ba las gyur par 'dod na/ de bzhan gshegasab la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa dang 'dzan dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la ma bas pa/ gnas la dbang yod dgachos thams

cad kya dbang phyug/ chos rnams la dbang yod pan de ltar mi 'dod dam/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe ngargya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe/ chu de'anang na gnas pa'i sems can rnamasan/ bdag nyid tshul nang na
gnas so snyam du 'azhi to// skams na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis na rgya mtsho bskams par mthong ngo// ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa' lha rnams kyi gnas bkod pa rnams rgyan thams cad kyis
brgyan pa de bzhin du/ klu dang driza dang/ lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis khyab par gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'anang gi sems can thams cad kyang/ gag la gtsug
byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i sams dang/ gnod pa 'a sems med pa dang/ rnam par 'tshe ba mdapas gnas par gyur to// donas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal bo ma skyes dgras
@#/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa rgyas kyi tsho ba 3 dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs lamakhas pa de tsam du bsam

[A ]gyis ma khyab ngan ngonatshar lags te/'daltaraklu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs te/ de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa 'gyasin/ bcom ldan 'das/ klu'argyalapo rgya mtshos yun
ji srad cig nasan/ bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu soms bskyed lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la ni mchod pa bgyis/ yun ji srid cig na na blanamadapa yang dag par rdzogs
pa 'byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags dmangon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan ni ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ de'asangs rgyas kyi zhingan ci 'dra bar 'gyur 'gas/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po ston byung 'das pa'i dus bskal ba grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ bsam gyi ma khyab pa/ yunarang batshad med pa'i snga rol/ de'i tshe de'adus/
tshun bskal pa yid du 'ong zhing zhi ba zhes bya ba la// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rtenam khyon pa/ skyes bu 'dulaba'i kha lo sgyurab blan med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od rnam par

dag pa 'a 'od ga zer gyi rgyal bo zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten du byung ste/ rgyal bo chen po 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba yodas su dag pa de'i bkod pa byud da de dgan) nga'i mi'i tshad bskal par gnas su zin kyang//

rgyas par bstan par nus par sla ba ma yin no// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsa' zhes bya ba zhig byung sta ) des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od nam

bar dag pa 'a 'od gzor rgyal po de la/ lo bzhi khri nyis stong ga bar du mchod pa byas te/ dge ba'i rtse bas nye bar brtan pa de gnyid log pa'amolomadu/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos so// skyes bu khyu

mtshog la ni mchod chan mang// dpag med rgya chen bsam yas byas zin gyis// 'gro ba dag la sAde brtse bskyod nas kyang// rab mchog byang chub semasan bskyod par gyis// byang chub sems na yang dag sgrub
byed gang// den mchod mchog dam pa khyad par 'phags// de na de bzhin gshegs rnams bkur ste yan// den phyi ma'abasod nams gzabyon yin// khan bobadun pa
cu thama'o// rgyal po chen po de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'argyal po// lhas btsa' des tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis thos te/ dbamtshan mo 'dasanas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rnam par dag pa'i 'od gzer rgyal po ga la bder dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/srog chags
brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das daran sngar 'khod de/ thal mo sbyangs/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sogs bskyod/
ka de 'tshigs su bcad pa 'di deg smras so// gzugs la brkum dang sgra la nyan pa dang// dri dang ro dang rag la gnas ba dang// 'dod la brkam dang bde ba dga' ba las// byang chub mchog 'di rtogs
bar ma nus so// le lo can dang dma' la brtson pa dang// ser sna can dang tshul khrims ma bsdams dang/ sdang ba'isoms dang blon 'khrul pa yis// byang chub mchog 'dirtogos par ma nus so//
rang gi bde ba thams cad spangs pa dang/ 'gro ba' sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa dang// brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtag tu chos 'dod gang// de na de jig rten de 'dra'asangs rgyas 'gyur// sangs
la/ rgyas byang chub lan bdag zhugs pa// sangs rgyas rnams dang lha rnams dpang btsugs te// tsa nas ba dag tshig log par ma 'gyur ba// de ltar sman slad spyod pa spyad pa bgyi/ byang chub sems
na bdag gis rmi lam thos// thos nas bdag na byang chub mchog la thugs// de yi slad dusangs rgyas ma yi mchog/ ye shes ldan pa de 'dra budag gis bgyi/ rgyal po chen po de 'i tshe de'i dus na/

'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas btsang zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyamadu khyod som te 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tshom zan/ rgyal bo chen po khyod kyis de ltarag blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhan/

klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho 'di nyid de'i tsho/ 'khor los sgyur ba'al po lhas btsa' zhes bya bar gyur to// de yang de'i dang po byang chub tu sems brgyud ba yin no// rgyal po chen po khyod 'ad skad du/ klu'i rgyal

bo rgya mtsho 'di yun ji srid tsa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs da 'byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes zer ba de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po klu'argyal bo rgya mtsho 'di'i bskal pa
grangs med pa nyis brgyan/ bskal ba dpal gyi ma tog ces bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa zhes bya bar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i sa dus rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rtanamakhyen pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha los sgyur ba/ blo numad pa// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das shin tu dram mad tsang yongs su dag la/ yon tan gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur go/ rgyal bo chen po 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa de rin po che/
sa las spras par 'gyur te/ 'dzam buchu bo'i gser las grub pa rin po che snatshogs du mas bris shade mig mangs sa sarnam par phyel/ lag mthalabazhin du mnyam ste/ ka tsa lenadaka' gos bzhin
du 'jam zhing regan bde la/ yangs shing thag gu che sta/ gling bye ba phrag 'bum dang ldan la/ 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang yid du 'ong ba ste/ lha dang ma mang po dag gas gang la/ gzhan
[z/ ]@#/// 'phrul dbang byed ba'i lhan ms kyi dbar spyad pa dang/ longs spyod ji lta ba bzhin du ma da dgag lang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi sgra grag pa zhes bya ba den/

razhi po che thams cad las grub pa dang ta la'i brang ba dag 'byung bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shang tal de dag ga lo ma dang/ matog dang 'bras bu thams cad las/ chos kyi sgo khrag khrig phrag 'bum mang po

dag 'byung ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams den/ sgra ji snyed 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ lha'i sgra 'am/ mi'i sgra 'am/ ma ma yin pa'i sgra 'am/ sprul pa'i sgra 'am/ byang sgra 'am/ rlung ga sgra yang rung ste/

lcasgra de dgathams cad chos dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du zhi ba dang ldan pa dang/ rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa dang/ rta bar zhabadang ldan pa dang/ dga' ba dang dben pa dang ldan pa dang/

@# sangs rgyas kyi chos dang ldan pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang ldan bdong/ thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang/ skyo ba dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lta ba dang ldan

pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa mad pa dang ldan pa'i sgra dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ desan 'jig rten gyi khams der mang tshos kyi sgra grags

pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams deralha dang/ mgang dag skye ba de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dga' kha' khras khon dang ldan par 'gyur zhing/ mngon par shes ba'i shes pa la mkhas pa//
dang/ blan chad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la the tshom med pa sha stag go/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa shan tu dra ma med cing yongs su dag la/ yon tan gyi tshogs mtha'
mas pa las byung ba rgyal po de yang gung gi tshi chos ston nga ra bzhed pa de'i tsho/ nyid kyi sku las 'od 'gyed par mdzad de/ 'od des sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i 'od de las kyang/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong gsung ba' chos ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// donalha dang ma rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od de yang mthong la/ chos
bstan pa de yang thos nas dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po rgya cher skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu dri ma mad rung yongs su dag pa la ) yon tan gyi tshogs
mtha' yas pa las byung ba'i rgyal po de ga la ba der dong stalhagasanas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa tshad med pa byas te/ rdzu 'phrul dang/ mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis/
nam mkha'i dkyil na rin po che'i bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa' pad+ma dag la skyol mo krung bcas te 'khod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de yang nam mkha'i dkyil nyidan/ sang bda' khri la
bzhugs te/ lha dang ma de dag la chos ston to// de chos ston pa na/ phyogs bcunas byang chub sems dpa' tshad mdagrangs mdapa brgya stong dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
khyu// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can su yang chos la zhe 'grasapa med do// den bdud sdig can dag dang ) gzhan mu stagasacan dgag sgrar gdags pa yang med do// de bzhin
gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshadan bskal pa bcur 'gyura'o// de'i byang chub sems dpa' nibagrang ba las 'das par 'gyuragro/ rgyal bo chen bo de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhar de 'i bkod pa zhashesam

gyis ma khyab bo// chos bstan pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// zham 'bring ba 'khor byang chub sems dpa' yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo// klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho lung bstan pa 'a la 'a ste brgyad pa 'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la// rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad n rgyu'i rjes su 'brang ba dang/ rnam par bsgrubs na
'byung ba' mtshan nyid lags te/ de dag na ji lta ji ltar 'dod pa de lta de ltar rnam par 'grub pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi spyod pa ni mtha' yas pa lags so// de la byang chub sems
dposan jo srid du rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'asangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma bzung ba de srid du byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems

dpa'athams cad kyisan/ klu'argyal po rgya mtsho ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po khyod dza skad zerab khazhan
chos thams cad na yid la byed pa las 'byung sta/ chos thams cad byed pa mad pa 'i phyir/ de dgan ja ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rnam par 'grub bo// denas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ klu'i

rgyal po rgya mtsho la 'ad skad ces smras so// klu'i bdag po gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pas/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhingag yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa bsam gyis ma khyab dar dran na da da yang dag par

rdzogs nga 'a byang chub tu lung bstan pa na/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de skad ces smras pa dang/ klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtshos/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po chos

gang yang lung bstan du yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad nag khrod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ klu' bdag po sngon dag pa ba rtsa ba bskyod pa rnams kyang lung bstan
tu med dam/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos smras pa/ rgyal po chen po sems can du gdags pa na/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams su zad la/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams
ni lung bstan tu mod do// rgyal po chen po mang dang gzugs la sems can du gdags par zud la/ ming dang gzugasan lung bstan tumed do// rgyu dang lta ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ yid la byed
ba la soms can du gdags par zid na/ rgyudang lta ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ yod la byed pa dede la yang lung bstan du med do// dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par 'grub par de ga pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang lung bstan tu mad do// rgyal bo chen po chos thams cad na stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin la/ stong pa
nyid na lung bstan du med do// rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/ mtshanamachod ba dang/ smon pa/
mad pa dang/ mngon par 'du byed ba mad pa 'am tshan ted na lung bstan du med do// rgyal bo chen po gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying rje chen po 'ad na bsam gyis ma khyab sta/ mang mad pa
dad [Y ]mtshan ma med pa'achos thams cad mang dang mtshanams ston par mdzad la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ ming dang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'arnam par shes pa can/
yang ma yin no// rgyal po chen po lung bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rtan brda sprad par zad de/ 'dal gang lung bstan par bya ba'amang chos gang yang/ nang ngam phyi rolan ma dmags so// rgyal
pos smras pa/ klu'i bdag po bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lung bstan pa mad dam/ smras pa/ rgyal po chen po bzod pa de yang skad cag pazod pa'amtshan
nyid/ mi zad pa'i mtha'acan/ yang dag pa'i mthar res pa/ mnyam pa'amatha'acan/ gnyis su med pa'i mthar nges pa ste/ gnyis su med pa'amatha'an yang dag pa'i mtha'o// yang dag pa'i
mtha' nag tan du ma 'byung ba 'a mtha'o// mtha' can gang yin pa de na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang/ gti muga rnams so// deb mtha' canan rnam par grol ba'i mtha'o// gang mtha' de'i sgor zhugs/

pan gang du yang mngon par zhin ba med do// gang mngon par zhen pa med pa de na tha snyad kyis brda la chags pa med do// ma chagasan grol bar 'gyu'o// grol na phyin tshad ma rgyu rab tua rgyu'o// ma rgyu rab tu mi

rgyun gang du yang nyams par ma 'gyur ro// blom tams na thams cad las nges par 'byung bar mthong sta/ ja ltaranam bar ma mthong ba de ltar yang mathong ngo// gang ga tshi rnam pa/ram mthong ba de'atshe/
gnyis su mi 'dud do// gnyis su med pa la gnasan/ mnyam pa nyid la 'jug go/ mnyam pa nyid la zhugs na/ mthobar yang ma 'gyur/ dma' bar ma 'gyur ro// mtho ba yang mad/ dma'
ba yang medan/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos kyis rab tu phya ba' bzod pa thob par 'gyur to/ de la bzod pa gang an pa dang/ lung bstan pa gang yin pa dang/ gang lung bstan par bya ba dang/ sus lung
bstan pa dang/ ci'i phyir lung bstan pa'i chos de dag thams cad chos mnyam po dang/ chos med pa'i chos kyi dbyings su nges pa dang/ brdayod pa dang/ 'byung bamad pa dang/ dngos po dang/ dngos
bo yod pa dang bral ba dang/ gnyis sumadapa' mtha' can de dag gi don yongs su gzhal nas/ chos gang yang bgrang b.ram byed do// dpar na/ nam mkha'an bgrang du med cing bgrang ba las
yang dag par 'das pa sta/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyas brgyas ma
skya ba' chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// dge slong nyis brgya na len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes gros 'di skad ces

gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i spobs pa ngomatshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po 'di'i spobs pa ni ngo mtshar angami che la/ dka' ba yang ma yin gyi/ las

dang po pa gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thosan/ ma sgug mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba 'ad lta de dag gi ches ngo mtshar ba dang/ chos dka' ba yin no// de tsa' phur zhen/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang
chub na de ltar mos par dka' ba ste/ de la na lha dang bcas pa 'a 'jig rten 'jug par ma 'gyur/ 'gro bar ma 'gyur/ mos par ma 'gyur/ yid ches par ma 'gyur nga' phyir te/ rgyal bo chen po rnam grangs
'dis kyang gang dag chos khrab mo bstan pa 'al ma skrag ma darang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba' sams can de dgan/ sangs rgyas mang po la'asAn bkur byas pa yin par de ltar rag par bya'o// rgyal po
chen po gzhan yang 'di ji snyam du sems skyes bu gang gis nam mkha' gzugs can ma yin pa bstan du med pa 'di na/ gzugs can du ston par byed na ca de dka' bar byed pa yin nam/ gsol pa//
bcom ldan 'das mchog tu dka' lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu dka' lags so// bka' stsal pa/ chos 'ad lta bu r zab pa zab bar snang ba de tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa/ bdag med pa/

sems can med pa/ srog med pa// gso bamed pa/ gang bag mad pa/ rgyu ba med pa 'ad lamosal mos nas kyang de khon bzhin du sgrub pa gang yin pa de dag ni da ngas kyang ches dka' ba khyad pa yin te/ de dag ni

de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'thun pa 2 dag ba dang grogs dang mdza'abashis yin no// de dag gis ni sems can rnams kyi phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir/ chos stonanus so// de dag gis ni byang chub kyi sdud po
mchog dam pa la'aduganas/ bdud kyi dpung bye ba phrag brgya byams pa dang/ shes rab dang/ ye shes dang/ brtson 'grus kyis gzhos par nusaso// de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa dang/
sams dpa' ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa dang/ sams kyi skad cag gtsag dang ldan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
nus so/de dag gis na sams can thams cad brda sprad pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sams ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang/ semasacan thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang/ mchog ma yin
pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar nus so// de dag gsan phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar bcad pa dang/ mu stags can thams cad zal gyis mnan pa dang/ dgra
thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dung 'bud nus so/// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bsamar grub cing brnag pa dang/ 'di la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs te/
ba rang gi lung bstan pa thos nas/ bor snanga' mngon rara'abags de/ bcom ldan 'daga' tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// bdud nas sde bcas dpung bcas des bcom
zhing [u0f10 ]lta ba ngan pa'i phyogs kun bshiganasani/ thub pa chen pos chos kyichar phabasto/ 'jig rten thams cad bdud rtsis tshim par mdzad/ khyodage chos rgyal mi 'jigs stsol ba lags// 'dam
lus rgyal te 'jigs med 'graman bzhugs// 'jige rtamigasta 'anamchog stonapa po// skya bo skyabasamamachis pa'imagonapalags// smanapa'i rgyal khyod zug rngu 'byin pa yi// sman pa rga
shi med pa'i sman tshol ba// ci nas phyin chadand rnamasami 'byung bar// nad dang bsagazor rnams gsomadzad pa// khyod ni ston skyabs blam gcig pu lags// gtan du bde ba sbyin pa khyod/
nyag cig/ khyod nir skya'adzanapa don dmam khyenapa lags// 'khor ba'i sdugabasnga'alasanazlog mdzad pa/ lha yit+ta sta 'gro b rnams kyi gtso// 'jig rten kun gyi sgron mar gyur pa lags/ khyod
dang 'jalan 'jig rtenachon brgal// mi rnams kyini migamchog khyod nyagacig/ ye shesagazugs dang pha rol gnonapa yis// thub dbang khyod 'dra su yang ma mchis te// khyod ni lharab sus
'jig rten thams khad kyi// ston pa po ste thar pa'i lam mtshon lags// khyod ni thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen mchog/ 'jig rtenachosa rnams kyis ni khyod ma gos// kun mkhyenasred bral
rnam grol dpa' ba dang/ ye shes mchog nas khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// lta b.rasnanaman pa'i rnam par dag/ gzugs med gzung duman chis 'dus ma bgyis// de ba'i chos rnams dri
mad rnam par dag/ 'jig rten rnam par 'drenangs 'batu bstan// yod dang med par lta ba spyasanas kyang// rnamadag chos rnams bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// rkyen dang bcas shing rgyu dang
bsus pa ste// sems canamanachis gang brag srol/mamachis// gzod nas rnam dag namamakha'i ngo bo nyid// sgyum snyagi rgyuchu zla 'dra ba ste// shin du dag pa nam mkha'i ngo bo 'di// gnas pa ma
mchis klog dang 'dra ba'i tshul// stonagyi'atha' stongaphyina'i mtha' yang stong// skyudang 'jigadang la gnas pa'i ngo bo steng// 'di nyid dag dngosanadadangos dan//'di dag thams cad rang bzhin ma
ma stong/ chos dbyings rang bzhin ngo gang lags de// sems can khams kyi rang bzhi'i ngo golags// sems can khams kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang/ sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin
ngo bo de// sangs rgyas chos kyi rang bzhin ngo bo gang// de'i chos kun rang bzhin ngo bo nyid// chos kun rangabazhin ngo bo gang lags pa// sangs rgyas zhing gi ngobo rang bzhin de// sangs rgyas
zhing gi rang bzhin ngo bo gang/ sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin de bo do// sangs rgyas byang chub rang bzhin ngo bo gang// de sa dbyangs rang bzhi ngo bo nyid/ chos rnams kun//
la rnam par dag pa 'di// gang tshe byang chub sems dpas de ltar mthong// de nas rgyal rnams yashes dam pa yin// byang chub mchog tu de ni lung ston mdzad// chos rnams
brdarang ming dang tha snyad tsam/ mnyam pa bsags te mi bden mang du btags/ de dag sngon chan lus kyang ma thob ste// de dag gi ni ming rnams kun tu brjod//mang ma mchis par ming ni rnam par
brtags// chos rnams stong ste rang bzhin rnam par dag 'jig rten 'du shes mkhas par rig nas ni// tha snyad shum la kun tu spyod par bgyi// chos kun sgyu ma bzhin du rig nas kyang// mi
bden snying po ma mas rmi lam 'du/ rnam smanasgyurang nyir mtshams sbyor ba tsam/ de la bden pa'i 'du shes yong mi bgyi// sa kun slabar bgyid cinge 'dzikaM pa lags// sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ste
mi bden pa/mgal me'i 'khor lo gzugs b.ran 'dra ba lags// rtag tu byis pa'i skye bo rmongs par bgyid// byis pas bdag dang bdag gir 'dir brtags nas// blun po sred pas gzir ba 'dir rmongs te
'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'khor ba na// sdug bsngal gyis non zhi ba thob mi 'gyur// 'gro ba'i 'jug pa 'di na yang dag min// gangag 'jug pa de na ma mchis te// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten lta ba
gtimug mdongs// rgyun tu yang dang yang du sdug bsngal red// lha rnams sdug bsngal 'chi 'pho'i ngos gcig pa/ mi rnams kyi ni sdug bsngal tshol khro lags// dmyal ba dag gi sngag bsngal gnod
pa rnams // gcig la gcig 'tshal dud 'gro rnams kyi lags// yi dgas sdug bsngal 'di na bkras rang skom// 'jig rten thams cad sdug bsngal rnams su nub// skyabs med gyur dang rten med/
gyur pa yi// 'jig rten sdug bsngal thams cad gzigs nas ni// drang srong chen po thugs brtse thugs rje can// sdug bsngal rnam par dgrol phyir 'byung bar mdzad// byang chub sems dpa'/
bskal mang rtse bar yang// rdul zhugs brtan zhing pha rol phyin la brtson// srid na mchis pa de 'dra mkhyen nas ni// 'dam las rgal te sems can rnams kyang 'dul// gang tshe chos rnams
gsog dang gsob tu gzigs// nam mkha' chad stong 'dra zhing snying po med// de dag bdag gi ngo bo ma mchis pas// bdag med dngos med dngos po med ma lags// mtha' rnams kun tu lta
ba kun stong na// byang chub rdul med rnam drag thob par 'gyur// skye dang rga dang gnod par bgyi ba gang// 'aning gnas pa gang lags su yang meg/ gang 'di'i skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi/ shod
las skyes dang shed bu de ma mchis// 'di ni bdag dang bdag ga ma mchis te// gang zagashed skyes shed bu yong ma as// 'di brdzun bdag po a ams dbang ma mchis// 'tsho ba'i 'jig
tsha@#// rten sgyu ma lta bu r 'jug/ byed pa ma mchis tshor ba po mams// 'on kyang las mas 'bras bu'i don yang mas// 'gro ba'i las kyis rkyen gyis rang bzhin 'byung
ka ban tshun du ni rgyu las rten par 'dus// dge dang mi dge'i las gang bgyid pa dang// gang zhig bsgoms dang gang du bgyis// yul na ma mchis phyogs na ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong 'on kyang
rnam par smin// nang dang slad rol bar ni mo gnas te// chos rnams gang du'ang 'phungs pa yongs ma mchis// de dag gang la'ang rten pa ma mchis la// rnam par smin pa slu bar yong ma bgyid//
skyes pa mi mnga' 'gag pa mnga' ma lags// mkhas pa rnams na go bar bgyi slad du// nyan pa la nasmra bas tshig kyang bstan// lta ba rnam par sbyang ba'i slad du bstan// gang gi 'du shes 'du shes
can ma mchis// mya ngan 'das mas su yang zha ma mchis// skye ba ma mchis mtha' gang mtha' de lags// bdag gi bdag med mtha' ni nam mkha'i mad+ma'// kun gyi mtha' mnyam par thob pa des//

zla sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab dam pa thob// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang na// skyo ba'i maTha' dang skye ba ma mchis mtho'// mtha' kun de ltar mnyam par mthong ba dang// lcags mdamatha'
yi sgo shes ldan pa dang// dus gsum mtha'a rnams la nae chags des// rgyal ba rnams kyirigs mchog thob par 'gyur// 'gro ba bcings las rnam par grol mdzad nas// zhi mchog mya ngan/
0 'das pa rnyes par 'gyur// 'gro kun rmi lam lta bu r des gzigs nas// 'dir ni ming dang gzugs la sems la chags// chos kun la ni rnam par dag pa'i mig/ zhi ba dang ni mIg g.yo

'gul thog/ sa rnams khrims cad sgra med skudachedag gzung du med 'ang dngos med rnam par dag/ de ba'i rgyal ba dam ba rnams kyi gdung// zhi ba'i ngo bo nyid de smon pa sangs//skyon med rims nadi cing skya
ngan khral spros te bar zhi zhing bsam mi khyag/ rgyal ba mchog rnams kun chos 'di dag/ gzung bral rang bzhin sgra dang skad ma mchis// 'gro la sman slad skyes bu dam pa yis// de yang yi ge
rnams kyi glu ngag zhi bstan// gang gis 'jig rten bla marang 'byung mthong// mthong nas kyang ni ya de la dar bgyid dang// khyad par 'gro ba'i chos kyang nyan pa yi// lha dang i rnams rnyed pa legs
parared// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su chos 'di ni// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pas 'ab tu bstan// gang dag ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'gyur ba rnams //thams cad kyang na mnyam
pa'atshos su 'gyur// sgro rnams thams cad brag chas dubyas// de ni brjodan rna bar sgrog par 'gyur// den tshul bzhin lcam gyi rgyur 'gyur te// chos so 'tshal gyi slad du btags pa tsam// chos kun
sgyu ma 'dra zhing g.yog lags te// de dag sems can slad du rnam mang phye// de dag dang bzhin ngo bo gang yin pa//de ni sems kyang rnam par dbyer ma rung//'jig rten ni sangs rgyas chos rgyal mchog/
chos kyi dbang phyug kun rig kun mkhyen// ston pa de la sloban de bzhin du// 'a phags pa kun gyis de nyid don kyang rtogs// byung ba gang lags pa dang da ltar dang// ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba
gang lags pa/ thams cad la gang thub pa skyes mchog gi/ ye shes 'jug ste thogs pa yong mi mnga'// skyes bu dam pa de yis de ring bdago/ gru ma mchis par byang chub mchog lung bstanaM/
bdag 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyur// bdag la som sam mchis dogs ma mchis// chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//
de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub/ cinas yun ring duganas par
bya ba'i 'i zung shig/ khyed kyinang nas su dag mdo sde 'dilta bu 'di dag gzung bar spro// denas der byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang/ lha'i bu khri stan las langs
sku te Da bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag gzung
bar 'tshal lo// rgyas par yang bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed kyis chos bsgrub pa ji lta bu s/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dzin
par byed/ de nas der byang chub sems dpa' yegs shes rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'itshes
gzung bar 'tshal na/ cibag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'as kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de ltar sgruban/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang
chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par ltas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mtshamasamamachis pamanyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyidadamathongan/
cibadag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyod doltarasgruban/ nga'i byang chub 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' lta ba med kyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang ma mthongan/slob pa'i chos dang/ mi slob pa'i chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang/
sangs rgyasakyi chos rnams kyang ma mthong na/ci bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhinano/ khyachub sems dang 'a chos thams cad la
khas 'che ba med par shin tu gnas pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rang bzhin ci yang 'tshal cingami'adzin/cibag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags ma/bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu de ni bzhinano// byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzugasakyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag mag gis mi lta/ sems kyis mi gtod/ dran pa mi skyed na/ ci bdag
ga pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa'i brjod du med pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag chos kyang mi ston/chosam lag
[” ]pa yang mi ston/ bdag la chos kyisgra yang mi 'byung/ chos kyi 'du shes la yang rtog par bgyid na/ bdag dam pa richos 'dzin bu lags sam/ bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhino//
byang chub sems dpa 'aming med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ga ngags ming dang mtshanam yang mi tan lags n/ cibadag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ rigs kyi bu de ni
bzhin no// byang chub sems dang gnam ma kha'am dzod kyi gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ gang la 'dzin pa'i chos rnams dang/
chos ma lags pa rnams mi mthongon/ yid g dam pa 'i chos 'dzin lags sam/ bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba'i stabs kyis 'gro
bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad l/ mi rigs mi g.yo mngon par zhen pa ma mchis na/ cibadag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de
ba zhinano// byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'joms kyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi yul la/ bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi la bdud kyi u ra la yang sangs rgyas kyi rjes
su mchis na/ ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lagrwa sam/ bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i stabs kyis 'gro bas gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ga chos
kyi dbyings kyang 'byedapar mi bgyid/ sems can gyi khams la ma gtogs pa gang/ chos kyir ngas la 'jug par mi bgyid na/ci dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi
bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang chos ciyang midamigs la/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang tshes kyi sgra yang byungan/cidi dam pa'i chos 'di
ba lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' kun nas bsrungs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdud kyi zhags pas kyang ma bcings la/ byang chub se/
dang 'i spyad pa yang spyod na/cad dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni bzhinano// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang chos thamA

cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar yang g par 'du ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid ro gcig par 'tshal na/cing dam pa'itshos ran pa lag sam/bka' stsalakha/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhinano// lu'i bu mtshan bzang
nyu// gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gangaskye yang skye la/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mcheda rnams 'byung pa yang mi 'dzin/ 'byung nang 'byung la/ da sems dang yid
du dogs par yang mi bgyidan/ cid dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka'astsal pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhinano// lha'i ba dris med pas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad drimam
sh+tsa/ mas pa dang/ snyigs ma ma mchis pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bar rig nas/ rgyu las byung ba las rnam par grol bar mi bgyiden/cidim pa'ichosa'adzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/
lha'i bu don bzhinano// lha'i bu sems can sgrol gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'adas gang soms can rnams kyang sgrol bar bgyidal/ bdagam mchis pa la nga' tshal/ bsgral nas kyang 'dzud par bgyid/
la tshu rol dang pha rol gyi 'gram na yang mi gnas na/cid dam pa'ichos 'dzinapa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu don bzhinano// lha'i bu dbang byed kyis gso la pa// bcom ldan 'das gang chos
thams cad la dbang yang thob la/ chos gang yang skyed pa yang mi bgyid/ 'gag par yang mi bgyid na/cidadam pa'ichos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de bzhinano// lha'i bu rgyal
bo bzang gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das gang sems can thams cad sems canamanyam pa dang/ chos thams cad chos mnyam pa dang/ zhing thams cad zhi mnyam pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams
cad sangs rgyas mnyam par rjes su songan/dadam pa'i chos zladzinapa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni di bzhin// lha'i bu legs par sems kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
chos ci dang mi sam shing sa pa' mi bgyid de/ mtshan ma'i brgyad na/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de'i de bzhin te/ deni de ba no// sring mout+pa las
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lags par 'tshal/ 'on kyang bdag mno bar rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyan/ci bdag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags am
bka lasum pa/ sring mo de ni di bzhinano// bu mo mu tig 'phreng gi ba so la pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bud med kyi chos rnams kyang mdamigs/ skyes ba'i chos rnams kyang ma dmigs te//
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi mchan nyid gang lags pa de/ bud med dang/ skyes pa'i chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid lags la/ mtshos de dag kyang tshos kyang m lagA/ chos ma lags ba dang ma lag te/
de'i slad du 'di ltar bdag ni skyed par mi bgyid/ khas len par yang ma 'gyodan/ cibadag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa ga bumo de ni de bzhin no// bu mo rin chen gyis gsol
pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang ma mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi go cayang bdag gis bgos/ de dag kyango gtan du bdag gis
ma mthongan/ cibadag dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa lags sam/ bka' sul pa/ bu tshadand bzhinano// bu mo med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ bcom lda'adas
bdag chos thams cad la yang/ chos kyi 'du shesami skyed la/ sems can thams cad la yang sems can gyi 'du shes mi skyed/ chos thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la
rnam par mi rtog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi khongs su yang chos thams cad 'dus par yang dag par mtho'/ de dag kaM kho su yang ma zhenapar ya nga dag par mthong na ! bzhi ldan/
la 'das bdag de ltar brtsonan/ cidam pa'i chos 'dzinapa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la pa/ bu mo khyed de ltar bsgruban/ dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa yang dag pa yin no
de nas bcom ldan 'dra lalha'i dbang bo brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bsam mi khyab pa'ichos rnam par nges pa'i srogos pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo rnams /
kyis 'di nam ba dang/ sgra dang/ brda sna tshogs kyis chos nyid de kho na glengs te/ chos gang la yang 'gal bar mi bgyidal/ chos thams cad kyang byang chub dang mnyam pa nyid du ston pa ni
ngomatshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u tika de bzhin te/ bu mo 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnam par nges pa ston pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas/ !
mang bo la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bzod pa thob pashastag go ko'u shi ka gzhananang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzungab dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgyas par bstan pa dang/ da ngazhin gshegs pa
mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung ba de dag la bstas pa'i phyir khyod la gtad do// de ltar byas na khyod kyis de bzhin
gshegs pa la mchod pa'i mchog byas par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnams grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags so// 'di ni bdag gis dbazhin
gangashe gas pa'i byin gyis brlabs kho nas rgyas par bgyi'o// ma 'ongs pa'i sems can chen po de dag la yang ba stabs par 'tshal lo// deci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das
bdag gis de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la/ bka' drin bsab pa'i rjom shog ste/ 'di ltar bdaganid bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phan gdags pas/ phan btags pa'i slad du'o//bcom ldan
'das gzhan ya ngacinas bdag bdud dang/ phyi'i rgol ba nges par bcol nas/ 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bu r tshes kyi rnam grwas 'di de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab du
gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ko'u shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yil zung shig dang/ bar dugacodapa tham cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rigasngags dang
byinagyis brlabs ngas bstan par bya ste/ rigs sngags dad/ gsang sngags kyi gnad dag gsos bdu thams cad dang/ phas kyi rgol ba thums cad kyang shani du tshar gcad pal
'gyural/ dmananag shigs pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di la nga sun ring du gnas pa ra 'gyuraro// tad+ya thA/ a b+ha la/ b+ha ya ba ge to/ b+ha a ba'i bo rgyun/ a b+hal dwade/ nirupadadrage/ anAkule daa
rgyu ku la sang go d+hani/ a gra he/ a ba b+ha dra/ ma kal de/ adapyado/ sha byu te dzi/ tordzob tu/ me sAtu dze/ u ba shA ma/ me khyudag tu/ go kha ya mA ne/ sade ta dar sha ni daa ba rud d+he/

sa hita an+d+he/ an+nAsid+d+hi/ a nu ta pa te/ sA ga re/ sU gur ba ti/ a g+hi ro/ badzrasan d+haM/ a ye/ ak+Sha ta/ pra b+ho/ dzA ti'i shi d+hani/ shud+ho b+he/ a ba b+ha sa ba ta/ sa ma bu yo ga/ sa ma
tshad/ a nud paro/ bud+d+ha a d+hiShAn/ shi la gshe tshu ne/ a na ti kra ma Ni/ a sang g+hatse/ nagro shI te// mAr ba 'am/ pa rA dza yot+taM TIg tAn/ lAnAn/ d+har mo lta nAn/ sangagrahItAn/
zla d+ham nAn/ udagA TaM tAn/ d+ham ning+ganAn// ko'u shakaragi sngags dang gsang sngags kyi gzhan 'dreg yani/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/
dka ra'i chos yongs su gzung ba'aphyo'i gsungs so// ragesngags dang/ gsang sngags kyi gzha 'dingegagase na/ rtsod pa 'badag po bdud thams cad tshar gcodapor 'gyuraro// de nas
[See ]bcom ldan 'das la/ tshangs pa kun dusnyad ga zhes bya bas bde skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rnam grungs 'dagazung bar bgyi/ dacang bar dgya/ rgyas par bgyi'o//
dpa'i me da du zhe nA/ bcom ldan 'das byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas pa tshor ba ni/ dkar po'i chos legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las bsngags pa'amed du'o// bcom ldan 'das
bgani/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byas ra gso ba dang/ byas pa tshor ba rjesasu dran zhing rjes su srung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'dig zung bar bgyi/ yongs su bsrudabar bgyi'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das 'a/ lha 'bubasod rnams 'dagus kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bzung na/ bsod nams ji
snyedatsam zhig skyed par 'gyur 'gas// nganas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lnga'abu de la tshags su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas skrun gyis phyogs bcu yi// zhing rnams ji
snyadangs mthong ba// de kun rin chen gang byas nas// ma gang sbyin pa sbyin byed la// gang zhig 'jig rten mgon po'i chos// sAng nas yongs su 'dzan byeng no// de bas ma lo bsod nams ni//
shani tumang du 'phel bar 'gyur// pasal pa'i bar du bzhugs nas ni// der rnams bstan pas bshad na yang// dam pa'i chos 'dzaning ya// bsod nams bdad ra so ngam 'gyur// chos kyi
rnams grangs 'di bstan pa na// lha khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug gas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// byang chub sems dga' sdug khri/
naso skyo la 'chos rnams la bzod pa skyes go/ stongagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig nagyi rams 'dis nga rnam pa drug dang/ mtshan ma chen po bcobargyadadu rab ga los par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/
shar phyogs mthon/ nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon/ naraphyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthon/ byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mthon/ lhaphyogs dma'o/ dbusam thono/ mtha'adama'/ mag
man/dbus dam 'bar gyur to/ galas rab tug mos/ kun turang shugayos// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg : kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab
chu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'od tu'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// snang ba chen pos skyong 'jig rten khyab par gyur to// me tog
chachon po yang bab go/ sil snyan dag kyang ma bkrol bar rang 'khrol zhung/ sa'i snyan dang/ klu dbyangs de dag las kyang sgra 'di lta dubyung// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/

las kyi rgol bathams cad kyis 'tshugs par byin gyis brlabs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'dirnam pa'adzakrug tu med pa 'i tshul du/ chos kyi dbyangos kyi phyag rgyas legs par btab bo zhes sgrakhyung ngo// klu'i
rgyal po rgya mtshos kyang stong gsum gyi stong chenapa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thamasacad khyab par mu tig gachar chenapo phab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa kun daga' bo la/
bka'agyul pa/ kun dga' de khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad bzungal/ gzhan dag la yang rgyus par yang dag par ston cig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dus chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis bzung
lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho/
zhus pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ klu'i bdag po'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya bar yang zug gi/ rin po che kun nas btus pa'achos kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'ale'u zhes bya bar yang zungashage/ bcom ldan

'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bodang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i bu dpal gyi gzi brjid dang/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang/ phyogs
bcunas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo dodag thams cad dang/ 'khor de dag thams cad dang/ lha dang ma dang/ lha ma yanadang/ driza'abacas pa'i 'jig rten yi
rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgyal chos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi ma khan po dzanam dudang/ pra dzA bar ma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sde la sogs bas/ bsgyur cing zhus pagatan la phab pa//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sAg ranAg rA dza po ri drod tshanAm mahA yA nasU tA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal ri rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thums cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di slebadag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po na/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas/ klu'i rgyal
po rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa na/ dge slong brgyad stong gi dge 'dun chen po dung/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenubo/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa mngon por shes
pa/ mngon par shes pa mang po dang/ brgya byinadang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyongab dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma lem
cidang/lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang thugs gcig tu zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dus bar mkhyen nas/ rgyu'i

u0f8brgyal po rgya mtsho'i bka' stsal pa// klu'i bdag po gyi ma 'jig rten gnas ba 'di ni les rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bskyodanas/ sems kyi des shes pa sna tshogs gyis/ las rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du bya ba

da0 mngon par 'du byed de/ de'i 'gro ba yang sna tshogs su gyur to// klu'i bdag po 'khor 'di dang/ rgya mtsho chen po 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa dang/ gzugs kha ma la pa ji sAd snangag la ltos/klu'i sa
po 'di dag thams cad red rang gi soms dang/ lus dang ngag dang/ yod kyi las dag pa dang/ mingagab sna tshogs su byas bas/ sna tshogs su gyur pa dag go/ soms nIgabrugs mdabs/ bstanadumang
pa/gzung du med pa'o// klu'i bdag po 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma bcos/ ma bsgrubs bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyidi/bdag po med pa bdagagi mdab/ yongs su 'dzani ba med pa'o// de dag las ji

ltar bsags pas/ bsgrubs pa sna tshogs su dusang ngag ste/ 'ad la byed pa bo gang u0f00ngamad do// klu'i bdag po 'di ltar chos bdag thams cad na bsam gyis mi khyab pa// sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngobanyid de//
klu'i de dag bod la byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pas/ chos thams cad basgrubs pas gnas pa'i mtshananyid phushes nas dge ba'i las mngon par 'du bya ba dgamapa 'du bya'o// de dgaba'i las
mngon par 'du bya ba dag mngon par 'du byed na/ bsgrubs pas gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnamasakyi phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched gangadag mngonapar 'grub pa de dgomadzes shing brtan
sdugal gzugs bzang ba dag tumangonopa 'grub bo// klu'i bdag po dbazhin gshegs pa'i sku bsod nams bye ba khrag 'gebargya stong las skyes pa/mtshan rnams kyis ji ltar brgyan pa dang/ ji ltar/
bsgrubs pa dang/ dpal gyis lha dang marebacas pa'a'ajig rten zal gyis mnan nas/ ma chags par bazhugs te/ gangan brgya stong phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba'i tshangs pa chen po 'di
dag mog mog por gyur nas/ re'anagashegs pa'i sku la lta na 'ang mge zi zo bor gyur la ltos/ klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' 'di dgagazugasadad/ mtshanadang/ lus dang/ rgyun rnams la ltos/ klu'i

bgado dadag tham sa cad 'dag ba'i las mngon par 'ong bya ba rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa brgyan bar bsgrubs pa'o// klu'i bdag po khyod kyi re kodad 'disang bsod nams thams cad las byung ba'o// klu bdag bo

brgya byinedang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lcam men dad/ nam mkhaM' ldangadang/ mi 'am cing/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma anib 'di dag gi bkod

ba gang yazhi pa de dag thams cad kyang bsod nams las byung ba'o// klu'i bdag po 'di ni gang dag las sna tshogs gzugs ma phyug cing dbyibs ma legs pa dang/ dbyibs legs pa dang/ lus rags shange chab rnams dang/

gang dag lus zhing chung ba de dag thams cad kyang/ rang rang gi sems dang lus dang ngag dang/ yadze kyi las dar ba dang/ ma de pe catshogasasu byas bas sna tshogs su gyurab dag go/ klu'abadag po dbas nas bdag ga'i bya bar

las kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ las kyi skyo gnas pa// las kyi rnam par smin pa la rten par bya'o// zhes klu'i bdag po khyed kyis de ltaraslobs sha'o dang/ las bdag gir bya ba dang/ lasakyi bgo skal la spyod pa//

[s ]las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa// khyod dag ba'i sa mngon par 'du bya ba blo 'jug par 'gyur ro// lta ba chud gson bar byed par mi 'gyur ro// chad pa dang/ rtog par lta ba la gnas pa/ram 'gyur ro//

khyed kyis spyan pa 'ganas rnams mgu bar byed par 'gyur ro// mgu bar byas nas kyang bsta stang byed par 'gyur ro// bas snyad byas pa'i rgyu las byung bas/ lha dang bcas pa 'a 'ag rten gyis bsti stang bya ba'i

'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi ngan 'grongan song ma khom pa 'is thams cad yang dag par gcod do// oM ga ge bo gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/bag ji ltar gyur cing nyane zhag rnamA

'gro zhig gu snyam du dag pa'i chos rnams la rab tu rtog pa'o// de ltar dge ba'i chos la rab turtogar mngabasam des ba'i sams las byuba'i chos rnams kyi go skabs ma 'byed do// dem dog ba'i rtsis srungs ted/

ba'i chos dang ldan pas// bsam pa dge ba'i sems can/ 'di lta ste/ sa sargyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sa/ngasargyas rnams kyi grogs dang 'grogs pa red ra 'gyur ro//

klu'adedagado de la dge ba'i chos rnams gang zhin/ dag pa'i chos rnams shes bya ban lhadad/ ji'i phun sum tshogs pa'i rtsa ba dang na to// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi skyo bdang
nato// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'aphyong chub kyi rtsa ba dang rten to// de la rtsa ba dang/ rtson gang zhe na/ gang 'di dege ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams so// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de
[n/]@#/ dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ srog gcodar/sbyong ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod dal 'gorar g.yem pa dang/ brdzun dusma ba dang/ bram dang/ tshig rtsub go dang/ tshagi
dkyil ba dang/ brnab sems dang/ gnodasams dang/ log pa lcab sbyong ba 'o// 'ad deg na dge ba bcu'i las kyi'am zhes bya ste/ 'jage rtan bodang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i pun sum tshogs
bya rnams kyi lceb dang rton to// klu bdagadodi 'asrog gcodapa sangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag rang du zhi bar byedapa'achosakhacu'athobago btsugang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bas sems can thams cad la/
ma'i gis da khyon yin no// desems sems can thams cad la byams pa/'damages pa la gnas pa yaneno/ de'i zhe sdang ga bag chags yang dag bar chadapa Aneno// des nang nyung bar 'gyur

ba'i sgrub pa longs su bzung pa mnano// des tshe ring bar 'gyur ba'i sa bon btab pa yin no// de la cha ma yin pa rnams kyang bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ spyod par byed do// bde bar zhal 'debadeba'i

sadapa dang/ sngage ba'i rmo 'am ma me thongs laneno// de'al ba na yang lha rnams srung bar byed do// de la sharag nyar ba medad man te/ sharoganyer ba 'bag la nyal yodapa yagano// ngan 'gro thams cad kyis mi

khagis pa dang/ sha khegos nas kyang 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skyo bar 'gyur te/ klu'abadag po srog gcod pa spangasad 'gyes bu gang zagana'ib tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos bcu po de dag

thog go/ srog gcod pa spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtse ba de gal te/named yang dag par rdzogs pa/'byang chud tu yongs su sngon/ dadage ba'il ba des byang thob na sems kyi dbang gis tshe tshad med par 'gyur ro/
klu'i bdag po ma byin par len pa sngoTas pa' sa su gang zag ni yode brtand 'chos b.ru thob bo// bcugang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ longs spyod che zhing/ de'i longs spyodade dag rgyal po dang/ rkun po dang/
mo dang/ chu dang/ mi mdza' ba dang ) de mtshams kyis mi 'phrogs pa yin no// skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ongs bas skye bo mang po ga' ba yin no/ 'o ba'i nyon mo ngas pa yin no//
nor 'khril ba rnams la dpartan tu rung ba yin no// phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams rnams su de'i bsngags pa brjod rung de la pha rol gyi gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med pa yin no/de'i
dge ba brjod pa'i sgra dang/ tshigs su bcad pa mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// bag tsha ba med par 'khor gyi nang du 'jug ste/zhum zhum po med par 'gyur// tshodang stobs dang/ kha dog dang bad/
ba dang/ spobs pa dang/ longs spyod dang/ phyug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur go/ de'i sems sbyin pa yang dag par 'gyedapa la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lus dang bral nas kyang bde 'gro

mtho'asi kyi 'jig rte nadu lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te klu'i bdag po de ltar ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bunang zag ni yid brtan pa'i chos bcu po dedagi thobago// mkhyin par len pa grangs ba'i
dag ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs gusngon/ de dag ba'i rtsa ba des/ dbazhin gshegs pa nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i yi shes can du rang gi

mngon par shes pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa 'tshogs par 'tshang bar 'gyur ro/ klu'i bdagakho 'dodapa la log par g.yem pa sbyadas pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ mkhas pas
( bsngogs pa'i chos bzhi thob bo// khazhi legapa'an/ 'dit+ta ste/ dwabang posdom pa dang/ rgod pa las yang dag par 'da' ba dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsngags pa dang/ chung ma mi 'phrog pa
sta[？]klu'i bdag po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zaganamakhas pas bsngags pa'i chos bzhi po ded 'thobago/ 'dodapa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba de gal te
'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su sngon/ de dag pa'i rtsa ba des// smyos bu chen po'i mtshan mdoms kyi ba sbubs su nub pa 'thob bo// klu'i bdag po brdzun du sgrub spangs pa'i skyes bu
( gang zal zhi/ lta dang/ mas bsngags pa'i chos brgyad thob bo// brgyad gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ ut+pa la'i dro'i byung bas kha yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ba dang/ 'jig rten thams cad
kyi tshad mar 'gyur ba dang/ lha dang mi dang 'a bas dpango gcog bor 'gyur ba dang/ dbugs 'byin pas 'byung bo rnams dogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang/ rtag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs bas
[F]lus dang/ dag dang/ goms yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang/ tshig bakhrul ba med pas mchog tu dga' ba chung bar 'gyur ba dang/ tshigs gzung bar 'os pas ngag zhan par 'gyur ba dang/ shas 'ab:

thob pas lta dad mi rnams kyi nangan khanam thob med par 'gyur ba yin te/ klu'i bdag po brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i skyes bu gang khrag ltadangs bstags pa'i chos brgyud de de dag thob go/ brdzun dusmob spyongs

ba'i dag pa'i rtsa ba der la ta bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ de dag de'i rtsa ba dag dad na ra'i rdzasasu'ajug pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po phrama'i tshogasangs ra'i
skyes dus nga bragan mo phyed pa ldathob bo/ lnga gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan gyi gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'da' bas lus mi spyod pa thob pa dang/ gzhan dag gi la chags pa mdangs/

g.yog mi phyed pa thob pa dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid ches pas dad pa mi byed pa thob pa dang/ sgrub pa snying por byed pas chos las mi phyid pa thob pa dang/ mi slubasamadza' bo mi phyed pa thob pa ste/ klu'i

bdag po phrama'i tshig sbyangs pa'i skyes bu gang brag nami phyed pa lnga po de dag thob bo// phramatshig sa ngas pa'idagaba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su tso na/ de dag

ba'i rtsa ba des g.yog mi phyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams can kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de ri 'i khe dbye bar mi nus so// klu'i bdag po tshig rtsub pa spangs
pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ ngag gi las yongs su dag pa brgyad thobago/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'dalto ste/ tshig tshan pa dang/ phan pa'i tshig dang/ rigs pa'i tshig dang/ 'jam

pa'i tshig dang/ gzuba'i tshig dang/ ma nyan pa'i tshig dang/ bonAng po dga' ba'i tshig dang/ mi smad pa'i tshig yin te/ klu'i bdag po tshig rtsub po spyas pa'i skyes bu gang zag zhingag khog 'as yongs su

dag pa brgyad po de dag thob bo// tshig rtsu ba ro padas pa'i dgo ba'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dungachug tu yongs surtson/ dadag pa'i rtsob das de bzhi gshegs pa tshangs pa'i
s+saskad bsgrags pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po tshig bkyal pa sbyangs pa'i skyes bu gang zagan gtsag tungs pa/gsum thob bo// gsum gang zhan/ 'di lta ste tshig ranar samakhas pa
rnams gceg tu nges par dga' ba dang/ 'an legs par blon rasa'agacig tu nges par de 'i blo bden pa la 'gro ba dang/ bcos mam yin par ma dza' bas gcig tu nges par lta dang/ mi'i chab nyid thob pa/

yin te/ klu'i bdag po tshigabakyal pasbyangs pa'i skyes bu gang zagan gcig tu nges pagasum po de dag thob bo// tshig bkyal pa spangs pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba de gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i byang chub du yongs

susmon/ de dag ba'i rtsa bdas khyad par lung ston cing/ gzhan dumagasungab dbazhanigashogs par 'gyur ko klu'i bdagapo bsnabasems pa sa pa'i skyagadugang khraganaM/ dbang po lnga thob bo// lnga gang zhan/ 'di

[z]ltaste: dang pom tshang ba med pas/ lus dang ngag dang/ sems la dbang ba thob ra dang/ dgra thams cad kyis mi brdzi bas langos skyonadang/ dbad phyug la dbang brgya chen po thob pa dang/ bsod nams kyi

dbang gis de'i saMms las spyod pa dang/ yongs su ston pa rgya chen po thams cad la 'gro ba dang/ dga' ba mchog thob pas/ rgyal po dang/ dbang pos mchod pa dang/ sngon phrag dog med pas led spyod jiltar

mon pa rnams de las stong phrag brgya 'gyur du khyad par 'gyur ba thob pa ste/ klu'i bdag po brnab sems sdudas pa'i skyes bu bang 'ganadabang ro lnga po de dag thoba'o// brnab sems spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de gal te ban
nad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ da dag pa'i rtsa ba dag 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa'i de bzhin gang lags pa ston pa gcig pur 'gyu/ klu 'badag po gnod sems spangs pa'i
skyes bu gang zugan ) yidebade ba khyed pa'i chos brgyud thob bo// brgyad gangashan/ 'dirti ste/ de'i sams rnam par mi 'tshe ba la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang/ de'i sanas gnod sa nas rab tu zhib la 'gyur
ba dang/ de'i sams rtsod pa med cing/ 'thab pand pa la 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang/ de nas drang zhing rten la dag pa la 'gro bar 'gyurab dang/ 'phags pa'i skya bor grags par 'gyur ba dang/
sams cad thams cad la bde bar dga' zhing/ byams pa'i sems phan pa'i dngos pa'i dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ bde ba la mngon par dga' zhing dang ba mang la/ sbyakho mang pos bsti stang bya bar
@#/ ba ra ba dang/ sems snag tsha'i 'ganu lung bas/ chos pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob pa dkonab ra 'gyur ba cu/ klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ yid
bdabar byed pa'i chos brgyad po de dag thobago/ gnodasams sbas pa'i dga'i rtsa ba dag la takhanand ra yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ dadagaba'i rtsa ba ragasos thogasar
nad pa'i de bzhin gshag par blta bsun ngogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po log par lta ba sngas pa'i skyes bu gang zagani/ yon tan gyi chos bcu thob bo// bculang zhan/ 'di lta ste/
bsam pa dag par 'gyur zhing grogs po dag pa rnyed par 'gyur ba yin// las kyi rnam par smin pa la ni chos bas/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa yin/ lharasangs rgyas 'dzin gyi gzhan
lha ma'adzan pa yin/ ngomatshadang bkra shis dang bral bas lci ba drang ba yin/ grogs lhadangam yon gyi dud 'gro'i gnas dang/ gshAni rje'i 'jig rten pa grogs su mi 'gyur ba yin/ bsod nams
sbyangs pas khyad par 'gro ba yin leg/ pa thams cad mdu pas/ 'phags pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin/ 'jigatshogs la lta dang bral zhing sdig pa thams cad yongs su spyas pa yin/ yang dag
bar song zhing yang dag par zhugs pasasgrib pa med par mthong ba ni/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang dumakhom pa dang dul ba yin te/ klu'i bdag po log par lta bsangasapa'i skyes bu gang zag ni/ yon

tanagyi chos bcu po de dag thob bo// 'gog par lta bslangs pa'i da le ba'i rtsa ba degal tabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ dag ba'i rtsa ba dag de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma ba/
