du'agyur te/ mngon par shes pa tshur ba'i de bzhinugshegs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'dod gzhi'i tshagi rtan pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pas/ ban/

medwapa dang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bar gyi rtsa ba drang don to/ bzlob na mi dge ba bcu'i 'das kyi lam rnams te/ dadag shas charab snyan cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas na sems can dmyal brgya'o//

'bri ni dud 'gro'i skyel zhus kyi rgyu// chudad na ba/ shin rje'i 'jig rtanagyi rgyu'o klu'i bdag mo de 'asrog gcod pa bstan cing bsgoms te mang dutsusan/ sanasazhanadachu la bab 'di do// dud 'gror skyon
su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'di do/ denas gal tami rnams kyi nang du skye na yang/ rnam pa smin pa gnyasemangon pa sgrubasta/ tshe thung ba dang nadamang bar 'gyur ba'o/ dbyin len
pas nagi mas can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'ded// de nas gal te mi rnams kyi so dmyas na yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon pa'ang
ste to las spyod chung ba dang/ thunamongagi longasaspyod du 'gyur ba'o// 'dod pa la leg pa ga lam rasan/ sems can dmyal bar khrid do// da'agro'i skyel nas su khrid do//
gshin rje'i 'jig rtenadu khrid do// denas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang/ rnam par sman pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/ g.yog 'khor brtan du mi rung ba dang/ 'gran zla
dadabarus pa'i chung mar 'gyur bgo brdzun du smra bas sems can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i skyo gnas su khride do/ gshani rje'i 'dzig dran du khrid do// de nas lo la tami rnams kyi nang du/
na yang/ rnam pa sbyin pa go duse man par sgrub ste/ skur ba mang ba dang/ gzhan gyis bslu bar 'gyur ba'o// phra sa nasems can dmyal b.radido// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gti
rje'i 'jig rten du 'dego/ de nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang da sanayang ma par smin pa gnyiso mngonapar bsto/ g.yog 'khor ma' dum pa dang/ g.yog 'khor ngan par 'gyur ba'o// tshig rtsub
bos nasems canadamyal bar 'di de// dud 'gro'i phyuganasasu 'di do/ gshinaN+Da'i 'jig rten du 'dego/ nag gal te ma rnams kyi nang du smyugan yang/ rnam par smin pa gnyis mngon par sgrub ste/
zlayodi ma 'ong ba thos pa dang/ 'thab mo'i tshig du 'gyur pa'o// tshig pakyil rasanusems can ma la bar khrid do// dud 'gro'i gnas su khride do gshin rje'i 'jigarten du khrid do// de nas gal te'i
rnams kyi nang du skyes nayang/ rnam par smiMnang gnyisimangon pa'osgrubasto/ gzung bar 'osarapa'itshigs yinang dang/ ma des pa'i spobs par 'gyur ba'o/ brnab sems kyisazhasim canargyal bar khrid do//

tsa10 dud 'gro'i skye gnas su khrided// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khrid do// denas gal te mi rnams kyi zhing du skyes na yang/ rnam par smin pa ga la'i mngon pa'i sgrub ste/ chogamishes pa dang/ 'dod pa che bar 'gyur

ba'o gnon sems kyi zhisi mkha can dmyal bar khrid do// dud 'a gro'i skye gnas su khrid do// gshin rje'i 'jig rtan du khrid do/ des gal te mi rnams kyi zhing du skyesan yang/ rnam par smin par gnyis mngon par
sgrub ste/ mi ldan par 'dod pa dang/ gzhan gyis gnod par bya bar 'gyur ba'o/ lego par lta bas na sems canadamyal bar khridido// dung 'gro'i skye gnas su digo gshin rje'i 'jig rten du khridid/ de
nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na yang/ rnam par sminapa gnyis mngon par sgrung lta/ lta bangan par ltung ba dang/ g.yo sgyu can du 'gyur ba/ klu'i bdag por ltar na mi dag ba bcu po 'a di dgag
bsdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po tshodamed pa yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ klu'i bdagakho di la srog gcod po pAs pa'ibyung chub sems dpas sbyin ba phyogin/ 'chos spyodachab r 'gyur/ 'dos
sbyodazhi 'thog ga ba dang/ ri bar 'gyur// byang chub sems pa'i spyad pa spyod pan yang gzhan gyis gnod pa zhu ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'das par 'gyurago klu'i bdag pom byin par
'an pa spangs pa'i bu chub sems dpas sbyin pa sbyin/ longs spyodachab r 'gyur/ longs spyod ma 'a rdzogs pa dang/ dngos po thams cad la mi ltabar/ yos su gtong ba can du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
[z/] rgyu/ dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag pa bsgrubs bas/ blashamed pa'i chos nyid par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag kho 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spos pa'i/
byang chubs mas dpas sbyin pa tshunan/ 'angosaspyodache b.ra'agyur/ las sbyodam 'dzugs pa dang/ chung ma migayom par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang m dang/ budang chung
ma la su yang sdang ba'i sems kyis lta bar mi 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po brdzun du skyob sras po'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byinan/ log spyodachab r 'gyur/ 'bos spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang/
skur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur ba'inatanasrung bar 'gyur ro// byang chubs mas dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan yang ji skad smras pad bzhin byedad/ yid dam la brtan par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po phra ma'i
tshig spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byinan/ 'as sbyoracha bar 'gyur/ 'angs spyadama'aphrogs pa dang/ g.yog 'a khoramathud par 'gyur khro/ byang chub sanas dpa'i dpaspyod pan yang bsam
zla pa 'thun pas byang chub sems dpa'i gsog 'khor 'thob bo/ klu'i bdag po tshig rtsub po smras la'i byang chub sems dpasasbyin pa byin/ lagaspyodachab r 'gyur/ longs spyodami 'phrogs pa dang/

gar ba'i tshig tu 'gyur/ btsun pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// byang chubs nas dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na yang/ 'khor mi ma gu bar su yang mi 'gro'o/ klu'i bdag po tshog bkyal ba sbas pa'i byang chub sems dpas
sbyin pa yin/ lengs spyod che bar 'gyur/ saspyod mi kha phrogs pa dang mnyam par 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/ yid ches pa'i tshig du'agyu'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ tha tshon thams
cad gacod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po brnabasags sngangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin// las spyod che sar 'gyur/ las spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang/ 'phos spyod/
dang/ yongs su spyod pa rgya chenango la de'i sems 'grobar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang/ rgya chenapo la mos shing dbang chapar grags par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po gnod
sems sbyangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas spyin pa byinan/ longs spyodachapar 'gyur/ 'brongs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang/ mdzes pa dang/ sbyobo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyura'o//
byang chub sems dpa'ispyad pa spyod pa na yang/ thogs pa med pa'i blo dang/ thogs pa med pa'i sems dang/ dbang po ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ro/ klu'i bdag po log par lta ba spangs ba'i byang
chub sems dang sa sbyin pa byonan/ longs spyod chapar 'gyur/ las spyod mi 'brogs pa dang/ sangs rgyas la dad cing yang dag bar lta ba'i khyim du skyago dungachub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan
yang/ sangs rgyas la lub dang/ chos nyan pa dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyonabakurabyed pa dang/ byang chub sems bskyed pa dang/ mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag ro de ltar dgab bcu las
bya// kyi lam 'di de sbyin pas brgyanan/ 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ro// dag ba bcu'i las kyi 'am 'di deg 'de tshul khrims kyis brgyanan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tham cad kyi don smon
pa yongs su rdzogasapar 'gyur ro// dag ba bcu'i las kyi bka' de deg 'di bzod pas brgyan/ mtshan dang/ dpe byad bzang radang/ sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
re bzhin da gto/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyanan bdud phyi'i rgo' ngabartson pa dang// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par 'agyur ro// bsam gtan gyi brgyan na/ dran pa dang/ blo gros dang/
rtogs pa dang/ tshashas pa dang/ dga' ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyis brgyanan/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro// byams pas brgyanan/ semA
can thams cad la khong khro khamed pa 'i sems su 'gyur ro// snying rjes brgyanan/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gyur ro// dga' bas brgyan na/ kum pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro//
btang sogs kyis brgyanan/ rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyan/ sems can thams cad yongs susminapar byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye
pa/ b.ragazhag pas brgyanan/ lus dang/ tshor ba dang/ soms dang/ chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong bas brgyanan/ mo deg ba'i chos thams cad spongang dang/ dag/
[/]ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyanan/ 'u dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang bo lngas brgyanan/ dad pa brtan pa dang/ brtson 'grus 'bar ba
dang rmongs pa med pa dang/ sems las su rung ba la mkhas pa dang/ tonamongs pa thams cad spong ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// stobs kyis brgyan na/ rdzi ba med cing dngul ba dang/ rtog pa thams
bud 'joms par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag gis brgyanan/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ro// lan gyis brgyanan gang dag pa'i shingashas 'grub par 'gyu'o//
zhi bo nas kyis brgyanan/ rtenangs pa thams cad 'gas par 'gyur ro// lhag mthong gis brgyanan/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i gsab dang ye shas su 'gyur ro// bas
brgyan na/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyichos bde ba thob par 'gyur ro/ klu'i bdag po mdor na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lan 'di deg gsestobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi'i jigs bgazhi
thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa nas/ sos rgyus kyichos thams cad kyi ber dag thob pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'an 'di
dag rgya cher rnam par dbye ngas brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyis shig/ klu'i bdagakho 'di lta ste/ dparan/ sa la gnas pa'i grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang//
yul 'khor dang/ rgyal bo'i pho brang 'a khor thams cad dang/ rtswa dang shingagal ba dang/ sman dang nags tshal thams cad dang/ lo mtha' thams cad dang/ sa bon gyi tshogs
thams cad dang/ 'byungalo'i tshogs thams cad dad/ le tog thams cad skyed pa dang/ rmo brko ba bya ba 'byung ba de dgagaganasas yin no/ klu'i bdag po de bzhin dudagab bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
zla kyang lta dang/ mir skyo ba'i rtanAto// slob pa dang mi slob pa'i 'bras bu brnyed pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rangasas rgyas kyi byang chub dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rten yin pa nas/ sas rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rtan yanano// bcom ldan 'adas kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho dang/
dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dgadang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal bo rgya mtshos zhus pa zhig khyab theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogasarnyo// na dachapa'i nang nas ba kol
bar snang ngo// rgyal gyi mkhan po ba dzami dradang dAnashA la dang/ mun ba ma dang/ nuchen lo tsab ban de ye shes sde'abogs pas bsgyur
bcosanas gtanal phab pa/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sA ga ranAgarAdzanga' brodi nAm mahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal kho
rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po bzhi do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshol la/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan ! bcom ldan
'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnasan/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang du gung po dang thabs gcig tupajug
te gnas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho' bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po sa kyis de bzhi de chos kyi mdo 'dodi gabarjodan/ gang dgabarjodang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi
stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dubyed thams cad mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shasaparab tu 'jug pa
dang/ brag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo rnams kyis bstanapa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa zad pa'i shes de rang du 'jug pa dang/ mya nalas 'das pa'i zhi ba byang chub sems dang sems dpa 'chenapo rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu
'jug pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos kyimado bzhi po'adi dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bkar/
snya'anag/ dag slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa lam kur la bstod do// 'phags pa klu'i rgyal ba rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg
pachen mo'i bde rdzogs snyo/// rgya garagyimakhanangosu len dra bon+ti dang/ zhun gyi 'tshab pan rnyes ye shes sdes bsgyucing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
@#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan dro t+tarArArika bya ka ra NanAm mahAyAn sUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bumo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'disir bdagags thos pa'i dusagag na/ bcom ldan ' dus yangs pa canan tshal chen po 'khang pa brtsegs pa'i
[– ]/gnas na/ dgra bcom lnga brgya tsam gyi dag slong gi dag 'dun chen po thams cad kyang cang shes kyisams dad ldan r bya ba byas ba/ byed pa byas la/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa//
sridipar kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tuson pa shastag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//
byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ sngokas pa thogs pa zhen pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ mi skya ba'i chos la bzod pathob
pa mngon par shes pa lda dang ldan pa/ tshig thogs pa med pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa shes kyi re 'dod pa'i sems dang bral ba/ zangagrang med par chos ston pa
chos zab mo la 'bod pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa// bdud kyi 'galas yang dag par 'das ra/ las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa// chos kyirang bzhin la rje tsam med pa//
bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa bzhin 'dzum pa/ khrog nyer med pa/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bal mkhas pa/ sems yongs su ma
gdugs pa/ spobs pa rgyunama'achad pa// chos mnyam pa nyid la bzod pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnang/ tshig gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'dun
phrag kha cig tu ston pa'i ye shes lamakhas pa/ 'a das pa dang ma 'os pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i chos thamasacad sgyumadang/ smig rgyu dang/ chu zla dang/ rmi lam dang/ mig yoradang/
brag cha dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ dbon pa dang/ g.yo ba med pa dang/ gzung ba med pa dang/ nam mkha'i ngo bo nyidi lta bu mos pa/ shA
[sp]bya/ rab dang ye shes tshad med pa'i mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyisams kyi spyod pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sams can gyi mos pa jalta ba bzhin du chos stonapa//
yi: sams thogs ra med pa/ chos la sprad pa dang bral ba/ nyiba'i 'on mongs pa med pa'i 'bod pa dang ldan pa/ chos lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zharimatha' yas pa'i yon tan/
bkod pa yongs su zin pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun duman du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ kun nas ldang ba dang/
lta ba dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ bag la nyalasna tshogs sbyong ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa sha
stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ spyan ras gabregs dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen thob dang/ 'byung dkar dang/ sbos kyi glang poche dang

naM brtson pa mi gtong dang/ ma'i snying po dang/ gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang/ spos kyi 'od gzer zab du gtong pa dang/ 'brug sgra dang/ 'od gzer rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po dang/ sridamed kyi bu dang/
'gan po che dang/ lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang/ namamakha' mdzodadang/ snang ba'i rgyal po dang/ mthong dga' dang/ sems ma sgrol dang/ rtag brtson dang/ rtag tu dgod dga' dbang po
dang/ ngan song sprod dang/ rdo rje'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang/ 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas rnam par gnon pa dang/ mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ dpal

gyi snying po dang/ pad+ma'i dpal dang/ ba glang spos kyi glang po che dang/ spobs pa zub mo dang/ slobs pa chen po dang/ chos 'phags dang/ chos kyi rang bzhin the tshom med gyur dang/ seng ge'i stabs su
'gro ba dang/ 'jigs pa kun sal dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sal ba dang/ tang ga chen po mngon pa sgrogs pa'i sgra dang ! brjod med dang/ spobs pa brtsigs pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a
sams dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po rnams dang/ sna chen po 'a gtogs pa rnams
dang grong khyer dang/ ljongs kyi mi rnams dang/ zhabs 'bring gnyug ma rnams dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ khyim bdag rnamasakyis bkur stir byas/ byamar byas/ rimor byas//
mchod par byas te/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer napon tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnasan bzhugs so// de'i cho yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen pon/ la tsi dris med par grags pa zhes
bya ba phyug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod chab longs spyod mang ba/ mdzod rangang banang zhagi la gnas te/ del chungamadri med ma zhes bya bamadzes pa ltan sdug pa/ kha dogababrangapo rgyas/
pamchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ zla ba dgu 'das pa dang/ de las bu mo gzugasabazang ba/ mdzes ba lta na sdug pa yan lag dang nying 'a ga thams cad legs par rdzogs pa

zhig btsas so// bu mo de btsas ma thag tu khyi de thams cad snang ba chenapos khyab par gyur cing/ sa chen po yang nang du g.yos par gyur phyi rol gyi sgo khang gi za rag las kyang mar khu dang 'bru mar dug/
rang tu'adzag cing zhan pa dang mgon med pa dang/ bkren pa dang sdug phongs pa gang yin pa dag bdag yongs su spyodado// yangs pa canagyi grong khyer chen ron rnga bo che dang rdadang/ khar rda dang/

sil snyanyudang/ phag rdob pa gang yin pa de thams cad kyang m brdungasaporasgra 'byin par gyur cing/ me tog gi char chen po dgakyang rab tu bab par gyurakhyim gyi klobazhir yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab
tung ba'i gter chen po bzhi byung zhing kha bya ste/ kun tu snangeb ragyur to// bu'o debatsusam thar du dus dmib byin cing tshim mi glog la// ltag par yang so b.ru thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshogs/
su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ sdig las byas pas 'dir nagatsangan yi// lus sum skye yid du 'ong nga ra ni// sdig las byas pas 'di na 'angs spyod dag/ 'byor pa'i khyim rnams su yang mi skye'o//
sbyin dul pa dang dag sdom dang bag yod rung// gus dad bcas par bla ma bsnyen bkurakhagi/ gya nom rang bzhin las kyis rtag tuni// longs spyod bdag nyidi chen po 'i khyim du 'grub// 'dren pa

rgyal ba 'od srungs bsod snyemasu phu'i// yangs pa can gyi grong du zhugs pa na// bdag gis khang bzangs steng nas mthong gyur cing// mthong bas de ni bdag yid dang ba drag// de tshe bdag yi rab dudang
'gyur na// khad 'ame togam tsing byug pa med// phyom samad dros dang gomamad pas// ston pa 'di'i tsasi mchod bya snyam sems// de nas bdag gis sgra thos sangs rgyas ni// 'gro'i ba dgrol

phyi'i zangashrangand spyod cing// 'jig rten brtse phyir thugs rje bskyedanas ni// sangs rgyas bsod snyoms med du 'jig rten brgyan// gal tergyal ba de dag mchod 'dod na// sangs rgyas nyid phyir khyod kyis
smon lam thob// byang chub sems bskyed brtan gyur gang yin pa/ de'as lhag mchod srid pa gsum na med// bar snang sgra thos de nas bdag gis// mtshanamchog spras pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang//
byang chub phyinutsha g.yo yodi skyes nas// khang pa de nas rangagi'u samachos te// bar snang ta la sridi la 'duganas// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// de bzhanirgyal ba 'od srungs/
de yi sku// rinachen dang lhan bo 'dra ba mthong// rgyal ba'i mthusazhibadag gi lag mthil du// man da ra ba'i phur ma che byung zhing// de dag bdag gis 'od srus gtor ba dang// ma rtog gdugs
sugyuranasam pa'i la gnas// gang dag phyogasab cu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa// mtshan rgyas sku brgyunade dag bltas na yang// dzaltara'od srungasasteng na 'dug pa ltar// de dag la yang m rtog
gdugasanyid snang// mkha' la gnas bzhin bdagagisatshig smras pa// khas la pachu rdulastad du spyadabuzhing// byang chub mkhabadag phyirami ldog li// bdag ni sangs rgyas rkang gnyis

mi gtsor gyur cig/ bdag gi seng ge'i nga ro de khros nas// de stong phragabaganyis tshang ba yi// lha maltaminaganod nasrin po rnams // sangs rgyus byang chub mchog la yang dag zhugs// thos nas sum cu rtsa
gsum lhar skyes shing// lus bzang byas pa chud zaram gyur pas// de nas shi 'phos 'dzam gling 'dir 'ongs kyis// de phyir skye bo rnams kyis bsod nams khyos// gang tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gnas gyur pa/
de tshab dag gis rgya la bshAka thub mchod// bdag ni 'dod dang longs spyod lus mi gter// rgyal ba yang dang yang du mchod par bya// bdag gis bsod nams rnam smin de mthong zhing// nyin gcig 'dra
b.ratsho rabs brgya yang dran// bdag 'dir skyes pa'i dbal yang 'di 'dra na// mkhas pa su zhig rgyal la gus mi skyid// de nas ka bumonges tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ cang mi zer bar 'dug
par gyurato// de'i sngon gyi dag ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu ba thunapas lus la lta'i gos rin po cha dag gon bzhin du byungab gyur nas// de'i lus las zla ba las shin tu khyadapar du
'phags pa'i 'o dgaze gsar gyi mdog du snang ba dag kyang byung ngo// de nas pha ma dag gis de'i mongezla mchog ces bya bar btags so// de nas bu mo zlumchog de skad cig dang thang cig dang
yud tsam gcig gis 'di lta stedaper na/ bu mo le brgyad 'don pa lta bu'i na tshod du kun tu snang do// des sa'i phyogs gang dang gang dag tu 'akrungabadang/ 'chag pa dang/ 'dug pa dang/ ma'abacas

par gyur pa de dang de dag tu 'od gakhreragasar gyi mdog lta bu dag snang bar gyur to// de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan sa mchog dri dag dang/ khas kyang ut+pa la sngon po'i dri dag byung bar gyur
to de nas yangs pa can gyi tshong dpon dang/ khyim bdag dang/ rgyal bu rnams dang/ de 'gazhanapa rigs che ba dang/ rigs mtho ba dag gis/ bumo zlumchog galus kyi

gzugs dang/ kha dog yongs su rdzogs pa thos so// thos nas kyang 'a dod pa'i 'a dod chags kyis sems shin tudakris par gyur cing/ so so nas 'di snyam du sems te de bdag gi chung mar gyuran ma rung snyam mo//

dan skye bo phal po che rnams de thob par bya ba'i phyi sams brtson par gyur te/ de dag las kha cig nil tsa byi dri mamed par grags pa lasnyan par byed bstanapar byed cing/ bstanadakur byed par gyur to// kha
cig/nor dudang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ rdo rje dang/ bi skyurmadang/ spug dang/ an da rol dang ! dung dang/ man shel dang/ zhashasaru bye ma snyad dgasbyin zhing 'dod pa skyed par byed
do kha cig ni nor dang/ 'bru dang/ khyim dang/ 'khongs sbyodadang/ kha zas dag ston par byed do// khacig gi bran dang branamo dang/ las mi dang/ zho shas 'tsho ba dag la gsad pa dang 'ang
[pi]a/ ba dang brdeg pa lasogs pa dag gis 'jig pa ston par byed do// kha cig ni lo tsaphyi drin yod pa rogrags la 'di skad cesazate/ gal te khyod kho bo cag la bu mo zla mchog 'bul
bar mi byedan/ dmyi'i khyod la des sdug bsngal 'byung bar bya shang/ khyod la gnod pa chen po yang bya'o zhes zer ro// des 'tshicu dri ma med pa 'gags pa 'disnyan du snu ma la dbung dab/
lcagasanas bdag bzung zhing bcom ste/ bumo yang grogs 'badagakyang srog dang phul ba mi 'gyuragrang snyatshanas/ skrag cing stangs la sgyid lug cing/ sngazang zhes byed pa gyur nas/ de dran
nyams shing bzhan gyi sro shi la/ rab tu ngu zhing mchim thugs te/ mig mi 'dzums par bu mo zla mchog la lta'o// bu mo zlumchog gis rang gi pha ngu shing yishi la/ gdong mchi mas yog cing
yul yul por gyur pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de la 'di skad ces/ smras so// yab pa'i slad du 'di ltarab kums shing bshumasamo dag rab tu klog par mdzad lags// dems

la tsebyi drom med par grags pas/ bumo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'di ltar khyon khrog cing khyod kyi phyi grong khyer thams cad du thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dag kun tu byung bar khyod kyis mi shes
sam: de'i phyir dpung dag rtogs pa shingebcom ste/ khyod phrogs par tsho 'gyur grang snyams demasamachinabyung ba yinamod// de nas bumo zlumchog gis rang gi pha latshigs su bcad de
0waM smras pa/ gal te 'dzam gling sams can thams cad dag/ sred med bu 'dra'i brtson 'grus thob gyur cing// de dag mtshon thogs bdag sman rgyug gyur kyang// de dag rnams kyis bdag gzhom rdom thag/
byams sems ldan la dug dang mtshonam tshugs// rolangs dang ni'i thigs pa gzhanami 'byung/ byams sems tha ba zhesdang ma mchis pas/ byams pa'i sems la gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// yang
bdag 'jig rten dag labyams pa che// na bu bdag bzhin 'gro la dga' bar gnas// nam yang gzhan la sdug bsngal mabagyis pas// de phyir nganabusdug bsngal mi 'gyur yab// chags bral nam yang
'a don chags mamachis shing// byams pa yongs bsgoms zhe sdang ma chis ma lags// bdag la chags sdang gti mug ma mchis te// de phyir ngan du gzhan gyis mi thub yab// yab dang yum la byams
pamachis pa ltar// 'gro ba kun la rgyun du bdag de bzhin/ ]yab gang 'jig rten dag la de 'drar byams// de sems kyang gzhan gyis gnod 'gyur// namam khas dog sa 'dzin par ma
'gyur cing// lhun po yungs 'bru'i nang du gnas gyur tam// rgya mtsho chen po gnag rjes zhugs gyur kyang/ bdaga'ajoms brgyad par rdo thog ma mchis yang/ danas dum
zamchog gis tshigs su bcad pa dedagosmras nas rang gi pha ma la 'di skad cesasmras so// yab yum de'i slad du 'daltar dnganas dgu'adunan/ bumo zla mchog phyi'i 'byung bar 'gyur zhing byunganas
[f ]/ tsongarang gang 'dod pa'i khyim thab 'dag par 'gyur gyi/ de khyod cag gis bsam par bya zhing/ na srung dang bzhi mdo dang suman de'i phyogs thamasu dngargyan dag gis brgyan par
byang/ ma to dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang me tog 'phreng dang/ byug pa'i mchog dag gis kyang byi dor gyis shig ces shul ro cha dang/ bzhimadodang/ sumamado thams cad du dril
dkrol zhingasgra sgrag tu gsol/// de nas bumo zla mchog gi lam gnyis rang gi khyim nas khyung ste/ 'di skad du deng nasazhag bdunan/ bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang
mo na'i/nga 'dod pa'i phyi'i khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur rgyas/ der khyed cag gis bsgrim par bya zhing/ lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo'i phyogs thams cad rgyan dgags brgyan par bya 'di/ mi
tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang/ me tog 'phreng dang/ rgyugapachog dag gis kyang bya dor gyis shig ces rang bzhin de dag kun tu bsgrigs so// de skadaso sor zos ba dang/ yang sal
can gyi skye bo phal po che nas 'di ltar rang rang gi lag supad ngang medodang/ sumamado'i phyogs dag brgyan par bya ba la brtson par gyur cing/ sems la 'di snyamadu cis kyang bulo zlachogakhidagal
'dzin gyi/ gzhan dag la mi saMzhi gang sta dusems te/ de dag phan tshun 'granares rang rang byon par byed de/ da lta lta/ tshong dpon dang/ bdag dang/ nang 'o dad/ bram ze dang/
rgyal bunams dang/ las mi'i bar dag kyang shin tu khrus byas shing lus legs par byugs te/ gos bzang po bgos shing/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan nas/ rang rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams la
khyed cag sgrims shig/ gal te bumo zla mchog 'obu cag gi gan du rang mi 'ong ba ltan/ de'i phyirams drongs la phyogs shog ces skul rabyed do/ de ltar zhag bdun 'das pa dang/ skye bo phal po che
da dngomatshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchogabaltaba'i phyir 'dus par gyur to// de nas bumo zlamchoganyim drug pa la zla ba nyalo'i tshe/ gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa yang bas de
mtshan mo mnyil tsaman steng gi khang bzangs kyi thog na 'chag cing 'a dugago/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis jusabumo zlamchog gi lag pa g.yas par pad+masdong bun gser/ 'dang ma nad ngul/ pa
zakhani'i zhun/ snying po'i rdo'i snying po las byas pa 'dab ma 'bum phrag dum yod pa/ bltanasdug pa 'od gsal 'khrig khyud bar gyur to/ pad+mader snying po'i dadusan de nani gshags pa'i skusku
mdog gsor 'dral/ gza'i rjid 'barab/ 'od kyis snang bar mdzad// skyes bu chenango'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par bargyan// dpakhyadabazang po brgyad cus gzugs mdzesabar/
byas pa/ skyil mo krung gsibazhugs r 'ge kyang byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i 'od kyis khyim de thams cad snang pas gsal bar gyur to// denas bumo zla chogags pad+ma/
demathong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yamathong ba dang/ dga' zhingegagu la res te/ rab tudaga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku de 'tshigs su bcad de/
gsol pa// 'di 'dra'i dad 'od ldan pa khyod// ba'akhas lta 'am 'on teklu// lhan pa gsang ba mi'am gi su'ags dris pa sa bar gsus// khyodaskugaser mdog 'odogasal ba'i// tshadazhi/
dmigs sum mchis te// skad cig mdog gser btsod ka dang// myur bar shol 'od 'dra bar gdab// ngan du slan chad lus kun// 'du shesam nas sems ma g.yo/ mgon po khyod kyi sku mthong nas//
padag zhu dga' ba 'dus pa skyes// khyod sku dpal 'bar 'drazhung ri las ri bzhin mdzes 'phags pa// jilta gabru zhing rab tuganas// gnas 'di byon gang du gshegs/
de nas de bzhin gshags pa'i sku des/ du mo blumchog la phyi'i tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// ngan ltaman kluyang min/ mi'am ni gnod na min// sangs rgyasatag sad 'og yas/ sha khyod
zla gnadug tung/ nga ni lha mAne gnod sbyin min// klunam ban tsam min// chos byungang deng khyod kyi phyir// lhami 'dul bas bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhazhi gshegs pa'i sku de la bumo
zlan chom gis tshigs su bcad de gsol kha/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyasazhes bgyib// demadog nyi 'dra 'di'i gsung la// de yi rtags dang dbyibs gsungasadang/ de go bdag gis rtogs par 'gyur//
0 khyod 'a di'i sangs rgyasamtshan gsus ga/ de'i mdog rtags dang dbyibs mi gsung// sangs rgyas rung spyod gang dang mthu/ mi mnyamamadzad spobs 'dir gsungs shig/ de nas de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i sku des/ bu mo zla na chog la phyi'i chigs bcad de bka' stsal pa/ denaskumadog gsar 'drazhing// mtshanamchog sum cu rtsa gat+tasamanga'// sems can kun gyi mchod rten te/ rgyu
de phyirasangs rgyas zhes brjod do// byed ldan sems can rnams kyi// spyod pa mchog dang dman pa dag/ gas gci'i gsan rtogs mdzadad// de phyirasangs rgyas zhes brjod do// chos kun
rnam pa thams cad du// desan ma ma khyen cung zad med// yegs kun gyi pha rol khyon// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ des na sams can kun gyi sems// thugs gcig gis nirtogs
gyurakyang// kun gyi sems la nam du yang// rlomab mimanga' gzhanadun/ sangs rgyus spyod pa sbyin pas 'a phugs// tshul khrims spyod pas mthor 'phags shing// bzod dang brtson pas/
mngon 'phags la// bsam gtan shosar ba yang dga' thags// bzo rnams thams cad ' gsabaslabasaMbs// des/nagis khyen cung zad med// byams dang thugs rje phunasum chogs// de
phyir sangs rgyasazhesabarjodado/ gangagasablamed 'khor lo yi// chos kyi 'khor 'khor bskor cing// gang rnams u0f74ba rnam rigal// bdag med rab tu bstan mdzad cing/ gang gis sangs rgyas
[p]bya@#// zhing stong dang// brgya dang khrag khrig snyad rnams dag/ ljags kyis rab tu khyab mdzad pa// de phya sangs rgyas zhes brjodaro// gange rnams bu stong phragan// gda'ikhyimasnyad
dag tu// dbyangs kyis go ba mdzad pas na// de phyiresangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ 'dren pas/phyag ni yi cu'i gis zhing rnams bye snyedablas mdzad cing/ khasal mkhyab 'debazhugs pas//
da phyir ngas rgyas zhes brjod do// zhang rnams stong phrag bye snyadan// rab lhun po ji snyed pa// sgrartag gcig gis de snga mas shing// gang rnams bye bar 'dzinamadzad la// chos rnams kun
la rang byung zhing// gsan nas go 'phang mchog brnyes la/ sems canabacings pa rnam 'grel pas// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// dbang ldan gyur cingastobs bcu lnga// mi bsnyengs
rtogs par thugs su chud// sangs rgyas chos lazhinanur med// daphyir sangs rgyas zhes brjodado// dbu yigatsugator bltar mi mthong spyanalnga dag dang ldan pa dang// stobs dang dbang po lnga
mang par zhing/ byang chub yan lag lam la gnas// dang tshul bzang zhing 'grogs na bde// zhi zhing dul la bla na med// la g.yo medarung dogasalabaste// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// de mi rtag
tumanyam bzhagacing// de la g.yeng ba ma mnga' la// sems can donagyis dus su gsung// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// yon tan kun dang thogs ldan zhing// den 'gro ba'i mchod rten te//
thams can mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// nga yas bskal pa 'am yang na// bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyur yang// gang phyi'i sangs rgyas de don brjod// de phyir/
sangs rgyas zhesang rjod do// de nas bumo zlamchogadaga' zhing mgu la yi res te// rab tu dga' dang dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// de bzhin gshags pa blta bas yongs su
skom par gyur te/ de bzhin gshags pa'i skudel phyi'i tshigs su bcad de gsal pa// gang gi yon tan de 'dra pa'i// rdzogs sangs de ltar rdo thogagag chos 'a de thos mkhas pa//
suzhig/da'aga' 'a nga khyimal dgar// sridebadagashagasamam thong bar// bdag rmugs dang gnyidisong zhing/ zas dang skom yang ma 'tshal la// stan la 'ang mchis pas bgyid do// bdag
gse khyodamathongashin tu rangs gyuracing// yon tan bdag nyid thos nas bdag rab dang/ monasumasangs rgyas de namathong 'gyur la// slar khongamatshungs med dga' bar 'gyur lags gras//
bskal pa stong phrag bye b.ra' jig rten na// skyes bumchog rnamasamathong ba shin du dkon// dgra bcom de'i mtshan deng thos bdag gisan// rten pa legs rnyed bdag gis rgyal ba blta// sprul pade
bya@#// bskal pa mang bor stong gsum 'api' dag cing// ting 'dzin mngon shes stobs pa rab thobs la// thos rasama' khrugs rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag rgyul ba mchod phyir rdzu
'phrul gyis/ khyob dar mad zhing du skad 'alas 'a dong/ dong nas sangs rgyas bya gdamagon chod ri/ brtan rnams phyir yang skad 'gas ldog rar byed// bdag tu 'du shes sangs rgyas 'du
shas med// zhing du 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// spros pa sna tshogs kun gyis mgos shing// sems can tshogs chen rnams kyi na gyad byed// dgru thub de dang byung chub sems dpa' dang
de bzhin dge slong dga' dun lta 'a dod tsang// thub dang nga drung nas chos mchog nyan 'dod na// tshal chonagang naston tebazhugs par song// degs bu mo sbrumchogapad+ma de nyid dang/
dazhinal shags pa'i sku ngaltar bzhugs pa de 'di thogs bzhin du// khang bzas kyi stong de nas babs nas/ rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ rang gi pha ma la tshigs su bcad de sbas
pa/ yabagazigs nganangu'i sug pa lag pa na// pad+ma gsar sdongamadzas pa yide dumachi// skyes bu dam pa'i sku la gaba'i sa shig yum// mthon su zhigade ba skyabs mamachi// rang gi gnas
kun gasaramadog 'dra ba yi// 'od kyis gsal bar bdag gis mthong 'gag pa yum// skad ci'o la yang du mamadog sgyur bas// sku yi tshadan bzung bar rdom thog/ deslad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar/
[o j]tshal chen du// rgyal ba go'u tan gza'i sa su gshegs so yum// me tog rnams dang sbos mchog bsnams nas su// de bzhin gshags pa la ni mchod par bgyi// zla ba mchog gi pha dang ma dag gis//
yid du 'ong ba'i tshig thos legs so zhes// gos rnams dang ni dug skyes skyes dag dang// ma tog rnams dang ra phreng ba byug pa'ang blangs// rdachen rdza rdahab shang gdugs rnams dang// dung dang
rgyal mtshan gling du pi wang dang// rin chen sal snyan yid 'ong thogasanasanaM// de dag khang pa de nas nges par 'byung// de'i tshon3me bdun pa de la srog chags 'bum phrag dun dag/ bumo zla
mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur nas/ de dag las kha cig ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems kun nas dkris par gyug/ khacig ni lta 'dod par gyur// kha cig ni rtog paskyes par gyur nas//
thams cad dang ldan pa'i yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po rgyan gyis brgyan to// de nas khye'u dang bu mo dag kyang stags budang sgo khang dang rtababs dang/ skar khung dang/ dung dang/ khang ra

brtsigs pa dang/ khang bzangs kyi steng dag tu dong ste 'a khod par gyur to// de nas bu no zlamchogade bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ring la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du pha ma dang 'a khoramang po rnams dang
lhan cig tu/ ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang/ ma tog 'phrang dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ nabaza' dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshanadang ba dan dag thogs te/ saMl snyan dang/ theg
rdob pa sna tshogs byer de dag gis yongs su bskoratsarimadun du bdar te/rang gi nas nas byung ngo/ denas srogasaM chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis de grong bar gyi

dbus su byung ba mthong ba dang bdag gis 'di gzung b.rakhyag bdag gis 'di gzungasaM bar bya'o snyam du bsan 'ashing rab tu rgyug re/ nga tshan yang/ pa0na gyi grong khyer chen po naskya bo phal po che de dag/
lhan cig du rgyug pa'i tshe/ haha chur shog/ tshurashog ces bya ba'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchogagis de'i mod la skya bo phal po che rgyug pa de dgamathong nas//

de'i tshe de bzhin gshags pa'i sku pad+ma labazhugs ba de 'di kyang thogs bzhin du bar snang gnamamakhar la shing da lta'i srid dumangonapar 'phags te 'dug par gyur to// 'duganas kyang skye bo phal po de
dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bzod ldan bdag gi mdzes pa'i lus 'di// chags pa'i sems las byung dag yin te// kha dog gsar mdog me lce 'bar 'dra ba// shin tu yod 'o nga khomi'i lus
rgyu'adi ltos// gang dag yul rnams la ni bkam med nas// mam dag 'obs 'dra rab 'bar 'dod snying zhing// dbang po drug rnams sdom pas bsdams pa dang/ gang dag tshangs spyod rnam spyod dag pa dang//

gangad 'gagazhanagyi bumed rnamasamathongan// ma sring snyam du 'du shes skyed byed// de dag mdzes shing shin tu blta sdug la// rtagatumchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// gad gis sa 'di kun tu khyab byed pa//
bdag gi spu yis dunganag byung ba'i dri// 'dod chags sems kyis bdag gsar ma bsgrubs// den sngon dang dul ba'i 'bras bu yin// kho mo 'dod chags ldan pa'i samasum skyid// 'dod chags bral la

chags pas skyed cig/ dzaltar smras bden nam yang brdzun min te// mdun gyi thub dang ngo 'di ni bdag ga dang nga// sngan chad khyed cag kho mo'i pharagyur la/ kho mor nga khyed kyi ma dang phu nu dang// sringamo 'am
phar yang yang dang yang gyur pas// su zhigam la 'dod chags sems skyod byed// sngon chad khores khyed cagabasadagyur tsang// khyed kyis kho mo 'ang sngon chad bsad gyur pas// thams cad phan tshun dag
bogashad yin na// khyod cag ji ltar 'dod chags sems skyed byed// chags pas gzugs dang ldand rami 'gyur zhing// chags sems can dag bde 'gror 'gro ma 'gyur// chags pa'isig su
ldan mya nganam 'da' bas// de phyir 'dod chags yongs su spang bar bya// 'dod pa'i gzhi res dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur ji// 'dod chags lasanayo degs dud 'gror 'gyur// gang dag 'dod chags
dkris pa'i sems ldan pa// grul bum lha min gnod sbyin sha zar 'gyur// 'dod chags las nisharab thang po dang// lce med gzugs mi sdug pa dag tu 'gyur// gang dag 'dod chags ngan pa'i sbyar spyod ba

rnam pa sna tshogs skyon gyi snod du 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pa dang// sum cu gsum pa'i dbang phyug brgya byin dang// tshas pa dbang ldan dbang sgyur gong yin pa/ de yitshangs spyod yongs//
gu pa sbyad pa yin// rtag tu 'dod pa dga' bkam pa rnams // dmus long 'ogab glen pa khyi lag dang// mo bong bu spre'u dang glangarodang// stag dang gnag rtaphye leb sbrang bur 'gyur// gang
dgatshangs spyor dngas pa spyod byed pa// sa yi dbang phyug dga' ba rnams dngan/ tshon don khyim bdag blon por gyur nas// bde zhing yid bde zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur// rang rgyal rnams dang bo de bzhin
dgra bcom dang// sas rgyas mtshanagyis spras bgasal gyur cing// blamed byung+gachung 'a ba rtogs gyur nas// sems can tshogs chen rnams kyi don mdzad 'gyur// 'dod pas ra kho' ba dag ni
bsreg pa dang// yang na du bas bdugatsangegasod pa'am// cing rang de bzhin brdeg pasdigs go dan/ namagatsA dang rkang pa bcad par 'gyur// 'dod spyod nyes pa gtsug tu ma zad de//
'dod rnamasami na thun nyes pa mtha' yang med// gal te myur du de las thar 'a dod na// tshurashag rgyal bde yi spyan sngar 'deng// lhumasam chod pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par// rten dang/
zla dpung gnyen gzhan dag yod man zhing// rgyal po 'byung ba bskal pa brgyar dkon gyis// thams cad lhan cig 'grogs te 'a ngo bar bya// bumakhrumchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dgasmras mathag tu des/

de'i med la sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur rinam ma kha'i dkyilana' khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang a la 'a zhes ca co dang/ gzha ba sgra chen po 'bum phrag dum dag rab tu phyungaste/ me tog gicha dag kyang rab

tu phab/ sa'o sAnabye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum dag kyang rab tungasil to// skye bo phal poched dag kyang shin tu yadabyung zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ 'ga' yang phyin chad 'dod chag

dang/ zhesdang dang gti mu dang/ khyob dang/ tha ba dang/ 'chab pa gnod sems dang/ rnam par gnod pa med cing thams cad kyasemasakyi sgrib pa dang bral la/lus 'batusam zhing nyin med pa thams cad dang bral

bar gyur nA/ bumo mchog de lam dang sring mo dang/ ston pa lta bu r sdug par gyur cing phyag byas te/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dang/ ma tog 'phreng dang/ drugapa de dag gis kyang/

mngon par gtor ro/gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas de'i mod la me tog de dgam tog kha 'og dug sa dpag tshad phyed tsam pa zhig tu gyur te// de bzhin gshags pa'i sku de'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad
kyi steng na 'i dug bar gyur to// de nas bumo zlamchog bar snang de las babs te/ sor bzhi tsam gyis sa' ma'e ga pa nam mkha' la 'chag pazhan du yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen rogs/

byung ngo// do'i rkang pa bzhag pa dang/ btogapa thams cad dusachenapo rab du g.yos pa dang/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong tham pa yang bumo zla mchog song ba'i phyir zhan
'brang bar gyur to/ denas tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bu dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig dusnga dro'i dus kyitshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed thogs na bsod snyoms
thubya// kyi phyir/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por zhugs padang/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis bumo zlamchog skya bo phal po ches yongs su bskor cing rgyang ring panas 'ong ba mthong ngo//

mthong nas kyang tshadangaldan ba shar dwa ti'i busatsherang ldan pa 'od srungasachen po'a'adi skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungasachenapo bumo zla mchor/'danibicom ldan 'adas kyi spyanasngar 'gron/ bdag cag gi

wA 'dicingazod pa thob pa zhagi kha/ma/ 'on tan ne zhes shes par byas// dri ba 'ga' zhig yongs su dri bar bya'am zhes// denas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dag slongad dag dang lhan cig tu bu mo zla

mchog gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bumozlumchog la 'daskad ces smasaso// bumo khyod gar 'gro/ bu mos smras l/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad dub khyod gar 'gro zhes gsungabani gnas brtan/
gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang machi'akha sas// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bumo kho bon yangs pa can du 'jug la// khyodanayis pa can nas 'byungan/ 'on khyod 'di skad du gnas brtan gang du
bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang macho 'gasaso// zhes zo ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur/ bumos smras pa// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod zhabasagang nas 'deg cing gang du 'jog pa'amadzad 'gas//
kAr dwa ti'i busalcas ba/ bu mo kho bo rkang ranamamakha' las 'deg cing/ namamakha' nyid la 'jog pa byed do// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag kyang subanamamakha' las/
[d]'a dag cing/ nam mkhar nyid la 'jog par bgyided/ namamakha'i khams lan De dad pa cung zad kyang mchis pas// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'idu/ de'i slad du bdag gis 'daskad ces khyod gang dubazhud pa
bdag kyang mchi lags so// zhes smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod gar gshags/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khe bo zhigyi nalas 'das par 'gro'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shAranA
da'i'i chos thams cad myunal sangs pamachib lags pas/ bdag kyang der mchib 'gasasam/ shar dwa ti'i bus smyos pa bumo gal tachos thams cad yongasasumya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba
zhin/ 'on khyod ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro/ dumos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yongs su myen las 'das par mching yongs sumya ngan las mi 'da' zhing// yongs su mya
ngan las 'das pa ramachib 'a ni spyi ba dang/ 'jig pa yang ma mchis la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchib la ma gtogs par gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyurang 'ga' yang mchis
lags so// de ci'i slad du shan/ yongs sumya ngan las 'das par machib nyidi yosasumya ngan las 'das pa 'gasang 'i slad du'o// deskad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus//
bumo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'o na ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yinanam 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam// 'on tetheg
[r/ ]thubya/ pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du/ khyod theg pa gang la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes gsung bzhi//
da tshun pa shAdzadwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyed nyidi 'azhus/ khyod kyis ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab tu gsol/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rtogs pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de//
cinathos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhag 'gasasam/ thegapa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig 'gas/
kA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa// bumo rim yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na ) chos de la ni rnam par rtog pa na/ sbyos pa 'ga' yang med la// tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin/ gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin snyatshog
'dekyan yin pa'i phyir ro/ bu mosasmras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwadi'i bu de'i slad du rnam par rtog pa mamachis pa dang/ spros ban mchis pa'i chos thams cad dang/ thadad du dbye ba man chis pa chos
thamasacad 'anag bganas bar 'gyur ba'am yongasasumya nganalasa' das par 'gyur ba'i chos de danas sumachis 'gasaso// shA ra dwa ti'i busalcas pa/ bumo khyod kyi spobs ban ngomtshan/
gzhan yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs padzasnyed cig 'a bsnyen bkurabyas/ bunos smras pa/ btsun pa shar dwa ti'i bu gang 'disnyed ces khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dzanyid tsag la bsnyen bkur byas

gas gsudabani/de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa'a'o// shar dwa ti'i bus smras pa// bumo re bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings kyang ji snyed cig yin/ bumos smras pa/ btsun pa shAr dAti'i bum

rig pa dang su ni pa'i srid pa ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smasang/ bumom rig pa dang srid pa'i srid pa yang ji snyed cig yin/ bumos smras pa/ btsunapa shA ra dwa ti'i busems can gyi khams ji snyid pa'o[q]na

dwa ti'i dus sa la/ bumosems can gyi khams kyang dzasnyid cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'a das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
yul dza sid pa'o/ ra dwa ti'i khu'i snus pa/ bumo khyod kyi/ nyi leg 'an brtag pa ni/ buchos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i buganas brtan gyis gang yongs su dris pa de nyidi kyi lan bdag gi
btapa lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus lcas pa// bumo kho bos zhig yos su dras/ bumos smras pa// btsun pa la bar dwa ti'i bu yig gang dag yongs su dris pa de dganyidi nges par bstan lags
so// ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa// bu mo yog rnamasana'i nga bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/ gdags sumed pa bzhi pas de dag nges par bstan pa mi nus so// bumos smras pa/
btsunarab ra dwa ti'i bu de batshani du skyob ma mchis pa dang/ 'gakha ba nams pa dang/ mtshan nyidi mchis pa'i chos thams cad la yang gang gis yongs su dris pa dang/ gang gis lan btab bdeganyis
0 bya// ka yang dmigs su mamachis lags so// shAr dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltarakhyod ni bzod pa thob cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par dag par yod pa khon yin pas/ khyod

bas ni ring por mi thogs par blan na da pa yang dag pa la rdzogs pa'i byang chub mangon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bumos smras pa// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang spros pa lag

so mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba de yang smos pa lags so// lta ba zhes bgyi ba ngan/ riyeng zhes bgyibade yang spros pa lags so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu// gang 'daskad ces

khyod ni ri por mi thogs par blam mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub mangon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyur le zhes gsungs pa ni/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'abubla named pa yang dag pa rardzogs pa'i byang chub ni
skya ba mamachig pa 'gag pa mamachis pa/ chanapa mnas pa/ rtag pa ma mchis pa/don cig pam 'gas pa// don thadadapamalegs pa/ 'ong ba gamachis pa/ 'gro lamamachis pa// brjod dumamachis pa/ 'byung ba ma

mchis pa/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/ de la nigang mngon pa 'phrogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur ba 'ga' yang dmigs sumamachis 'gas so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/byang chub naganyis kyi mtshan nyidim 'bags
ste byang chub ni gnyis sum mchis shing/ gnyis dang bral ba lags pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshadang ldan pa bur dwa ti'i bus// dumo zlamchog la 'dik+kad ces smras so// bu mo khyod de bzhazhigashegs

0 pa'i spyanasnga song shig dang/ kho bo cag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phur dur 'dong ngo/ de nas gnas brtanashA ra dwa ti'i bu la/ bumo zlamchog gis 'disnyadacesalcas so// btsun sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs dan mtshal

rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lags so// shA rwa ti'i bus smras pa/bumo bon de bzhin gshags pa sudaga'achos ston pa'i mdo/ bu mos smras l/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag nyan par brgyanikyang dga'

bar mi bgyid/ mngonapar dga' bar mi bgyid pa rnams 'a'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras ra/ bumo sems can mang po dag chosamanyanara'i phyi'i dbazhin gshags pa'i spyan snga' dong zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang
dadaga'achos ston pasaMmadzad dam/ bumos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes shing chosal la'adzin pa 'ganas pa'i sems can rnamasani 'disnyam du 'danid bzhanagshegs
pa ste bdag cag 'chosaston pa mdzad pa'o/ 'di ni chos bstand 'bagyida'o snyam dusams lags kyi chos kyi dbyas rtogs pa gsana'adaltar de bzhin gshagasang 'am/chosasam/ bstan pa zhes
bgyi bsems pa ma mchis lags so/ denas gnas brtan 'od grus chen pos gnas brtan kAr dwa ti'i bu la 'duskad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'adalta bu'i spobs

pa dang ldan pa'i bumo 'di de bzhinagshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bsan/de nichosabastanapachen po yang 'byungabar 'gyurabs/bdag cagakha bcad de phyir 'ganana'o bcag 'alegasakyi bdag cag chosamanyanapa de lta bu las
phyi rol tu gyun nam yin no/ gnasanyan thos[︽]bdedag phyi'i khyogs te de nyidis phyir log par gyur to//de nas bumo zlamchogatshalachenango'i khang pa bcom ldan 'das ga la
ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasa'amago bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'dasal 'atsagasum bskor btus nas/ ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang/ bdug spos dang// spos dang/ me tog/
'phreng dang/ byug pa dang/ phyam dang )nabaza' dang/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis bcomaldan ' sa'amangon par gtorato// mngon par rab tu gtor to// skyabo phal po ched dag/
gis kyang dziltar thogs pa'i ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ spos dung/ me tog 'phrangadang/ byug pa dag gis dam ldan ra sa lamangon par gtor to// gtor na thog tu de nas de'i nod lam
ba togade dgam tog gi gdugs rgya dar ga tshadabacu tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thadakyi steng na 'dug par gyur to// de nas 'a jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
bumo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ bumo khyod gang nagashaM ba phos te 'di'i 'os/ 'dinas shi 'phos nas ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgong
gang bdag gi sug pa g.yas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'isku pad+ma 'bazhugs pa 'di gang nas shi' phos te 'di byon la/ 'dinas shi 'phos nas/ gang du skye bar 'gyur stam/ 'jam
[2 ]dpa' gyis sa pa/ bumo 'di ni sprul pa ste/ sbrul pa'ani'aching pho yang mo dal skye ba yang med do// bumos smas pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad/
lagang 'chi' bo ba ma/ skya pa de mo mthong lags M so// de nas byang chub sems dar 'amathong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bumo bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nusan/ khyod ci'i phyir bud mad kyi lus sgyur ba mi byed/ bu nog slas pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stongapa nyid kyi mtshan nyidi 'gas pas/ stong pat+tidi la ni
ltog pa dang 'gyur ba mamachis 'gas so// de nas byang chub sems dang 'as 'dzin gyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bumo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ bumos
sman ra/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshags pa'i sku 'dis gabri'is paltarab dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pamathong lags so// byang chub sems dpa'aspobs pa brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bumo khyodachos kyi
gtam la spobs par gyis shig/ bumo sgras/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyanges lan brjod par bgyi ba dang/ rab tu brjod pa 'bagyi ba mnartsis la/ chos kyi dbyings ni yi garab grang de yang m las so// byang
chub sems dpa'aspobs pa thogs pa med res snas ra/ bumo khyod kyisasngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar chos dzaltaguthos/ bu mosasmras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i sladadusteng du gzigs shig
[h]kya@#// dang 1 bar snang ci'i dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa yang de 'dral/ de bzharegashagasal ci 'drapar chos bstan pa 'di kyang de 'dra/ nyan pani kyang de 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu chog
thams cad nanem mkha'i mtshanyidi de lta bu lags so// byang chub sems dpa'anamanara' mdzod kyi smas pa// bumo khyod kyi re smon rgyud bzhin gshagasab dga' ji ltar sbyin bya'i zhing/ ji ltar yongs

su bsdus/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dpar bgyi no/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbrul pa zhig logasasangs rgyas la sogs pa dpe srongag deg bdun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyuran/ de la rgyu ba ji lta
bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ smas pa bumo sbrul pa la skyo ba 'ga' yang 'byungabamed do// lu chos smras pa// rigs 'u kyang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la de ltar sbyin pa byon zhing/
[% ]yongs su bsngo ba lags so// byang chub sems dpa'i thogs medasams kyis skyas pa// bumo khyod sems can rnams la ji ltar byams pas khyab pa byed/ bumos smras nga/ rigs kyi bu sems can de dag
jaltab khon bzhin du'o// sbas ra/ bu mo sems canade dag kyang ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dis pa yang m lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma 'a gas ) da ltar byung ba yang ma lags la/ sems de
yang 'das pa yang ma 'gas/ ma'os pa yang ma lags/ daltar byung ba yang ma lags pas/ byams pa sgom pa den 'di 'dra'o zhes gdags par rngo mi thog 'tshogs so// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu
tsa dga' 'irgyalapos smras pa bumo khyod kyis chos kyi mig thob bam/ butshos smyos ra/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis sha'i mig kyang ma thob lags n/ chos kyi mig lta thob par gal 'gyur/ byang chub sems

dpa' blo gros brtan pas smras pa/ bumo khyod yun ji sridatsagazhas blanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yun ji srid cig nas/ smige rgyu la chu
yang dag par zhugs pa'i yun de srid na// bdag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags so// danas byang chub sems dpa'abyas pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so//

bumo khyod yunadzesridatsug gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur/ bzhos smras pa// yun ji srid cig gis byang chub se/sadang 'byanas bso bco'i skye bo'is las 'da'
bar 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi solas kyang 'dar bar 'gyur ba de srid kyis lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshodang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'daskyed ces gastsolato// bcom ldan 'das 'di
ltar sring mo 'di gtso bo chen po/ go cha chen po bgos pa/ rad ltar dag dang lta tsage yang dag pa smos yang 'ajigs par ma bgyid/ dmanabaram brgyad pa ni bu mo 'di'i spobs pa ngomatshar lags so/
de nas tshe dang ldan bshar dwa ti'i khyil bumo blamchog gso 'di med ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ zhugs ni rje tsomadu chung yang srag pa'i ngo bo nyidi'ags pas//
jitsam du'u par len pa rten pa de tsam du srog rab gyid lags so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pathams cad kyi bgrod pa

tha dad du dbye ba cung zad kyang m mchis pas// de dag thams cad bdag dang gzhan dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad gragar slad du bar gnas pa lags so// ra da ti'i bus smras pa/ bumo byang chub thoban khyod

gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba'i dra bar 'gyur/ bumos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdagagisangs rgyasakyizhingin/ sangs rgyas kyi'angegangag nas brtan shA rarA ti'i bu chu'i dra ba de badra ba'isams can mnapa
la mos pa/ shes rab chungab gzhan gyi don lam lta ba/ nyanathos kyi theg pa 'a yang dag pa razhugs pa dag ga mong yang grag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu r 'gyur 'gasaso// shA ra dwa ti'i busas pa//

bumo gang khyod 'di skad ces chos kyi dbyings nagacigago/ de bzhin nyidi nig cig 'o// zhesa'e na'o na ci khyod kyis nyan thosa rnams //demanapa nyid yin la/ rtsisangs rgyas rnamasani lhag pa yin par yang dag

bar rjes sumathong ngan/ bu mos smras pa// btsun pa shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dpar bgyin ba glong gi rjes kyi chab gang 'gas pa dang/ rgyamatsho chen po gang 'a gsapa'ichab ded 'an bya zug cung zad
kyan mas 'gas mod kyi/ 'on kyang b glang gis lan rgya mtsho chen po ltar sems catshadamamachis ra dgagog skabs ma mchis pa lags so// btsun pa shAdAti'i bud bzhin du de bzhin ga
pa rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyangs gcig las nges par 'byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchisagrongu ma mchis/
pa dag gi don gyid par jomi thog lags so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lte sdu dpar gyin/ yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i namamakha'i khams gangalags pa dang/ phyogs cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i namamakha'i khams gang lags pa'i namamakha'i khams de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang m mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang yus babu'i khongs su chud pa'i nagamakha' lan phyogs

khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha' ltar grong khyer dang/ yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang dag rab tu ma gnasang kun tu mi gnas la/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag kyang m mchis rgya mtsho chen po dgakyang m mchis
lags so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ba zhan du/ de bzhin gshags pa rnams dang na thos rnams kyang stong pa nyidi dang/ mtshan ma mchis pa dang/ smon pa ma mchis pa gcig las nges par byung
pa lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyanathos rnams kyin de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchis gras ma mchis pa dag gdon bgyid par sdom thog
lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus sar// bumo sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba kha cigar mau0f00nam/ bunos sgras pa/ tsunar ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'daskad cesasasan+tanamAdad
@#/ nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig go zhes gsungang na skur pa 'a deng sa pa lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i dus smras pa// bumo ci'i phyir/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu//

kyi 'i slad du de khyeda'adi la yongs su zhus/ khyod kyis ji ltar brjod pa de bzhin lan gdab du gsol// gang gi tshobatsun bsha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems rnam par grol pa de'i tshe/ jig stongagasum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'a gam tha'i ltaratshanyam par kun tu gnas par gyuralags sam/ jig gang ldan pa dang ri thams cad kyis khyod lags su mngon par phyogs te bdu dmangon par badud/ mngon
par rab btud lags sam/ jig ngan song thams cad dbatu zhi bar gyur 'gas sam/ jigasams can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur lags sam/ jig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'a jig rten gyi khams 'og tu na' ma mchis pa la thug pa yan chad dang/ stong du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dag 'od gzer gyi kha dog lta bu s snang bar gyur 'dugs sam/ jig lha thams
bod kyis phyalag bgyi sa 'gas gan/ jig bdud kyis sa dang nam mkha' dpag tshadasum cu tshun chadadapung gis khyab par bgyis te mchis par gyur 'gag/sam/ jig sogs kyiskad cig gcig dang ldan
pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par grol la gsasam/ ji ga khyodabyang chub pa dang dus gcig kho narab dud thams cad ngs par bcom lags sam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa// bumo khyod kyis kho bo la ji skad

lcas pa de dag las de'i gcig tsam yang ma byung ngo// bumos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bubyang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyisnying bo dam pa la gnasab la ni yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan yang
dpag tu ma mchis pa dag byung bar gyur pasan/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhagshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba dang/ nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i khyad pa 'di 'gag so// des
bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mozla mchog la legs shes byab byin te/ bumo legs so legs so// o khyod de skad ston pan yang khyod legs so// de nas sangs rgyas mthus bumo zlamchog
gi lag pa g.yas par de bzhin gshags pa'i skur d+ma'abazhugs pa byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de/ pad+ma'iganade 'asamangon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das lan gsum bskor ba byas
denas de'i modalasangs rgyas kyi mthusas chen bo rab tu g.yos par gyur cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i khung bu thams cad
nasapad+magaser gyi mdog tu snangab/ sdong bu rnams gsar/ 'dab ma rnams ni dngul/ snying ba rnams rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa dag byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de dag la yang de
bzhin gshags pa'i sku mtshan gyis legs par brgyan// pad+ma bzhugs pa dag kun tu snang bar gyurarung/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas/
[sho]bya/ mu med pa dag tu gshegs te sangs rgyas med pa 'ir jig rten gyi khams dag chos ston par kun du snang zhing/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa de dag kyang 'di'i kun
tu grag go/ de nas bumo zla mchog gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong nab dga' zhangem gu la yi rangs te/ rab du dga' zhadedaga' bo dang/ yid bade ba skyes nas/ des 'ag pa la yA/
wA ban thogs par gyur pa'i pad+magang yin pa de/ bcom ldan 'das la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'a bas ma thagadu pad+madem tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa grubazhit+tamar/ kazhazug pa chamanyam pa

shin tu rnam par bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi dbu'i gtsug gadring thad kyi steng gzhimamakha' la' dag bar gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa der yang khri gdan rkang pa'i na ro zhes smras pa lha'i las
bcos bu 'bum phrag dumagating ba zhig byungab rigyur to// khri gdan dol bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'akya thub pa so'idra ba de 'drab 'i de bzhin gshegs pa'isku zhig bzhugs par yang kun tu
snang ngo// des pad+ma de 'phangs nasabcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dase ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can
rnams la ngor 'a dzin pa dang/ nga yari 'dzin pa spang pa'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i lag par pad+ma gnyis pa zhig byungabar gyur pa dang/ des de yang bcomaldan

'das ga la ba de gsasu 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcomany+dzan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa 'dzugs pa gnyis pa zhag tu gyur pa dang/ satshiga'adaskad ces kyang gasolato// bcom
ldan 'das bdag brag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang 'bral ba'i sems can rnams la/ 'jig tshogs la lta bskas pa'islad du chosaston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyasakyi mthus de'i 'gapa
bdagasum pa ga byung bar gyur pa dang/ gde yang batsog ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangasas// 'phas ma thag tu pad+made yang bcom ldan 'das kyisteng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum la
zhagi du gyur pa dang/ tshig 'a domidaces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dgaba'i rtsa ba 'das rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ yongs su rtog pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhesdang
dang/ gtilugasang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur gi/ yang sangs rgyas kyin jus de'i lag par pad+ma bzhi pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang/ des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de ga
su' pasaso/ 'a pas ma thag tupad+ma de yang nga ma ldan 'a sa kyisong du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi pa zhig tugyur pa dang/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dag kha'i
rtsa ba 'disi phuge ci log bzhasbyang ba'i slad du/ sams can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par padalnga pa zhigekhyungabo'agyur dang/ des de yang bcom
ldan 'das ga la bde 'gas su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu ra d+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa lnga pa zhig tu gyur pa dang/ tshig 'di skad ces//

yi: kyang gasol to// bcom ldan 'das bdu gdagaba'i rtsa ba'asam+babar ldadang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrub pa lnga spong ba'i slad du chos ston pa'agyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lagapar/

u0f09 pad+ma drug pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang/ des de yang bcom ldan 'das la bde legs su 'bangasaso// 'bangs ma thag tu pad de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa drug pazhag
tugyur pa dang/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dag pa'i rtsa ba 'dis skyamached druga' son ba'i sems can rnams la sems can rnams / sumached drug yongs su 'tsha'abar
bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cige/ yad sangs rgyas kyimathus de'i lag par pad+ma bdun pa zhag byungabaragyur pa dang/ des/de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la bde legs su 'phangs so// rapangs ma

thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan ' dus kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'dun pa zhig tu gyur pa dang/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das rnam par shes pa gsar
bdun dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par sapaganas pa bdun yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos stonaparagyur cig yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i lag par ng dbargyad pa zhig byung par

gyur pa dang/ des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la bde legs su 'a phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa dang/ tshig 'di/
skad ces kyang gsol to/ bcon ldan 'das bdag dag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'brog pa nyid brgyud la nges pa'i sems can rnams la log panyidi brgyadangs par nga ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang

sangs rgyas kyi mthusada'i lag par pad+ma dgu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang/ dag de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'a rangasam thag tupad+ma de yang bcomaldan 'das[”]ste dupad+ma'i khang
pa brtsegs pa dag pa zhig tu gyur/dad/ tshig 'dod cis kyang gasol to// bcom ldan 'das bdagadug ba'i nuba'as kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ kun
nas mnar sems kyi dngos po spang ba'i slad duchosaston pa gyur cig/ yangs sargyasatsamathusade'i 'ag par padabacu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang/ degadengabcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 'gos su

'phangasaso// 'phangs mthog tu pad+made yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i btsug gi drang thad kyi stong dupad+ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa bcu ba zhig tugyur pa dang/ tshig 'daskad ces kyang gsal go/ bcom ldan ' das
bdagadagaba'i rtsa ba 'dis dzaltar ltar bcom ldan 'dra phyogs bcur snang bas khyab pa mdzad pa ltarastobs bcudang ldan pa'i sangs rgyasasu gyur cig gdanas pad+ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa de
nyubya// dag gong nas gong du brtsi gsara'i phung gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi ma thar thug par gyur to// de'i tshe nas blaba'i lha yan chad nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la pad+ma'i dang
brtsegs pa de dag gis yang dag par bskul nas/ lha bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to// denas de'i tshobcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi chos nyided gang gi 'dzum pa mdzad pa/de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gabrer kha dog dum/ kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta stesngon po/
dang ser po dang/ dmar podang/ dkar po dang/ btsod ka dang/ shal dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ dadag gis 'jig rten gyi khamasamatha' yas mu med ra dag snang bas khyab pa dbyas
nas [u0f10 ]tsha sa pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ 'od kyi nyim dang zla ba'i 'od hril gyis mnanas phyir log sta/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nubago/ denas tshe
dngaldan pa kun dga' bo stan las 'a ngas te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhadas 'datsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas//
bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhus pa/ mkhyen pa kun la mngon sum spyanamanga' zhing/ chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam dag la/ 'a jig rten
kun dang mi mas thugs mnga' ba// rgyal dbang nyid 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod kyis mtha' yas dus nas sbyin pa byin//khyod mis rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra// khyod kyis bzod pa'ang mi g.yos
tshun ro bzhin// drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// ngas mgatanabastas shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa// gnod bralanadang rga las rnam par grol// rgya mtsho 'dra bar shin tu zab pa'i blo//
thubachenatsasrid 'dzum pa rab tumadzad/ byams la gnas shing thugs rjer gnas pa'o// thub pa btangasnyoms dnganadaga' la gnas// 'dod chags la sogs 'jigs bsal rang du zhi// thub dbang rtsi
slad 'dzum pa rang du mdzad// khyod sku gcig nas byung ba'i 'od gzer des// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenamathar yas khams rnams su// nyi zlumyur du mog mog rab mdzadade// gzi brjid srol gyis gnon tsang ga
kyang rtsol// 'gro ba'i gon gcig khyod gsung rnam par dag/ snyan cing yid 'ong yan lag drug tu ldan// gang dag nyan pa de dag mi ngoms shing// nyon mongs thamasacad m lus zhib 'bagyid// khyogs
btsumasgra' yasaganas canagangamachis pa'i// sems kyi spyod pa dun gang lags pa// demakhyen de dag gomanyi gcodapa po// rang byung ci slad 'dzum pa'ang tu mdzad// dang su'isams ni byang chub slad du
sa// su zhigasangs rgyas theg pa yongs par zhugs// khyab bdag gangag yod bsams 'ab tu grug/ thub dbang saMsrid 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// gangagadi ringe ba dud bzhi pham bgyis pa'i/
rgyal/ nyon mongs bdud dang 'chibadag bdud chen dang// gang de phung po lta bu mang po'i bdud// phan par bgyisis na ci slad khyod 'dzum mdzad/ de ring su zhagi don chen yangs 'gyur zhing/
[I ]su'agachos 'arigs bgyid mo singag/ de ring su zhig skrun phyogs rnams mchi// thub dbad ni slada'adzum par rab du mdzad// kun mkhyen m dag thams cad rab spangs pa// sems can
kun la mtshungs par byams pa po// g.yo ba kun dang rtogapa rnam spangs pa// drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad// de ringasu zhig yangs pa chen po 'thob// dngasu'i sems kyi
lamaM smon pa legs 'grub cing// dung su stobs bcu rnamasadang ldan par 'gyur// dgra thul ci slad 'dzum pa rang du mdzad// mkha' la gnas pa lhakrubye ba dang// gnod sbyin makha' ldang lta 'phye cher
bcas dang// sa la thal sbyar skyes pa bu med rnams // dga' zhingalta ma dngang po blab ltar// rdzogs pa'ibyang chub sems dpa'amangapo// dmachosang tshal brgyamatsho lta bu dag/
phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa dgra phulab// yongs dag thugasamanga' 'dzum don bshad du gsol// danas bcom ldan 'das kyisatshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyi tshigs su bcad

dbaka' stsal pa// gang gis rgyal ba'icho 'phrul mchog mthong nas// byang chub bya le ni rgya chen sems bskyed cing// nga yi mdunan thal sbyar gang 'dug pa// mdun gyi du chomathong ngam kun dga' bo// 'dis
rgyal ba sum brgya 'degs par mchod byas shing// jaltarab dag ni byang chumchog reb ces// rgyal ba de dag kun la mngonasum zhus// nam yang 'ana' ga' ngan 'gro ma song zhing//

'dazhirtig tulcama'i 'dzag rtenaskyes// nam yang byang chub semasanam brjod cing// 'chis byas kyang rtag tu tshe bsadran// rgyal ba'od srungs zhes bya mthongs ni// khangababrasastenganasamadzes pa'i 'usamachod
rgya chenasams kyis 'ong srungasademachod nas// denas rjes 'thunabazod pa thob par gyur// sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jigaces mtshanagaso'apo// de la bza' dam paphrug phul bas// de phyir
'di yo lus mdog gser 'dra'o// mdzes shingadag la zla ba 'dra ba yin// ston pa gser thub ces bya gang yin pa// de la bdug pasos mchog phul bas na// de'i phyir 'di yo khadang spu khunganas//
ut+pal tsan dan dri nged rab tu byung// gtsug tor zhes bya rkang gnyis mchog de la// 'disanA mtshan bdunanges par brtags gyur pas// de phyir 'di yo rob mdog mthon thing la// 'gro brtogapar
byed pa ngoms mi 'gyur// tshoradA lnga brgya dag tu 'a dod srungs shing// tshangs spyod rnam par spyod pa dag byas pas// de phyir chags pasagadungs pas 'di mthong na// detsha'adod chags can dag
chags brar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'di 'phos te// 'di'i 'datsa byi khyim ni yangs par skyes// skye dgu kun tutshe rabs dranagyur tsang// tshigs bcad dbyas kyis skya ba'i bya ba nas//
pa yong/susman par bya ba dang/ de bzhin sems can gzhan don byed 'dod cing// 'a 'byung chub phyir nisams bskyed phyir// de phyir yangs pa'i mi 'di'i rab tu skyes// bud
gi modaskyes pa nyid du mdza' bshes dang/ gzhon nuganonanu ma dag gdul ba'i phyir// de dag stong phrag drug cu ra da yis// sangs rgyas thog pa mchog la yongs smin byas// 'dani ring po ma thogs dur/
mad kyi// lus bsgyur yi bstan la rab byung zhing// tshas spyod dmar rgya chen spyadabusanas/ shi 'phos lce yi 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur// lha gnasadanas shi 'phos phyir yab// dus mtha'i tshon chos//

'di srungs 'gyur zhing/ 'dir yang skye dgu'i don chenadus naso// 'dazhes phyir yang dga' ldan 'gro bar 'gyur//gang tshomi'aphan dgra las rgyal khabo/dung gi sras su gyur te 'byung ba'i tshe//de ni bzo don
sgyu rtsal bya ba kun// shes shing mdzes la yon tan kun n 'gyur//srog chags brgya phrag dums mdun bdaracing/ sgrub gsum du rgyal ba de nachod nas// dan srog chags rdug stong sum brgyu dang//lhan
sku tsog khyim gyi gnasanas 'byung 'gyur zhing// rgyal ba mi 'a pham bzhugs dang 'dus pa yin// chos kyi tshul yang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur// de 'dra'i dpang po de nas shis 'phos nas//bdeb can gyi
jig rten khams su 'gro// blo ldan dosan len dang gnod pa dang// gzhan yang phyogs bcu mtha' yas bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas byenang ga'i klungag ni/ bye snyadamathong zhing bsnyen bkur byedapar
'gyur// ting 'dzin mngon shogakhartsona'agrus stobs thob cing// bskal pa bzangs la gang dag phyis 'byung ba'i// rang byung 'dzagirten rnams la phan brtson pa// 'jig rten dgon de dag la'ang bswAn/

bkur byed// bye mang bskal par de dag mchod byas to// sems can bya mang yongs su smin byas shing/ bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu na// rgyal ba zlamchog ces na bya bar 'gyug/ zlumchogarkangugazhis
gtso bo'i mdzod lnga nas// 'od gzer gser mdog shin tu yid 'ong ba// gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis// 'jig rten khams de kun tu gsal bar 'gyur// gang phyir 'od kyisa' jig rten de

khyab pas// nyizla ma dang nor bu'i 'od rnanasan// snang bar mi 'gyur rgyu skar tshogs mni zhing// nyin dngamtshan yang bgrang du yodam yin// de tsho rangasangs rgyas dag yod min zhing// nyan thos rnams
mod mu stegs can tshogasamar/ mnyam med de yadega'adunarnam dag cing// budanadarnam par spangs pa nyid du 'gyur/ mi rnams thams cad gasar gyimadog 'dra zhing// bsod nams brgya yi mtshan
canabaltan sdug/ mngalan mo gnas 'dod pa ma stenatsang// pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye zhing 'byung// rgyal srasa rnams kyi chogs 'byung gang yin pa// de ni grang bas rtogs par nus shing// thams
cad mangon shes thob pa da' spyod dang// mi skya bzod cingemanyam med chags pa med// den bdu med dmigs can yod min zhing// bslab pa 'di la yod phyogs 'dzin yod ma yin// 'jig rten khams de
kludag cing dga' ldan gyi// nye bar spyod ba'i rnam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// gser dngul mu tig dam pa'i dramchog gis// spug shang gtsang la dri med yangs ba yin// rgyal
ba de yi sku tshe la grangs ni// stod phrag bye ba bdun cu gsum du 'gyur// ston pa de ni zhi bar gshegs gyur nas// de tshe dam chos bskal pa gcig gnas shing// bzhugs bzhin mya ngan 'das na'ang de
ya ni dam chos mdzod la nyams par 'gyur ba med// gal te rgyal ba dang na zhing de yi// phun sum tshogs pa bskal khar brjod byas kyang// rgya mtsho dag las chu thigs gcig bzhin du//
dang 'ad brjod byar 'gyur ba ma yin no// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis )bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga'
ba de nyid kyisashadi ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par b.lags so// mngon par bdags ma thag tu bu mo de'i bud med kyi lus 'gyur cing// skyes ba'i lus mdon par grub par gyur pa/
dang da 'jig rten du sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos bar 'gyur/ ma tog gi char dag kyang rab tu bab// lha dang man sil snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sgra 'khrol bar 'gyur te// 'jig rten kun
tu snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blamchog gis bar snang de nyid la 'dug bzhin du// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon
0 par bstod pa// ra rab g.yo zhing nam mkha' sar ltung la// lhunas skad cig tsam la 'jig 'gyur zhing// rgya mtshotshig yo dgung zla lhung ya nga gda'// de bzhin gshegasapa sho ba'i tshig mi
gsung// phyogs bcu'i sems can lus rnams gcig 'gyur zhing// zhugs na chab 'gyur cha ba na zhugs 'gyur gda'// mnyam med rtsub dbang yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// 'gro la phan
bzhed lagrwa pa'i tshig gi gsung/ bar snang dog sa kun tu 'dzin 'gyur zhing// yungs 'bru'i nad du zhing rgyanud 'gyur la// gser ma zhags pas gzud bar jo thog gdon// rgyal ba lag ba'i tshig
na gsud mi 'gyun// de 'drar ya da dag de bzhin nyid gsung ba'i// rgyal ba des bdag byed chub des bstan cing// gang phyi'i dog sa kun tu rab gayos pas// byang chub dam pa thob 'gyudagor
ma kumaM// sangs rgyas theg mchog bdag lung bstan pa san// rang 'byung gis na ji snyed gsungs dadang// sngon chad skal brgyud bdag gis gang btsal ba//de ltar bdag gis chos mchog 'khor
la bskon// lham lha min gnod sbyin dge slong dang// dge bsnyen rnamasaM dang byang chub sems dpa' dag/ thams cad mnyam med mthu stobs ldan pa yi// bde gshegs 'gyur gyis som nyi
na byed cage/ chos 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// rgyal ba rnams kyis longs spyod rmi 'dra zhing// bdag med gso ba shed bu 'ga' yang med// sems can srog med gang zag med par gnub
gzod nas ngo bo nyid kyis chos rnams kun// rang bzhin dag cing do ba nyidi med de// bdag ston bud med rang bzhin gyur pa gang// de na dngos med sog stodas pa ma
sa ba byama'i dngos de'ang stod zhing skadacig ste// dngos med mi g.yo srog dang ya ma bar// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bral gyur cing// rtog gyur de yang mkha' la bya rjes bzhin//
gang zhig mnyam med byang chub 'tshar rgyu zhing// thul dka' bdud kyang rab tu gzhom pa dang// stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams su na// chos kyi 'khor la dam pa bskor 'dod pa//
desan brtan par byang chub sems bskyed la// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mchod gyis dang//de myur du yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// ston pa rgyal ba sdig med lam rtogs 'gyur// skyes
khul rtsa la 'phags gsud snyan mthar byon pa// rgyal ba' mo mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal la/ (dga' mdzad rab dga'i dngos pa stsol mdzad pa// thub pa chos dbyig 'byung gnas dbang
phyug bstod// bde ba'i 'byung gnas bde kun rab stsol pa// dbazhin paM gsheg pa bdud kyatshor ma bkrugs// bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag mchog/ rad byad dbad
ldan sre dbra la bstod par bgyi// bdag gis khyogs su bltas na de dag tu// sdig med sangs rgyas brgya bra gsum las mthong// shAkya seng ge ja lta de lta bu // phyogs bcu'i sangs
ste/ rgyus de dag bdag lung bstan// rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas gcig/ de bzhin chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis gcig/ sems can rnams kyang yang dag mthar nges par// gang
la bzod 'ad mchis pa rgyal bar 'gyun// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zlamchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag skyas nas/ bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs gnyis la rab tu gtugs so// des rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de bla na med pa
ya nga dag par rdzogs pa 'a byang chub tu lung bstan to// des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mngon sum du mthong zhing/ bdag nyid ludangostan pa mang thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu la mi
nangs ste/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar rab tu 'byung b.ragasol ba btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag legs par
gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rab tu 'byung bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u de'i phyir ba ma dag gnang bar byed du zhugashag/ denas khye'u de'i
pha ma dag gis cho 'phrul chen po de mthong zhing/ de mngon sun du lung bstan pa yang thos nas bde skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis khye'u 'di rab tu 'ang da bar gzhung
lags so// bdag nyagags kyang chos de dag slad kyis thob par bgyi lags so// zhes gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khye'u de rab tu byung ngo//

la de nas khye'u rab tu byang bu dang/ srog chags khras kyang bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod do// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bdun/
chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing drom dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge slong lnga ni len pa med par brag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// sngon byang chub tusems ma skyod pa'i dge
slong ma nyes brgyadang/ srog chags nyes khris na bin med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang tshud tu sems bskyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
dpa' zla mchog dang/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag rung/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang/ lha dang/ ma
sku dad ma yin dang dra zababacas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po ni/
mad rdzogs so//gargya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tA dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsab ban d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab ga/
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba kur ba rA dzapa ra srid tshan ma ma hAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po' mdo//
bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'ad skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
mgonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong nyi khra' dag 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ mthu chen blobo dang/ seng ga'i
blo gros dang/ [” ]sang ga' tog dang/ seng ge'artsal gyis 'gro la sogs pa thams cad kyang skyo ba gcig gis thogs pa khri dang yang thabs gcig tubazhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
